1.content: First things first, are you male or female?
1.title: The adventure begins!

choices: Travel through the forest
Check out the mountain caves
Reader's choice
Reader's choice
Reader's choice
11.content:
Your name is David. You were born into a family of farmers, but that lifestyle never interested you. Instead, you spent your time reading the legends of great knights who charged into battle and slaughtered hundreds of monster girls. When you turned 18, you purchased your first sword and shield. It’s been a year since then, and today, on your 19th birthday, you feel ready to set off on your quest. The only question is, where do you go from here? You could cut through the forest to the city of Galdaran and gather information there, but there have been reports of monster girls ambushing travelers on the road. Alternatively, you can travel into the mountain caves, in which you’ve heard tales of magical artifacts guarded by fierce monster girls. Such artifacts should prove invaluable in your quest, but you doubt the monster girls would yield so easily.

What do you decide to do?
11.title: Male

choices: You smell a soft, sweet scent coming from off the road...
There is a rustle in the nearby bushes...
You can see a figure heading towards you from further down the road...
111.content:
Deciding that making your way to the city of Galdaran would be the best option, your head towards the woods, intent on trying to cut through them and make it out before dark. Despite the warnings of monster girl activity in the forest, you were confident that you should be able to handle yourself, and you were in fact eager to test yourself. What better way than to try and deal with these brigands before making it to the city. If you were lucky, you should even have a tale or two to tell for when you get there.

The forest itself was as grim and dark as the local tales suggested, and despite your earlier bravado, you felt your courage waning a bit as you stare into it's dark depths. Still, your determination ultimately won out as the thought of turning back like a coward at the first sign of trouble helped stoke the flames of your bravery enough to step forward into the dark. Thankfully the sun was high in the sky, casting decent light even within the darkness of the woods, and the road itself was still reasonably visable despite years of neglect. Provided nothing stood in your way, you should be able to make it through in only a few hours...
111.title: Travel through the forest

choices: You continue to walk towards the scent...
You get ahold of yourself and continue towards your destination.
1111.content: About an hour into your trek, the natural scent of the deciduous trees that lined the road began to fade, and was replaced by a much more curious scent. You felt the need to stop and inhale more deeply to get a feel for the scent. Was it lavender? No, it's much too sweet for lavender. Honeysuckle? No, it's not intense. You went through the list of flowers and herbs you were familiar with, but there wasn't a single one that had a scent that matched this. You sniffed at the air (your mother always said you had the nose of a bloodhound) and found that the source of the alluring scent seemed to be coming from the left of the path. You took some steps from the path, but you couldn't see anything that would produce such a lovely scent. You took a few more paces, but to no avail. The source must be a good distance away from the path. Straying that far from the path is basically asking to encounter a monster girl, but there's something about that scent that's driving you batty, as if your body was being compelled to trek towards its source...
1111.title: You smell a soft, sweet scent coming from off t...

choices: ...a fairy girl.
...a fox girl.
11111.content: You were already far...far away from the path at that point. Your nose kept leading you deeper into the forest, until you finally stopped to look back....you didn't recognize where you had come from to begin with! At first this concerned you, but as you took another breath of the lingering odor, you thought that you'd have all the time in the world to find Galdaran. It was still early afternoon by the look of the sunlight, but it's not too easy to tell when looking through the canopy....oh well...you kept walking. The terrain around you began to change a little, the forest became less dense with trees, and more populous with flowers of all kind, the air became inundated with all their separate scents. Still the enrapturing aroma that caught your attention overpowered them all, leaving you wandering almost blindly into a small, picturesque clearing. You stood by an azure lake as clear as glass, small fish idly swimming, becoming lazy from the heat of the summer sun...by now, the scent has gotten a little sour, funky almost. Just as spellbinding however, you realize the source of the smell as your eyes land on a wide pair of feet shimmering in sweat belonging to...
11111.title: You continue to walk towards the scent...

choices: ... kissed it.
... sniffed it.
111111.content:
She looked like a little girl. And by "little girl" you meant was small enough to lay down on your hand. Her pink hair was done up in pigtails, and her magenta eyes looked at you with a mixture amusement and wonder. She was adorned only in a dress made out of sunflower petals, and held aloft by a pair of clear, dragonfly-esque wings. Her bare feet where covered in a combination of sweat and fairy dust that caused them to sparkle in the afternoon sun.

The Fairy casually flew over to you; you never took your eyes off of her feet as she closed the distance. She must have noticed you staring; because, with a smile, she raised a leg and wordlessly offered you one of her feet.

Still feeling lightheaded and entranced, you leaned forward and...
111111.title: ...a fairy girl.

choices: ...shrink!
...transform!
...become further entranced!
1111111.content:
It was incredible how such a small creature could create such an intense scent! At this proximity, the odor was absolutely soporific. You leaned forward and kissed the entrancing fairy's foot. The mix of sweat and fairy dust created a sweet and salty taste, which you found extremely pleasant. You tried carefully not to accidentally suck the tiny foot into your mouth, as you're sure she would hardly find that as pleasant as you would.

After a few dozen kisses, the fairy instructed you to stick out your tongue, and you obeyed eagerly. The fairy used your tongue as a doormat, wiping her soles across it. As she was doing this, you began to feel... strange. The fairy dust coating her feet must have some magical effect on you! You began to...
1111111.title: ... kissed it.

choices: The same size as a the fairy.
Smaller than the fairy!
11111111.content: You felt a strange sensation, it started from your tongue and began to tingle through your body. Suddenly the fairy started to grow larger... no wait that wasn't right, you were growing smaller. She soon had to hop off of your tongue. As she did so the shrinking accelerated until you were...
11111111.title: ...shrink!

choices: You resist the spell the fairy is trying to lay upon your mind.
You can't, or don't want to.  You kneel and kiss her pretty fairy feet.
111111111.content:
You shrank and shrank until you the same size as the fairy! The sudden change in your reality and perception of the world stunned you out of the hypnotic spell caused by the fairy's feet magic. You recoil away from the monster girl.

"W-what did you do to me?"

She giggled. "I made you my size. Now we can be together forever!"

"No! No! I have a quest, I can't be this size."

"Oh darn my little foot magic has worn off. Ah don't worry my little pet once you kiss my feet again you'll be under my spell once more. Come now be a good boy and kiss my little feet. You won't be scared anymore, you won't be stressed anymore, it will be like you were in a pleasant dream. A dream that will make you happy, happy at my pretty feet!"

The smell was still in the air, it had a bitter undercurrent but it was trying to dull your senses and entrap you once more. This time however you were on your guard and you could resist the effects. A small voice in your head though was telling you, maybe this was for the best. A lifetime of dreamy pleasantness in the arms of the beautiful fairy girl in front of you. Surely it would... No you had to resist... but do you?
111111111.title: The same size as a the fairy.

1111111112.content:
The fairy grinned as she watched you struggle, giggling slightly as she noticed your gaze constantly wander to her cute little feet. Still hovering in the air just above you, she slowly extended her foot, her little toes wiggling slightly, drawing your attention back to where it belonged.

"Doesn't it sound nice? To just stay with me, your cute little fairy mistress, laying at my feet, licking them, smelling them. No worries, no fears, no responsibilities." she cooed. As she spoke, once again that strange fairy dust sprinkled forth from her foot, the scent once again tickling your nose. This time, however, the scent seemed... different. Sweeter, softer, more pleasant. Without even thinking, you found yourself breathing in deeply, your vision beginning to grow faintly foggy as your eyes watched her foot sway before you.

"... N-no... can't... have a quest..." you mumbled, your eyes fluttering a bit as the fairy's magic slowly worked it's spell over your senses. Your knees were feeling quite weak, and it was all you could do to keep standing.

The fairy merely giggled, floating just a bit closer, bringing that beautiful little foot closer to your eyes. From this distance, you could see the faint polish on each of her toes, sparkling faintly, and you could do nothing but watch them helplessly.

"Are you sure?" she asked, grinning widely, swaying her foot a bit more and laughing as she watched your head slowly sway back and forth as well. "I mean, you seem so very enraptured by my foot right now. You don't want to leave, do you. You want to stay here, with your little fairy mistress." she said, a faint hint of firmness in her voice which made it clear that this was not a question.

You found yourself nodding, her lyrical voice drifting through your mind. You couldn't think of a good reason to leave. All you wanted to do was stay here, to be at your mistresses foot, where you belonged.

"See." the fairy said, floating even closer, bringing her foot up so that it was nearly grazing your lips, "You want to stay here. To be my cute little pet, my personal little foot-pet. Isn't that right, pet." Again, her voice made it clear that this was not a question.

With a low moan, you could do nothing but nod. Her grin widening, the fairy pushed her little foot just a tiny bit further, and you could feel her petite little toe gently push past your lips.

"Good pet. Now, just go ahead and suck on your fairy mistress' toe. Just breathe in deep as you drift away into an eternal dream, my cute little pet, and surrender yourself to your new mistress." she said, smiling fondly down at you as you began to obediently and mindlessly suckle on her toe, your breathing becoming deep as you took in her scent.

All thoughts of your quest vanished from your mind like smoke in the wind, leaving your mind blank and empty, filled with nothing but the scent and taste of your mistresses foot. Falling to your knees, you continued to worship her little foot, your eyes closing in bliss as you surrendered completely. Your days would be forever filled with love and affection from your mistress, and your every thought was devoted to her and her happiness and pleasure. In return, you were treated well, like the devoted and beloved pet you were.
1111111112.title: You can't, or don't want to.  You kneel...

choices: Prepare to fight or run
Talk to her
111112.content:
You notice her tails straight away, nine in total. You remember some old stories regarding kitsunes and their tails. One for each hundred years that they had been alive, but looking a bit more at the kitsune you wonder if they were telling you a bunch of lies.

The kitsune in front of you could be no more then thirteen years old, and even then that might be stretching it. Her long blonde hair and tails are the only things covering her small body; as what is presumably her kimono is laying on a nearby rock, and she seems more intent with dipping her feet in the water than watching you. In fact, her green eyes seem to be completely mesmerized with her feet than with you.

Watching her more closely, you realize she seems to be more obsessed with cleaning her feet! Everytime she brings her feet out of the water she moves to smell them. And ever time she smells them her expression seems to sour, why would a monster girl seem to be so obsessed with cleaning her feet? You were used to stories of cruel monsters that loved making others obsessed with their odor.

After a few minutes more minutes of watching her, she finally seems to notice you. Her face perks up when she sees you, and her tails shift rather excitedly. Thinking quickly, you might be able to fight her, or you could run away. Then again, she doesn't seem to be looking at you like you imagined a powerful monster girl would be. In fact, you'd say that smirk on her face wouldn't look to out of place on a young human girl.
111112.title: ...a fox girl.

choices: "Yeah! A little strong, but still nice."
"It is a bit on the sour side up close..."
1111122.content:
Just a couple hours into your journey and you might already be at the end. You were confident you could take on the goblins and slimes roaming the forest, but not this! The fox girl and you continue to stare, each of you seemingly waiting for the other to make the first move. Wearing the same smirk, the kitsune covers herself with her tails and dresses in her red, silk kimono and begins walking towards you. Her bare feet plod along the soft grass, leaving faint footprints. You, of course, instinctively flinch at the approaching fox. She doesn't seem hostile, but kitsunes are known for their trickery. Kitsunes are also known for being incredibly powerful... and you're not even close to being ready to face one down in combat. As she walks forward, the smell that lead you to the lake is getting stronger, confirming your suspicions it was wafting from her feet. Seeing as getting in a fighting stance or turning tail might trigger some hunter instinct in her, you decide on the obvious, diplomatic approach.

"Um, hey there!" You say, a bit uncomfortable as she stops a few feet from you. The girl raises an eyebrow to match her smirk as she giggles at your nervousness.

"Well, howdy there, mister! Ah'm actually a bit surprised t' see a human way out here! Folk often know better than t' wander far off the beaten path." Her demeanor changes completely, causing you to blink a little in surprise. She sounds like a normal girl, not some haughty monster eager to enslave you. But again, you're dealing with a kitsune. Her personality and appearance could all be a trick.

"Hah, I suppose so." You attempt to laugh to ease tension, but it betrays your obvious feelings of unease. The scent of her feet this close is now fully in your nostrils, but it's tolerable. "I didn't run into any trouble, though. You're the first monster girl I met so far." The kitsune tilts her head at your remark.

"Really now? I thought fer sure you'd run into a least a harpy out this deep in the woods..." The fox girl rubs her arms a bit uncomfortably for some reason and her ears dip down. You pick up on this and ask her.

"Are you... alright?" Your human nature gets the better of you and you instinctively reach out to the human-looking girl. The kitsune steps back, kicking up some grass and more of her scent. The odd thing is it's not a bad smell, but a strong one. Like how even the best perfume can be unbearable in large amounts.

"I'm fine!" She angrily shouts back, shrinking away like a wounded animal. Your hand retracts back to your side.

"...I'm sorry I asked."

The blonde sighs a bit and smiles again. "It's nothin'. Ah jus' have some... So how'd ya find me out here?" She asks, changing the subject. "This lake here ain't on any maps Ah know of." She looks up at you, her height a few inches shorter than you.

You blink in surprise again, a little embarrassed to answer. "I, uh... I followed my nose. I had just left my home town when I got whiff of the most amazing scent I ever smelled, sweeter than any flower. Mom always said I had the nose of a bloodhound!" You find yourself smiling as you recall.

"Oh, Ah knew it! It's cause of mah feet, ain't it?! They're the worst, stinkiest pair Ah ever- ...Did you say 'sweeter 'n any flower'?"

"Um, yes? I would know, I stood by some flowers and the scent was sweeter than any of them." The girl's jaw dropped to the ground at this realization.

"An'... An' you ain't funnin' me, right? Not pullin' my leg?!" She takes a sudden aggressive step forward, bearing her teeth. Your body leaps back as you raise your hands.

"N-No! Honest! Why is this such a huge deal for you, anyway?! I saw you washing your feet when I walked up! I've never heard of a monster girl doing something like that."

"Yeah, well..." The kitsune fidgets, debating if she should tell you. "Mah feet sweat so much more than the average monster girl; even they don't want t' be near me!" She gnashes her fangs, seething in anger. "It's always 'Ew, it's the stinky-footed girl! Take a bath!' Or... 'Even we have standards!'" Her fists clench, but she sighs and the anger drops from her face. "But... you said they smelled sweet?" Afraid of another outburst, you nod quickly. "An'... even now?" She looks down at the blades of grass between her toes and wiggles them, looking back up at your face with big, green, hopeful eyes.

You answer...
1111122.title: Too Much of a "Good" Thing

choices: Approach the kitsune by the shrine
Attack the kitsune by the shrine
Just get out of here and be on your way.
11112.content:
You manage to get ahold of yourself, realizing that sudden sweet smell like that in a forest almost certainly isn't good news. You return to the road, and keep walking in the direction you were set upon earlier. After few more hours, when you think that you should be about halfway through the forest, you suddenly notice a strange building a bit away in the forest on the side of the road. It's pretty close, so you stray and walk carefully towards it. Once you get close, you realize that it looks like some kind of exotic shrine  . The architecture is definitely completely different from the usual around here. You also notice someone sitting at the terrace of it! Upon closer inspection it's a kitsune, fox monster girl known for powerful magic and talent for deceit. She has long red hair, and wears some kind of exotic clothing  . Luckily for you she seems busy drinking tea, and haven't noticed you yet...

Should you approach her peacefully? Or perhaps it's some kind of trap for travellers, in which case you can try to catch her by surprise and attack? Or maybe just leave her alone, since there's no saying what she can do to you once you are noticed...
11112.title: A weird shrine on the way

choices: Take it and hope they don't go too far
Get up and protest.
111123.content:
Of course you were a brave guy by some standard, but even bravery stood no chance against a high leveled creature that would whip you in seconds. Sweat beads up on your face as you carefully sneak back into the forest. Deathly silence surrounds you with every step you take until the shrine is out of view. You have yet to pull a sigh of relief, fearing that the kitsune' s ears would pick it up. For the next five minutes, you tip toe through the underbrush with your head turning around every five seconds. It was only when you heard the sounds of a flowing river that you relaxed from your tense state. You may have decided the admittedly cowardice route but it was all worth it to keep safe. The surrounding area gives off a strange sense of calm as you sit down to further your relaxation. Hearing the water rush through the deep river only fed your growing need to rest, now laying down in the grass. There wasn't any real danger hopefully, what monster girls would come all the way down here?

"I told you, we're lost." "Come on Marie, I have a natural sense of direction." "We passed this bend in the river at least two times and that portal is nowhere in sight." You turn about, somewhat annoyed by the female voices disrupting your nap. "Well this is what happens when you drag me to Cuddlefish's little experiments. Besides, I have a seriously unfresh headache." The voices seemed closer, and a little more distorted then you figured. "To make matters worse, our voices sound ridiculous! What language are we even...." "Wait...whose that?" "I don't know..but.....Marie? What are you doing?!" You hear the girls approach you and begin wondering wether or not to get up right now. You hear shoes hit the dirt and find a rather fishy smell invading your nose. "I don't know Callie....but something in my head is telling me this is right....we....must....dominate." You have a very clear idea what's going on here, but now wonder what to do.
111123.title: Some 'Fresh' star cameos

choices: ... A cute looking goblin girl...
... a bunny girl...
... just a squirrel...
1112.content:
You continued your journey through the woods, the forest growing ever darker as you venture further within. Soon, all that kept you from being encompassed by utter darkness was the intermittent shafts of light peeking through the canopy above, casting the whole forest into a dim gloom. Inwardly, you cursed yourself for having forgotten to pack something as essential as torches for your journey, and you could only hope that the forest wouldn't get any darker than this. If so, you may have to turn back, and you would rather not have to face the inevitable jeers that would come with your less than triumphant return less than an hour after you began...

Your thoughts were suddenly dashed as you become aware of a faint sound cutting through the eerie silence of the forest! You react quickly yet clumsily, your still novice hands grasping desperately at your sword, nearly dropping the weapon in your panic as you turn to face the sudden sound. About 100 feet from you, you could faintly see the bushes rustling in the dim light, and already you feel your palms grow slick with sweat as you fearfully await whatever creature will spring forth from the darkness to attack. Gulping audibly, you brace yourself as something suddenly bursts fort from the bushes! It's...
1112.title: There is a rustle in the nearby bushes...

choices: Raise your sword again and try to drive the goblin off.
Lower your sword, but keep it ready.  The goblin doesn't seem to be dangerous...
11121.content:
The bushes continue to rustle, and your pulse continues to race with each increasingly rapid beat of your heart. You can practically feel your throat closing up in fear as the rustling grows louder, louder, the tension you feel becoming so thick you couldn't cut it with a blade. The rustling grows even louder, and you know that whatever horrible monster that is about to burst forth must be an absolute giant, terrifying...

... cute little goblin girl...

A petite, curvy little goblin girl suddenly springs forth from the bushes with a large, playful grin and a coy little "Boo!". You stand there, sword raised, and what you can only imagine must be a truly dumb expression on your face. Your heart continues to hammer in your chest as the lingering fear persists for a few moments, your mind trying to wrap itself around the anti-climax you've just witnessed.

"What's wrong, cutie? Never seen a green girl before?" the goblin teased, her voice high pitched yet somewhat pleasant to listen to. It had a girlish, almost child-like quality to it, yet she looked anything but childish. Despite her small stature, merely three to four feet in height, she was supple and curvy in all the right places. Her hips were wide and feminine, tapering into a slim yet taut waist. Her breasts were small yet still quite noticeable, perky and bouncing delightfully with her giggles. Her bright yellow eyes stared at you with amusement, and her soft looking lips continued to wear that saucy grin.

Inadvertently, your eyes wandered down, trailing along her small, soft looking legs, finally resting on her petite little feet. So enrapture were you that you failed to notice the goblin-girl's eyes gleam, her smile becoming slightly wicked. You watched, practically entranced, as her adorable little toes wiggled slightly, serving to further hold your attention.

"See anything you like, cutie?" she asked, her voice lowering to a soft, purring croon. Her question snapped you back to attention, your brain finally remembering that you were, in fact, facing down a monster, no matter how cute she might be. Gathering your wits and your courage again, you...
11121.title: ... A cute looking goblin girl...

choices: You continue to watch, your eyes slowly drawn to her swinging feet...
You move to leave.  You need to get out of the forest before dark...
111212.content:
After a few more moments to collect your wits and calm your nerves, you slowly lower your weapon, though your grip remains tight and ready. You eye the small monster warily, though once again your gaze cannot help but wander as you see a brief bit of movement as her little toes wiggle once again, drawing your gaze. Her faint giggle once again snaps your out of your daze.

"Look..." you begin, doing your very best to keep your eyes on hers, not wanting to give the smug little monster girl any ideas, "I just want to pass through these woods. I don't want to fight you if I don't have to, but I must insist that you step aside and let me continue."

The goblin continues to grin as she slowly saunters towards you, the movement of her legs slightly exaggerated, bringing those cute little green feet up into your line of vision over and over. Her eyes sparkle with mirth, an occasional little titter making it's way from her as she closes the distance.

"Geeze, so formal, ain't ya?" she trilled, stopping a short distance away, her bright yellow eyes continuing to watch your reactions closely. You continue to watch her as well, always keeping your sword between her and you, not wanting to let down your guard.

"You just need to relax a bit, ya know? Take the stick out of your ass and have a bit of fun." she continued with a cheeky grin. She sits down on a fallen log, still eyeing you with a sultry look. Slowly, she begins to kick her small, shapely legs, idly swinging her feet back and forth.
111212.title: Lower your sword, but keep it ready.  The gobli...

choices: NO!  You break free of your trance.
You move closer, entranced.
1112121.content:
You continue to watch her warily, your sword still held low yet at the ready. The goblin just continued to sit there, that same, teasing smirk on her face, her cute little feet just swaying slightly back and forth.

"I'm plenty relaxed." you said, your words slightly heated. You were uncertain what you should do at this point, as the goblin continued to keep you off guard. A part of you considered just turning to leave, yet you were still apprehensive about turning your back on the monster for fear she might strike when your guard was down. Instead, you continued to watch her, her feet continuing to sway back and forth. It was a rather pleasant view, you had to admit.

"Yeah, you are looking a bit more relaxed now." you heard her say, her voice softer, lower, almost a whisper. Your gaze moved back up to hers, her glittering golden eyes watching you gleefully, her smirk slightly crooked. A sudden motion from below once again caught your eye as one of her feet slowly rose up, her toes wiggling slightly, catching your gaze. Without even realizing it, your eyes followed as her foot drifted down again, resuming it's swinging.

"That's it..." she whispered again, her voice soft as velvet. Her foot continued to swing back and forth, and this time you couldn't help but just watch, enraptured. "You're relaxing a bit now. That's good. Just watch. It's okay to watch." she continued, her voice seeming to get even softer, yet you could hear it more clearly. Slowly, without realizing it, your sword began to slip from your increasingly loose grasp.

"You look really tired." she spoke again, and without thinking about it, you nodded. You were feeling a bit tired. "It's been a long walk, and you look so tired. Why not relax even more. It's okay to let go of that heavy ol' sword."

You faintly heard a sound as your sword fell to the ground. You barely noticed, your eyes continuing to watch as her foot continued to sway back and forth... back... and forth...

"... Back and forth... that's it, just watch my cute little foot as it swings back... and forth... back... and forth..." the goblin whispered, her smile now devious as she watched gleefully as the handsome young man simply stood there, his now glassy eyes watching her tiny foot swing back and forth. "Why not come closer... you want to come closer, to see my foot even better... to take in it's scent... to feel it's softness against your face... come closer..." she giggled again, her toes wiggling slightly, almost beckoning.

You want to get closer... to see that small, beautiful little foot even better... you want to smell it... to feel it against your face... pressing so softly against you... wrapping your lips around her cute little toes...
1112121.title: You continue to watch...

choices: Make him kiss her feet.
Make him smell her feet.
11121212.content:
You continue to watch as her foot continues to sway, your eyes following each motion intently. It feels so good to watch, as if all the tension you had been feeling were suddenly draining away, leaving you...

"Feeling good... just watching my foot as it moves back, and forth. Just keep watching, cutie. Keep watching, and come closer..."

Yes, feeling good. You want to get closer, to keep watching. Slowly, you took a step forward... then another step, then another. With each step, her foot looked even more beautiful, more...

"... kissable. That's it, just a little closer, my cute little boy, then you can kiss my pretty little foot. Doesn't that sound wonderful?" the sweet, soft voice continued, filling his increasingly empty, peaceful mind.

Yeah... that sounded wonderful...

The goblin continued to watch as the handsome young man slowly made his way towards her, his eyes watching her foot helplessly as she cooed and urged him closer. She gently bit her bottom lip, a faintly musky scent filling the air as she felt herself grow moist at the sight. It gave her such a thrill to see such a virile young man so entranced by her, a mere goblin. Just the thought sent shivers of delight through her. He was just a short distance away now, time to set the hook.

"You know..." she murmured, her foot slowly beginning to move in different patterns, giggling softly as his head began to move with her movement, "Your legs look kind of wobbly. You must be so tired standing up like that. Maybe you should get on your knees. That would be much easier, wouldn't it?"

David nodded dully. Yeah, his legs felt really tired, really weak. Slowly, he sank down to his knees, his eyes never leaving the goblin's cute little foot. In fact, this was much better, he was much closer now, he could watch it..."

"... even better, huh? So much easier to watch my foot from there, isn't it?" the goblin whispered, her smile wide and devious, the scent of her arousal now hanging heavy in the air. "Now that you're on your knees, just crawl a little closer. Thaa~at's it... just a little closer... good boy." she giggled. Her foot was now barely moving as the boy slowly crawled the last few feet, her toes now pointed directly at him, wiggling slightly, holding his gaze trapped. Finally, he was kneeling right before her, his now vacant eyes focused completely on her little foot which now hovered mere inches in front of him. Biting her lower lip again, the goblin pondered just what she wanted the boy to do...
11121212.title: You move closer, entranced.

choices: David breaks free of the trance.
David subimits completely to his goblin mistress
111212122.content:
Watching the young man slowly crawl his way to her, his glazed eyes watching as her cute little foot swayed back and forth, the goblin girl's smile turned crooked as she decided on just what she wanted her new boy toy to do. Rubbing her thighs together to try and sate the burning tingle she was feeling, the goblin girl gazed down at the enthralled young warrior with a look of utter lust and dominance.

Slowly, she stopped swaying her foot, letting it just hang there in front of his eyes, her toes wiggling, keeping his mind nice and entranced. "Mmmm, you look so adorable right now, little human. Isn't so arousing to kneel before me like this, utterly dominated by cute little me?" she asked, her voice dripping with desire. Gently, she pressed her foot forward, the tiny sole pressing tenderly against his face. Giggling softly, she shifted her foot a bit, maneuvering it so that his nose become nestled between her toes.

"There we go." she cooed, a faint giggle in her tone, her cheeks flushing with the thrill of power. "Now my cute little warrior... take a nice, long, dee~eep breath..."

David sighed as he felt the tiny little foot press against his face, his nose nestling in between her cute little toes. His body shuddered slightly at the sensation, the sole of her foot feeling soft and silky against his skin. At her words, he took in a long, deep breath.

The scent of her foot drifted lazily and seductively up into his nose, causing him to moan. It was a deep, musky scent, strong yet pleasant, and his whole body shivered as he felt his arousal surge. He breathed in again, deeper this time, filling his nose, his mind, with the scent of her foot, his glazed eyes slowly rolling up as he leaned in, his face nestling even more against the little goblin's sole.

The goblin herself moaned as well, watching the human submit himself so utterly to her. She bit her lip, watching as he took long, deep breaths, filling his nose with her scent. "Mmmm... yeah, that's it... breathe in nice and deep... breathe in... and out... with each breathe in, you fill your nose with my scent... with each breathe out, you release more and more of your will, your resistance... in... out... in... out..." she crooned, wiggling her toes a bit, letting him breathe in deeply of the scent between them.

Despite being a mere goblin, she had learned quite a bit on just how to enthrall a human male. She'd watched various other monster girls use their seductive, hypnotic wiles over men, and while she lacked any actual hypnotic powers, she'd learned some time ago that all it really took was finding their weakness... and she had learned David's. And now, she would exploit it utterly.
111212122.title: Make him smell her feet.

choices: See David's life as a slave.
Plot twist!  Goblin Girl sells him very soon.
Reader's Choice / Something Else Happens
1112121222.content:
David was too far gone to resist. His mind was open and malleable and the goblin fully exploited it.

"Yeah... breathe it in... as you breathe in your feelings of devotion rise ever higher... yes breathe in that devotion... as you breathe out so does your sense of purpose... your ability to think for yourself."

David breathed in and out and became further and further hypnotized by her crooning voice. His mind was putty and she planted suggestions in it. Her feet were now his master, her feet were his life. His obedience was to forever be firmly set in his mind. He was nothing but her slave, her toy, her property.
1112121222.title: David subimits completely to his goblin mistress

choices: A Bunny Girl duo who wanted a foot slave.
A cruel sadistic Spider-Girl who wanted a pain slave.
Other Options

11121212222.title: Plot twist!  Goblin Girl sells him very soon.

choices: Decide to go with them for now... you don't stand a chance 4vs1
They are just young catgirls! You can take them. Attack!(Probably bad idea)
Distract the catgirls by throwing some food from your bag! Then run!
11122.content:
Just as soon as you turn in their direction, a bunny girl leaps out of the bushes! Without a word pushes you out of her way however, and keeps running to the other side of the road, into bushes there, leaving you just lying on your butt in middle of the forest road. Just as you thought you didn't have to worry anymore, you hear rustling of the bushes again!

"Kimi this is all your fault nya! If you didn't trip on that root before we would catch that bunny girl, nya!" And annoyed squeaky tone sounded from the bushes, and soon after that a group of four catgirls leaped out onto the road! All four wearing what seemed to be tribal clothes made out of animal bones and skins... they also seemed fairly young, compared to most monster girls you saw at least, from looks alone as humans they would probably be teenagers... but you know that monster girls can always be much older than they look. The one seeming to be the leader had a long red hair, and matching coloristically set of cat ears, as well as tail. Others had blonde, blue, and green hair respectively... you didn't even know that those last two colors were possible for someone to have...
"After we come back you are giving me a foot rub for this waste of energy, nya." The redhead catgirl told the blonde one, once again making it seem that she was the leader of the bunch

"Look! There's a human here, nya!" Said a blue haired catgirl pointing at you
"Good eyes Chimi! Hmmm... maybe this hunt won't be a waste of time after all, nya!" Said the redhead catgirl walking towards you, which made you notice that she was the only one of the group to be wearing shoes, other three were all barefoot, and you could see their toenails looking more like claws than it would be on human feet... it would certainly hurt to be scratched with those.

"Human! I am the great chief Nanao of the Kitpau tribe, nya! You entered our territory, so we are going to take you to our village to decide what to do with you, nya!"The red haired catgirl said standing above you while you still sat on the road after the bunny girl pushed you to the side

"Would be nice to have a human slave, nya... we won't have to give you foot pamperings every day anymore nya." Said the green haired catgirl in a slightly lazy tone
"Mimi is right, nya! That means I won't get punished for today, nya? Awesome, nya!" The blonde one, callled Kimi earlier said
You couldn't help but notice that the "chief" catgirl for some reason had a name that didn't quite fit the "-imi" theme... but decided to not ask about it as your first question

"Shush you two, nya! You should feel lucky human! We could kill you on the spot for getting on our tribe's territory, nya! But I am feeling merciful today so you will just come with us and we will choose your punishment, nya!" Nanao the "great chief" proclaimed

You didn't say anything yet... taken aback by the suddeness and absurdity of seeing a literal tribe of catgirls living in a forest like that. Nonetheless you didn't exactly like the idea of becoming enslaved by them at the start of your adventure like that!
11122.title: A bunny girl... running from bunch of catgirls!

choices: Slavery!
Community Service!
Ten sniffs of her favorite socks!
Worship the tribe for a day!
111221.content:
The odds are absolutely against you right now. You're completely inexperienced in fighting monster girls, you're on their turf, and they have you outnumbered. While going with them doesn't exactly seem like a great option, they'll probably go easier on you than if you try to fight or flee and fail. You don't want to do this, but unfortunately it's likely the safest option. You clench your fists and mutter, "fine...I'll go with you..."

The red haired catgirl nods and declares, "a wise choice, human, nya! I might just be a bit lenient in deciding your punishment, nya!"

Kimi whines a bit, "awwww! But we should enslave him, nya! That way I don't have to rub your gross feet, nya! Pleeeaaaase?"

Chimi bonks the blonde on the head and shushes her. "Don't question the chief, nya! Or she might actually make you sniff her feet, nya!"

"Or her favorite socks, nya..." Says Mimi with a shudder.

Meanwhile you're just sitting here wondering what you've gotten yourself into! Their chief apparently has feet even other monster girls can't stand! And while you contemplate your horrible luck, Nanao has slunk up behind you! She wraps an arm around and holds you tight against her, prompting you to shout, "h-hey! What're you doing!?"

Nanao keeps you held there with one arm as she lifts up a leg and reaches her free hand down. "I'm not about to show a human how to get to our home, nya! I'd apologize for this, but I won't lie and say I'm not going to enjoy it, nya."

"Wait, enjoy wha-EUGH!" Oh holy crap that STINKS! As Nanao pries off one of her shoes, a terrible cloud of catgirl foot odor envelops the area! The other three cats hold their noses and step away as Nanao brings the steaming footwear up to your nose.

"Sniff it, human, nya! Sniff my shoe and faint, nya!" The opening is pressed over your sniffer and her arm holds you tight as you try to squirm away from her toxic shoe! Her grip on you is too strong though, and eventually you have to breathe in! The horrendous, cheesy, sweaty odor fills your lungs and the world around you starts to spin. Your knees feel weak as your airways are polluted with the stench of this shoe. Nanao keeps it held there, and with another sniff, her stench sends you off to dreamland...

You wake up in some strange hut. You've been stripped and bound with rope! Nanao is sitting on a throne made of hides and bones, and all manner of catgirls are standing around, watching you! Nanao leans forward upon seeing that you've awoken. "Human, we've decided on your punishment, nya!"

She sentences you to...
111221.title: Decide to go with them for now... you don't...

choices: "...swear loyalty to you as my new master."
"...begin my revenge against humanity, starting with you!"
11123.content:
A mere squirrel leaps from the bushes and skitters across the path away from you. You sigh and wipe the sweat from your brow, happy to avoid a potential ambush with a monster girl.

You begin walking again, but something on the path causes you to stumble. You stagger a couple steps, then turn around and see what caused you to lose balance. It seems that the squirrel wasn't the only thing occupying the bushes, as its escape caused an oil lamp to become dislodged from the bush as well. It must've fallen from a trader's caravan into the bush. Your luck just keeps getting better! You pick up the lamp and take a closer look.

The lamp was cast in bronze and was adorned with rubies, emeralds, sapphires, and diamonds. This lamp would fetch quite a price! You were almost shaking with excitement. As you examined the lamp, you noticed a series of intricate runes engraved across its surface. A bit of dust the lamp picked up from its tumble prevented the runes from being legible, however. You rubbed the dirt from the lamp, but as you did, the lamp began to glow with a blinding light! The sudden brightness caused you to drop the lamp and raise your hands to your eyes. The light subsided, but a thick blue smoke began to bellow from the lamp's nozzle. The smoke rose a few feet above the ground, but strangely enough, did not rise any higher than that. After a few seconds, the smoke stopped pouring as the mass hung above the lamp.

Before your very eyes, the smoke began to condense itself into a human-like shape! When it finished, it was shaped like a normal human woman, albeit blue. She was wearing an intricate tiara adorned with the same gems as the lamp that held her. She was dressed in a fine silk bra and matching pants, both dyed red. Her lack of shoes showed off her matching red toenails.

You were so awestruck that you hardly noticed her begin to speak. "Finally, after centuries of imprisonment within that lamp, I've been freed. You there, young man," she gestured to you, "were you the one who has freed me?"

"Y-yeah," you reply, your voice shaky.

"Very well. I am the great djinni Tabia. Now that I am free, I will..."
11123.title: ... just a squirrel...

choices: Practicality wins out... for your first wish at least.
Screw it, you need to be at her feet!
111231.content:
What? Did she just say what you though she said? You realize that in the time it takes your mind to come to grips with this new development, your new djinni has begun bowing. "W-wait, what?!" you manage to stammer out. "Are you serious? I thought genie's were fairy tales, nothing but stories told to children!" She sighs and looks mildly offended.

"Please refrain from calling me that word, master. It was crafted centuries ago as a form of derogatory term. To put it into perspective, how would you like it if I called you a rodent fit for nothing but death under my heel?" Her eyes flared up at the end, filled with immense power and rage. All of it focused on you. Maybe you should refrain from calling her genie. She quickly calmed down, and seemed mildly embarrassed even. "My apologies, master. I allowed my anger to get the better of me. I just really hate stereotypes. I promise it won't happen again. Should I begin explaining the rules behind my service, master?" She arched an eyebrow in your direction.

"Uh, yeah sure." You manage to realize that your voice was at least an octave higher than it should be, but all things considered you decide to pat yourself on the back for talking at all. "Is this like a three wishes deal or what?"

She makes a gesture that you roughly translate to "Eh, kind of" and then speaks. "Eh, kind of." Well, I suppose you were spot on then. "You do get three wishes, but there are some caveats. First of all, you cant wish for more wishes. Period. You also cannot wish for history to change. What is written is written, simple as that. You may not wish for ultimate power either, it would take all the fun out of the adventure." She seemed to wink and nod in your direction, but slightly above you, like there was someone else there. "They know what I am talking about. Anyway, there is a whole list of other restrictions." She pauses and snaps her fingers causing an almost infinite parchment to appear in her hands and all around her. "But those are the three big ones. To save us time, since I am assuming you want to move on some time this lifetime, if you wish for something I cannot do I will tell you. Most of this list is simply variations of those three things anyway." She snaps her fingers again and the parchment is gone. "Now that that's all out of the way, what can I do for you master?" She concludes with a smile and a bow, classy gal that she is.

You are still a little gob smacked but at least you know all the rules now. You figure you should probably make a wish now, but your kind of puzzled as to what you should wish for. The logical part of your brain say's that you should wish for money or weapons, things that will be useful for the journey ahead. The other, more basic side of your brain keeps looking at her feet. She is a beautiful woman, no doubt, but her feet are utterly remarkable! Perfectly shaped, not too small or too large, clean and well manicured. The shade of red nail polish is even your favorite! What should you wish for?
111231.title: Well... Didn't see that one coming,

choices: White/silver gauntlet
Magic powers
1112311.content:
Hm, this is very important for your journey and chance to be the greatest hero. Since this is the only chance of wishing for anything you want, being within her power, you can actually wish for a great weapon or gain magic! But which do you want first?

After for some time, you decided that for your first wish you want-

*A white/silver magic augmented gauntlet that can take control of any Monster girl mind (brand) but capped to only five (a plus though is that you can release one to gain a better one) and capable of reading minds when touched by your gauntlet (doesn't require branding), however, it drains your energy to a state of not being able to fight but can still walk. Also if a Monster Girl is strong-willed, you can't control them.

or

*Magic powers; you gain basic elements, however, you need to learn from other sources to obtain more magic capabilities.
.
1112311.title: Practicality wins out... for your first wish at...

choices: "I agree (Doesn't mean I like)"
"You know, never mind, maybe another thing."
11123111.content:
"For my first wish, I would like to have a magical gauntlet that can control up to any five Monster girls, with being able to read minds when touched by my gauntlet too, Oh and I can release one to have another in its place however, it will drain almost all of my energy to do anything with that power." The genie raised an eyebrow at your wish, your heart speeds up a bit, you race your thoughts for words to persuade the genie into giving what you want;
"It has a big con too, you can envision it, I can't just use it all picky wicky a hundred Monster girls, it will take more cunning than blind "I want you and you and you" power, and that it will take most of my energy away and... it's not unlimited power, riiiight? "Only limited!" You smile to close the case.

She grins, "Fine I will allow it, consider it a little thank you from me, although it will count as two wishes if you want that, considering it is a slightly higher power but limited in a way as you stated, you agree to the condition?
11123111.title: White/silver gauntlet

choices: "your freedom Geni-- uh, what was your name?
(Extra stuff maybe)
111231111.content:
"Alright then." she snaps her fingers. As soon as she snapped, a white glow manifested on your left arm, it burned as materials broke from the ground and formed around your left arm till the tip of your fingers. You felted the power as it was being formed, it was a wonderful site to behold, though the burning soured it. Once the burning subsided the genie grabbed your left arm, closed her eyes and held her right hand up high, you were confused about what she was doing, when you were about to open your mouth, a blue shard was being formed. It looked beautiful, it appeared to be like a blue diamond. Once finished she placed the two-inch shard on top of the gauntlet and it radiated beautiful blue light. The gauntlet tightened its grip on the shard soon it was completed.
"Wow, this is... awesome." You looked over the details of your weapon, it was so marvelous, it looked like the world's place blacksmith made it!

"Glad you like it Master!~" She smiles, it looked a bit cute. "Oh, and it is removable too so you don't have to wonder about it be bound it you forever." She gives a wink.

You looked at it again, you believe that it may be worth two wishes, well, at least you hoped.

"Last one Master, what will it be? You looked at her, "Oh yeah, right, my last wish, well..." this has to be to be a great one! Although before thinking for another wish, the genie tapped on your shoulder with a smile and asked "Hey if it isn't a problem for you, could you maybe.." she looks to the ground while putting her right foot toward her left heel "for your last wish, could you, wish me-?" You raised your eyebrow at her. She turns a bit red and looks to the ground "I-I-I uh, nevermind, forget it, continue with your thought about your last wish." She turns her back on you and begins to whistle.
You thought about what she wanted to ask you about and after pondering about it, you believe that she wishes have freedom. But do you really want to use your last wish on her?
After debating about it, you made up your mind.

"For my last wish, I wish for..-"
111231111.title: "I agree (Doesn't mean I like)"

choices: Charge at the elve
Ask the elve what she is doing
1113.content: As you continue walking, you see an elve, looking for something. The elve seems to notice you, and begins to walk toward you. Expecting the worst, you draw your sword, and,.....
1113.title: You can see a figure heading towards you from f...

choices: Submit to her
Defy her
11131.content:
You begin to to run towards the elve with your sword out. You swiftly swing at her, but she doges. You try to kick her feet out, but she moves and you're sent crashing on the ground. She puts a boot on your face and utters to herself.
" Humans, such repulsive creatures. All I was doing was looking for someone, but you had to attack me just because I am an elve. Where are your manners?"
It was at this that she took her boot off revealing her large, smelly feet. She hovers it above your face, and says,
"Now, worm, if you apologize by licking my foot clean, I may forgive you."
You think about it, and decide to...
11131.title: Charge at the elve

choices: Yes
No
11132.content:
"Cease your pace Elve!" you yelled out, taking out your sword, you felt intimidated as she walked toward you, her tall seven foot demeanor, the blade on side, and her dirty bare feet was enough for caution here, you thought.
The Elve stop moving, putting her hand on the handle of her blade.
You thought to yourself that yelling at her as well pointing your sword wasn't the smart thing to do, being that she didn't provoke. So you tried to fix the heated atmosphere you created.
You continued, "Forgive my rudeness, I don't want any unnecessary trouble, if you need help with directions I can point to the right way but in exchange, you let me pass by without harm, fair deal?" You lowered your sword to show you are not willing to fight.

Despite you showing no will to fight the two of you stood in your places in silence, looking at each others eyes. The wind blows by, the birds chirped, and the dagger of the elve's eyes showed no remorse, it eats at you when you look in her bright green eyes.

After what felt like ten minutes she spoke at last, "I have no need of directions, my mission is to find and recover." The way she spoke was that of a dead tone, no emotions expressed.
She looked at me, analyzing me. She took her hand off her blade and preceded to speak "Have you seen a dragon girl anywhere? She is six feet tall, blue scale coloring, dark red eyes, has a annoying high pinch voice, and is extremely dumb."
You respond "No, I have not seen your dragon girl." As you moved your head sideways.
The Elve pondered what you just said, then spoke "You will help in my search human, come."
She turned around and went back on searching, going near the woods. You were dumb founded at her confidence, did she really think that you would just help her, just like that?
You needed to defeat the Monster Queen. you didn't have time to waste searching for a dragon girl that would most likely push you to the ground and make you worship her dirty feet, smothering you to the dirt, putting her filthy toes in your mouth and use your tongue to clean her feet!
Oh the mere thought!

You needed to say a few words about this sudden arrangement "Hold on there Elve-"
"Miranda" she corrected as she moved a large leaf "Miranda," you started to get annoyed "I will not do this, I will not hel-" she moved so fast, in the blink of an eye she grab your collar shirt and spoke near your ear "You are not making a wise choice human, fail to help me and I will see to it that you will die here, under my feet, slowly."

You were shocked at this outcome, you didn't expect that she would threaten you like that before finishing your sentence. You tried to make the best out of this situation so you put on a brave face and spoke;
"Please, don't misinterpret my uproar." She moved herself to looked you in the eyes, you continued "I just wanted to say that this will greatly put me in harms way to find your dragon girl, considering she may like putting people under her feet and that you only benefit from this."
You paused for a moment
"Seeing that you are a very honorable Elve, letting me talk to you instead of you putting me under your feet, I thought that we come to a reasonable deal."
She just looked at you, in her dead gaze, you didn't know that if this stunt you pulled would work, though you hoped, it is uncertain.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------

Will she accept your terms?
11132.title: Ask the elve what she is doing

choices: A single lizard girl
An entire party of Legion Agents
112.content:
You look at your sword and shield and sigh. Your sword was dull and looked like it was picked up from a battle that happened years ago. Your shield wasn't any better, it was made of wood but it looked like it would shatter if someone so much as sneezed at it. You needed better equipment if you were to even have a chance at fulfilling your quest, so you decided that it would be best to travel to one of the many caves that dot this land and hope for the best. You pack for a long journey and ready your horse then set out.

You travel for many hours along the Imperial Highway then stop to look at the map, it was old and outdated but that's precisely why you were using it. These "caves" as the peasantry called them weren't caves but the entrances to old dwarf holds that had long since been abandoned by the dwarves. Inside these holds were dwarven weapons, armor, or treasure, before the rise of the Dark Legion (aka the Monster Girl Empire). The Dark Empire sent its agents and elite warriors to secure these holds and protect the valuables within until they could all be transported back to their empire. With any luck you'd come across a hold that hasn't been stripped clean, but you hoped there wouldn't be an entire party of monster girls.

You find a hold that was close to your position and ride there, you make it to the entrance of the hold right as the sun was beginning to set over the horizon. You had no choice now, at night bandits and foul creatures stalked the land and it would be safe to wait in this hold until the sun rose once more. You enter the hold and were surprised at first to see all the torches were lit but you realized that meant that the Dark Legion had sent their agents to this hold and were guarding the valuables within. You carefully step forward to reduce the noise you made as you walked, you hoped that it was just one agent and not a whole party. You make your way to what you assume was once a dwarven meadhall, chairs were broke or overturned, the tapestries that once hung proudly on the ceiling were now wallowing on the dirty floor, but thankfully the fireplace was lit and you didn't have to stumble around in the dark. But before you can warm yourself up to the fire you hear someone coming and quickly hide behind an overturned table and look through a hole in the table at who was coming.
112.title: Check out the mountain caves

choices: Sneak past her
Attack her
1121.content: You were relieved to see a single agent, she was a green lizard, clad from neck to ankle in iron armor and with a jagged sword on her hip. She wore no boots though and her scaly feet walked along the cold stone floor. She was carrying with her a bedroll that she set down near the fireplace and laid down, she yawned and closed her eyes. It looked like she was going to sleep, this was your chance! You could either attack her or sneak past her to look for magical items to defeat her with.
1121.title: A single lizard girl

choices: You manage to put the ring on her toe
She wakes up before you can put the ring on her
11211.content:
You decide not to risk attacking her, better to play it safe and defeat her with something more powerful than your dull sword. You carefully make your way to the room the Legion agent came from, you enter the room and see the agent had collected armor and weapons most of which old and rusted. You sighed, there seemed to be nothing here of any importance. You were about to leave when you discover a table with a ring laying on top of it. You walk over to it and pick it up, you see strange symbols on it but you had no idea what it did, you also see a letter near the ring. You picked up the letter and see it was dated decade ago, during the Great War between Dwarves and Elves. The letter talked about the ring and how the Dwarves found it on an Elven spy, apparently the ring could hypnotize the wearer but only if they were female. You lucked out, you could use this ring on the Legion agent and maybe even interrogate her for information.

You step out of the room and slowly make your way to the sleeping lizard girl, she had gloves on so you couldn't put it on her finger but luckily she was barefoot and perhaps you could the ring on her toe.
11211.title: Sneak past her

choices: Interrogate her for information
Play with her feet
Do both
112111.content:
The agent slept on her back and was starting to snore. You look at her feet and saw that her toe nails were pretty sharp, you shudder at the thought of her kicking you. You kneel down and put the ring on her big toe, after a few seconds the symbols on the ring light up and the agent's eyes snap open and she gasps. You take a step back and look at the girl's face, her eyes were glazed over and her breathing was deep.

After a few minutes of looking at her you decide to see if the ring worked. "Uh...can you hear me?"

"Yessss..." She says in a monotone voice.

"What...is your name?"

"Teela..."

"What's your purpose for being here Teela?"

"To guard whatever artifacts I found..."

It seemed like the ring was working, now you could do what you want to Teela.
112111.title: You manage to put the ring on her toe

choices: Leave
Sleep
1121113.content:
You decide to interrogate her, but you've never felt a lizard's feet before so you also decide to play with her feet. You start with a simple foot rub, your thumbs gently caress her scaly arches and this causes the lizard to melt on her bedroll as she moans.

"Do your superiors know about the ring Teela?"

"Ooooh...yes...they ordered me to guard it with my life. Such an object could seriously hinder our efforts..."

"Indeed, when will they arrive to recover the ring?"

"Mm...perhaps tomorrow, or the day after..."

Damn, that was a bit closer than you'd like. You could leave right now and travel in the dark, tired, and risk being ambushed by monsters or bandits, or you could sleep for the night and risk running into Legion agents.
1121113.title: Do both

choices: Take her with you
Leave her behind
11211131.content: You decide to leave that it would be safer to leave, you'll sleep in an inn. You checked your map and found a nearby village that was a few hours away, at least you hoped that village was still there since your map was a outdated. You then look at Teela and wonder what you're going to do to her. You could take her with you, and have her serve as your bodyguard and she still had valuable information on the Legion that you needed. However, you'd be bringing unneeded attention to yourself and you run the risk of Teela being free from the ring's spell and wanting to exact vengeance so leaving her might be the safer option.
11211131.title: Leave

choices: You arrive at the village with no problem
You run into trouble
112111311.content:
You sighed and came to the conclusion that taking her with you was the better option, Teela was an experienced warrior and you weren't and you would need that expertise on your travel. Plus her information could also help you in your fight against the Dark Empire, a fight you realize you'll need help with.

"Teela, pack up whatever you need quickly. We're leaving."

"Yes master..."

Within a few minutes the two of you were on the road, thankfully the moon was full so it wasn't that hard to see but you were still exhausted. You yawned and then looked at Teela who looked almost like a zombie, she marched forward without saying a word or even yawning once. You almost felt guilty, you were forcing this poor girl to travel with you in the dead of night and she couldn't even complain. Then you realize that she's an agent for the Dark Empire and that she's lucky you even spared her life.
112111311.title: Take her with you

choices: Accept her offer
Decline
1121113111.content:
You almost felt like you were about to fall asleep on the saddle, you closed your eyes and were about to drift off into unconsciousness when you suddenly heard a voice.

"Halt! Who goes there?" It was a woman's voice.

You open your eyes and realize you've made it to the village, a wooden wall surrounded it and you looked up to see a female guard with a torch standing on top of the wooden gate that lead into the village. She had short brown hair and was dressed in chainmail.

"Just me and my bodyguard." You say in a groggy voice. "We come to seek an inn to rest."

"That...thing is your bodyguard?" The woman says, referring to Teela.

"Yes well...it's a long story and I've been on the road since this morning, all I want is a room with two beds. I assure you my bodyguard won't cause trouble."

The female guard eyed you for a second or two. "Our inn is pretty full, but you and your...companion can rest in my home. There's plenty of room I assure you."
1121113111.title: You arrive at the village with no problem

choices: Wake her up
Play with her feet
11211131111.content:
You were to exhausted to decline, you agreed to her offer and she opened the gate for you and Teela. Then she led you to her home, it was a two story house which gave you the impression that she must be someone who's important to the village. Of course you didn't care, all you wanted to do was just lie in bed. The guardswoman led you to her guestroom, it was rather small but it had two beds like she said.

"Here are the beds I promised, you may rest for the night but tomorrow I must speak with you."

"Yeah sure..." You say as you dropped your bags and helped Teela out of her armor. The guardswoman walks out of the room and closes the door behind her. You and Teela lay down on your beds and quickly fall asleep.

The next morning you wake up to the sounds of birds chirping outside your window, you remember that you were to meet your host at this hour and quickly get dressed. You look at Teela and see she's still sleeping, you decide to let her rest and head downstairs.

"Ah, finally awake I see." You turn to the source of the voice and find the guardswoman from last night already sitting at her table having breakfast. She offers you a seat and you take.

"So, let's talk about the obvious. Is that lizard woman really your bodyguard?"

"Her name is Teela and yes, you may no believe me but I explored some Dwarven ruins and I came across a ring that could hypnotize individuals. I saw that I wasn't alone in the ruins so I used it on her...that's not against the law is it...?"

"Our laws only apply to humans, so don't worry."

"Very well then, I don't believe I caught your name miss."

"You may call me Morgan, I'm the captain of the guard for this village."

"You are? But you look so young."

"Hm, indeed. Originally my father was captain of the guard, but he left to join the Emperor's army. Rumor has it they're going to march against the Empire of Darkness."

"Well I pray your father survives, now if that is all I'll just be taking my-"

"That does not conclude our conversation. I have one more question, is your...bodyguard a servant of the Dark Empire?"

"She was, but no longer thanks to the ring."

Morgan looks at you with narrow eyes. "Are you certain she won't betray you?"

"N-no...well she shouldn't."

"Hm...I'm no expert on magic artifacts, but I know someone who teaches at the university in the city of Friedberg. His name is Friedrich Heister, show him the ring and he should give you a better understanding of it."

You nod and return to your room to retrieve Teela, you see the lizard girl still asleep. Her feet were sticking out of the blanket, you needed to wake her up or you could stay for a minute or two to play with her feet.

1121113121.content:
You are quite surprised to see a figure standing about two meters in front of you. It's easy to spot that it's not a human. You are able to quickly realize that it's a young seeming dragon girl with long crimson colored hair. She definitely isn't a fully grown dragon yet, judging by looks she is a teenager, nonetheless despite that appearance she was probably older than you given the longevity of dragon species. There's dark colored armor covering her chest, arms and legs, but it seems more decorative than meant to actually protect. Her feet are only covered by sandals, which gives you a nice view of the top of her feet, and crimson colored sharp toenails. She is also physically clearly much stronger than you, judging from a giant scythe looking weapon she holds in one of her hands at the moment as she stands in your way. She doesn't seem to bear the insignia of the Monster Queen Empire... but you decide it's for the best to be careful anyway.

"Hahaha! You will make a perfect first servant! I've seen how you stole that magic ring from that lizard girl, I can definitely use someone like you!" She says grinning while pointing towards you
"Huh?" You have too many questions after her strange opening line to form a proper sentence
"I see, you must be too mesmerized by my beauty to talk! Good, a servant should admire his mistress." She nods proudly, clearly having a very high opinion of herself
"Who are you? Why would I be your servant?!" Questions finally come out of your mouth
"Hmph, I am Aniralithviel, the future Monster Queen! You are just a simple human though, so I will allow you to call me Anira." She says as if it was the most obvious thing in the world
"Why would a future monster queen just stand in middle of the road like that?!" You say, doubting the truth of her words
"W-well, I am looking to gather army of loyal servants to overthrow the monster queen of course!" Anira says
"And I am just the first of many?" You say, thinking more and more that the fearsome dragon is actually rather childish
"Of course, you should be honored! I chosen you over... 5 other people who were passing by today!"The dragon newt says still looking determined
"Shouldn't you just come back to your parents or something?" You say, just wanting to finish this pointless encounter and go to the nearby village at last
"How dare you?! I am 30 years old already!" The dragon girl puffs her cheeks in annoyance, looking rather funny, nonetheless 30 years doesn't sound too impressive for a specie said to be able to live for at least 800 years...

"Guess you are older than me then." You say rolling your eyes hoping that she will let you pass at last
"Yeah, and for your insolence I want you to massage my feet now!" Said Anira as she sat down on the nearby rock
"Wait what?!" You say barely able to keep up with way that girl's mind works
"You heard me! As my servant you should give me a foot rub now! After that we will make the plan about how to conquer that nearby village!" Said the dragon newt, clearly already considering you her servant whether you like it or not

On one hand... perhaps if you play along she will join you on your journey? She doesn't seem especially smart, so you should be able to easily manipulate her to go wherever you want. On the other hand, maybe you should try out the ring on her now? She is exposing her feet to you, so it might be perfect occasion to control her and possibly get some more information... she said she seen you taking the ring though, it means she might know how it works, and stop you before you finish putting it on. Your only other option seems to be trying to fight her for passage... she might be young for a dragon, but definitely would be a very formidable opponent for you.

1121113123.content:
It takes a few hours of tiring travels on the mountain paths, constantly on the watch for possible surprise attacks of monster girls or bandits, but finally you manage to notice something that looks like a village on the horizon! There are about twenty houses, and an odd large tent like building... maybe some kind of local religious place?

Either way you decide to approach the village, the locals seem to notice you coming as few of them look towards you when you are already pretty close. One of them, an older-looking man starts to walk towards you before you get too close.
"Welcome to our village traveler. Feel free to come to the store if you need supplies, or come to our inn if you need a place to sleep... please try to be quiet however, as it is the Great Lioness' resting time now." The old man said, it all sounded pretty normal until that last part
"The... Great Lioness?" You ask in surprise, never having heard of anything like that
"Yes, the Great Lioness is the protector of our village, and in return we give her tribute in form of our animals and produce. She can get pretty... irritable if somebody interrupts her sleeping though..." The old man explained

"So... it's not some kind of deity, but a person?" You asked, rather confused why would someone have this seemingly near religious reverence in a village
"I suppose outsiders like you would consider her... a lion monster girl? She wandered here a year ago, and offered us protection in return for regular tributes. She has really good hearing too, even better than my wife, and my wife can hear when I'm gossiping about her on other side of the village!" Old man replied and quietly laughed at his own little joke
"That sounds like extortion to me..." You said, having doubts that monster girl would do something like that out of kindness, and deciding to ignore the rather lame joke
"Well, you can call it however you want... but she protected us from multiple bandit or Monster Queen agent raids already. Either way traveler, I hope you enjoy your time here, and don't disturb the Great Lioness." The old man said, giving a quick polite bow before returning back to the village

Despite the warning, your curiosity got the better of you, and you decided to at least see that Great Lioness the old man spoke about... hopefully the locals wouldn't give you trouble as long as you stayed quiet. Approaching the big tent that you assumed belonged to her, you quickly moved the cloth covering entrance to the side and took a look inside..
Sure enough, you saw a lion girl with long blonde hair, lion tail, and a hat made out of a white lionhead(Picture for reference: https://imgur.com/ZnjyoxR )... maybe a trophy of hers? She sat on a throne seemingly made out of animal bones and furs, probably for added menacing effect to those coming in. Just as the old man said, she appeared to be dozing off, and you could hear quiet snoring coming from her... despite sitting on that throne. She also seemed to have a bed on the side... but presumably didn't use it during the day, just so that she could instantly be on her throne if necessary...

It was hard to tell if her protection of the village was all that good or people were just threatened by her into thinking so... as a hero, you certainly could just try barging in and trying to end her reign, but if she really was as strong as she sounded from old man's words it could be a bad idea. Perhaps better to wait for her to wake up and talk to her normally instead?
1121113123.title: A human village! And... a Great Lioness?

"You better have a good reason to bother me, Sur'Kha the Great Lioness, human." The monster girl spoke introducing herself in threatening tone, still sitting on her throne, but her hand grasping the handle of an axe she kept next to it.

Well, now you've done it... this probably wasn't gonna end well for you. If she only wasn't wearing those white boots, you could have attempted to use the ring you had in your pocket... but you clearly didn't consider that when just walking in there like that.
"Well... I heard you protect this village, but I find it hard to believe that a monster girl would do something like that out of kindness of her heart. Are you extorting those people?" You decided to state your reasons honestly, after all that's what a hero would do.

"Ex-tort-ing? Whatever... If you are here for a fight, I'm not gonna deny you that, especially for interrupting my nap!" Sur'Kha seemed a bit confused by the word, considering her tribal look it wasn't too surprising probably... as she got up from her throne, holding her axe

"I'm pretty sure villagers told you it's a bad idea to wake me up from my naps... so now the least you can do is give me some fun by giving me a bit of a challenge!" The Great Lioness smirked as she prepared to attack you!
