"Well... Well...Well.. Are we a really excited? how did you get those shackles up? seems like a monter girl is going to be taught a lesson about lock picking after im done with you" she says while wearing a huge grin across her face.

"Well time for some divine punishment" she says as she gets up from her throne with you still stuck to her sole.
She raises her foot and slams it towards the ground, squishing you beneath it. She grind you with the ball of her foot and forces you to be smothered in between her disgusting and smelly toes.

"Yeah, thats right... more screams... i love it when my toes jam and foot dirt muffles your pleas and screams of mercy" she says while laughing.

As she lifts her foot up in the air, you try to get as many breaths of partially fresh air that you can get before you are trapped again. This cut short as she stomp down again, the process keeps on for some time.
The Queen stomps you with all parts of her disgusting foot, taking in every delight of making you suffer beneath her.

The smell is bad, and all you can taste is dirt and sweat. You cant move your body, you're tired.. sore.. and it feels like you are glued stuck to her disgusting sole. You are stuck with half of your face against the ball of her foot, making the other part of your face able to look into the hall. The Queen is sitting in the throne with her legs crossed causing you to be a visible trophy for all human slaves and monster girls to see.

You are too weak to move, every time the queen wriggles her toes and stretches her foot, you are struck with the pain of being pulled and stretched. You know now that you are probably never going to get off her foot... That is.. unless she decides to rip you off her foot like a piece of tape. Otherwise you will stay on her foot until you are absorbed and withered away from all the usage under her foot.

The Queen laughs as she continues on with the rest of her audiences and meetings. You are no longer a person to her, you are just a mere piece of filth stomped into the sole of her feet.
1122211121321.title: You jump directly into the big and filthy sole ...

choices: The life of a public foot slave.
1122211121322.content:
You tumble into the Queen causes her to gasp in shock, this is your chance to make a run for it.
The whole room is in shock of what has happened, you a mere human was able to catch the Queen of guard how could this happen?

As you land on the floor, you run towards the huge doors of the hall pushing aside all of the lesser monster girls in the crowd. However as you get further towards the exit you can see a certain group of vampire warriors clad in armor storming towards you from the sides of the hall. All while you hear the evil laughter of a devious Monster girl Queen walking slowly towards you while swinging her swords around.

As you get near the exit you are met with the vampire warriors who try to take you down with their spears, you dodge the spears while grabbing a sword from one of the lesser monster girls. You fight your way through the many monster girls and finally find yourself standing in the main courtyard of the fortress. There are monster girls all around you, and they are closing in. The wierdest thing that freaks you out the most is that all of the monster girls are laughing and walking towards you without weapons.

Chills run down your spine as you can seem to find a way out of the fortress, there is no way that you will get through that many monster girls. You take a moment to think and catch your breath, you think about all that you have learned and that no matter what you wont surrender to these... things... no without a fight!

You run towards the group guarding the main gate, you hack and slash around with your blade but every swing is in vain as you are lifted up by a group of orc and goblin girls and then slammed down.
1122211121322.title: distraction, time to escape.

choices: Next the orc leader returns for more.
The tavern closes early.
11222111213221.content:
You wake up to find you unable to move your body.

The smell in the air is heavy and makes you think back on all the trips to the tavern that you made when you were younger. It would seem like you are bound to a table like disk that appears to be "beneath" the table itself. When you try to look you can see an empty stool behind you.

It would appear that you are trapped in a contraption that makes you a public foot slave to all the monster girls that choose to drink at "your table". You try and scream out for someone to help you, but the cry for help is drown in the loud sound of laughter and tavern music.

You look around for some way to escape but it would seem like you are stuck, your thoughts are cut short by you "spinning around so that your head is under another on the other side of the round table. Here your face is met by the sweaty green soles of a tough and brutish Orc woman who calls for the rest of her party of grunts to sit at the table.

The sweaty orc woman looks down at you and commands you to clean her feet, as she has been standing all day having guard duty. " this is the punishment a lowly human like you gets for betraying the great and powerful Queen, to think that such a weak being like yourself.. thought that he could get away from insulting our Queen in such a disgusting way.. i promise you this human... before this night is done, im gonna make sure that you have licked all of my party members feet clean, and if there is even just a little bit of dirt... I'll make it my personal quest to "bless you" every single day with my feet.. I'll make it a deal with the bartender, that you are to be a special table for my party...so you better get to work!" She places both of her sweaty feet upon the lips of your face, waiting for you to begin.

However you are taking to long so she stomps you hard in the face, this makes you realize that this is one of the times where its better to just bite the sour apple, which in this case is "licking the sour feet" and get it over with.

You begin by slowly licking the sole of the right foot, it is sweaty and tastes disgusting. However this might be the only chance to get free of this mess.. maybe if you do it so great that she takes pity on you or something like that? Thousands of thoughts go through your mind as you lick in between the orcs disgusting toes.

Your thought process is paused by one of the other orc girls demanding her turn which causes you to spin around over to her feet. However it would seem like your idea of making the orc girl leader love the way you took care of her feet, in some way did work to a certain degree.

This is further backed up by the Orc leader jumping at the other orc trying to show who is the real leader in their group. It all ends with thunderous and loud foot steps going past your head as the bouncer grabs both of the girls and throw them out of the tavern.

You thank the gods that you were so lucky, maybe this could give you the time you need to find some kind of escape that horrid contraption.

Some time passes and you are still unable to find an escape.
11222111213221.title: The life of a public foot slave.

choices: Stay here for the next customers
Be taken by the Orc Leader
112221112132211.content:
While waiting in the rowdy tavern, you suddenly hear a brutish shout nearby: "There you are, my little foot cleaner!" The orc leader says, with a grunt. You think to yourself, "Oh no, she's back..."

She walks towards you and takes a seat, her feet hanging above you. "They actually threw me and my girls out... Can you believe it? We orcs just wanted to fight a little bit..." She places one of her sandals on your face, with the grimy sole on your mouth.

The orc leader then bends down, and whispers to you: "You know, I hate this place and I hate the owner. No wonder she threw me out. So, I have an idea. I am gonna steal you. But for that, I'll need your help." She grinds her sole into her face, with a bit of force. You grit your teeth as her sandal leaves a bit of dirt on your face.

"I could take you out of here, but you have to promise to be silent and pretend that I purchased you." She lifts her sole from your face. She stands up tall with a confident smile on her face and asks: "So, what do you say? You wanna come with me or stay here? I can see the next customer dying to use you..."
112221112132211.title: Next the orc leader returns for more.

choices: Lie about the tavern and go along with Gorgia!
Leave Gorgia to the bears and be free!
1122211121322112.content:
You think to yourself, "it couldn't possibly be worse than here, now could it?" You nod to the orc lady, "Yes, please get me out of here!" The Orc Leader gets a huge grin on her face, "wait. really?!... REALLY?!"

She stands up and starts fiddling with some locks and chains, "alright! Wow! I didn't expect that, I thought I wouldve had to knock you out or something but you just.. voluntarily want me to take you huh..." Her tone becomes more timid as she undoes a lot of hinges and locks, "well, lets get you out of here then."

The orc lady whistles and her orc friends walk towards the bar, they start making a ruckus and throwing drinks all around. It seems like this was a plan, the Orc Leader then confirms, "while my girls are setting up a chaotic distraction, we're gonna make a run for it. Be ready, I almost got you out..." When she gets rid of the last few locks she looks at you with a friendly smile, "my name is Gorgia by the way, not that matters but, let's go!"

Gorgia pulls your arm and you suddenly notice your whole body is free to move. It's one big chaos, the foggy, busy, rowdy tavern is full of sound and you can hardly see anything as there is a sea of moving people. Gorgia firmly holds ur hand and pulls you through the crowd, you can hardly walk most of the time, but Gorgia's firm grip pulls you through anything. She then reaches the door and rushes outside still holding you. Then suddenly a few bouncers show up, who were just about to go inside...

"Gorgia. Hold it right there!" Three seriously big bear-women stand in front of you, each of them atleast 8 feet tall, topping Gorgia's 7 feet easily. They are all heavily armored while Gorgia only has a sword on her.

"That man, wasn't he property of the tavern?" One of the bear-women grunts at Gorgia. Before Gorgia can answer one of the bouncers grabs Gorgia in a hold, "keep your mouth shut thief, let's ask the stolen goods instead. We're gonna beat you up so badly, you'll never walk again you filthy orc." Gorgia starts to panic and looks at you with a fearful expression... You almost feel pitty for Gorgia, the confident and strong orc seems to broken and afraid all of a sudden...

Then one of the huge bear-woman steps towards you, "hey, you belong in the tavern don't you? If not, we will let you go. But if Gorgia has stolen you, we will actually let you go free you know, we just like having a reason to beat her to a pulp." She crosses her arms, "so, what do you want? Wanna run free while we beat up this orc and chain her in the cellar for some daily punch-bag sessions, or are you going to tell us that you are actually with her?"
1122211121322112.title: Be taken by the Orc Leader

choices: Become Gorgia's Slave
11222111213221121.content:
You think about it but, in the end, Gorgia saved you... You couldn't possibly hand her over like this, she would be beaten up terribly and then tortured in a cellar for God knows how long... Your heart has decided for you, as you answer the bear-woman with a confident stance:

"Property of the tavern?!" You say with an offended tone. "Nonono, I am property of Gorgia, but, there is such a ruckus in there now, so we just wanted to get out of there!" You point to one of the other bear-woman, "Please, leave my master alone! She doesn't deserve to be treated like that!"

One of the bouncers walks up to you with a suspicious look on her face, "well... If she really stole you for herself, I assume you would've just taken the freedom and not pretend that she's your owner hmm... Wouldn't make much sense for you to protect her..." She crosses her arms and signals the other bouncer that's holding Gorgia, "Fine! Off with you two, you better run because we're gonna beat every troublemaker to a pulp in here..." The bear-women leave as Gorgia falls to the ground, coughing as she can finally breathe again. After a few seconds she shakes her head and stands up...

"W-...Why did you do that for me?" Gorgia asks you with a sad tone, her face still full of fear of what would might have happened to her. The 7 foot tall Orc stands in front of you and you answer, "I just couldn't give you over to them considering what they were going to do to you... You saved me from the tavern after all..." Gorgia looks at you with a smile. "Gosh, thank you so much, I didn't think I wuold say this but, I really owe you one for this. Those bouncers are always looking for ways to beat me up and you just... saved my life I think." Gorgia then pulls a chain and a collar out of her bag,"come, let me get you collared so we wont have this misunderstanding again okay? Human guys like you cant walk free in this city. Come on, kneel before me boy. I'll be nice, I owe you one after all."

You kneel before Gorgia and she puts the metal collar around your neck while she holds the chain. "Okay, let's go to my place!"

You walk through the streets of a city unknown to you, monster girls are everywhere. However, nobody seems to be bothered by your presence, since you are clearly Gorgia's slave. After a while you reach a decently looking house, and Gorgia turns around. "Hmm... We're here, come inside!"

You follow Gorgia into her her home, she then asks: "So, the patrols of this city will surely check if I'm using you as my slave or not, so, we gotta play pretend for a while okay?" You nod while Gorgia pulls you towards a wall next to her frontdoor. She pulls a lever and the wall opens, showing you a big open place with a small scaffold on the floor. "Get in there will you, you are going to serve me for a while... I appreciate what you did for me, but, I stole you for this purpose after all so... get in there!"

Gorgia's 7 foot body, full of muscles and her stern look don't give you much choice...
11222111213221121.title: Lie about the tavern and go along with Gorgia!

choices: Another customer shows up...
Gorgia is going to use you herself!
112221112132211211.content:
You move into the hole in the wall, it's dark and seems about 3 feet wide and 8 feet up in length. Just big enough of for you to crawl on your knees. You then place your head in the scaffold and Gorgia quickly secures it. To your surprise she leaves your hands and feet free... But soon enough you realize why.

Gorgia pulls the lever and you see the wall closing, "you are going to be a great piece of furniture, you know. But since I owe you one, I will be nice and not stomp your face to a bleeding mess every day. Instead, you will become a foot-cleaning slave." The wall then fully closes down and only your head is sticking out of it, safely secured in the scaffold. In turn, the scaffold is tightly secured into the wall, leaving your head poking out, open for your Orc owner to do anything she wants with.

"However..." Gorgia says, while walking to another lever, "you are going to earn some money for me too." She pulls the lever and you hear a buzzing noise along with the sound of running cogwheels. Not before long, you realize that the wall, and the entire contraption is turning around. Within half a minute, you are no longer with your head poking into Gorgia's living room, but now you are on the outside of her house, poking out into the streets!

Gorgia then comes out of the frontdoor and walks towards you, she grabs a chair and places a sign above you, "feet cleaning, 10 coins per foot." She sits down on the chair, and looks at you, "you are going to do a good job, or I will kick your face in, clear?" You nod and await nervously for whatever your tongue awaits.

Not before long a monster girl approaches, a big, fat, lizard girl. She does not seem very young and walks towards you on her sandals. You can already see her rugged, sweaty and dirty feet. She walks towards you and takes her sandals off. Gorgia offers her a chair, "10 coins per foot please, you can take as long as you want!" The Lizard lady hands over the coin and leaves out a groan, "finally getting these things washed, they've been so sweaty lately!" The Lizard lady then places her toes in front of your nose, you can just smell the sweat from them as she wiggles them slightly.

Gorgia then shouts, "do I need to remind you of your job here, wall-slave?" You are somewhat shocked by Gorgia's sudden shout and you extend your tongue quickly, licking the Lizard girl's toes. As your tongue drags across her big toe, you can taste the sweat and dirt on her rugged lizard soles. You keep your tongue extended and notice that the lady is taking control. She moves her toes in different ways, making you lick each one of them, every inch of each of her toes. Then she spreads her toes out and has you licking in between them.

She then drags her soles across your tongue, once more you taste the intense sweat, and do your best to swallow whatever you find, keeping your tongue nice and wet for her to clean her feet on. After a dragging her sole across your tongue a few times, she moves to the other foot. Having you start at licking her toes again and then in between them. After a few minutes, your tongue and mouth are full of the taste of her sweat, and it leaves you drooling... The lizard lady then walks off, "thanks a bunch Gorgia, I'll come again..."

Then...
112221112132211211.title: Become Gorgia's Slave

112221112132212.content:
It would seem like the tavern is about to close, which makes you wonder what is happening.. why would a tavern close so early in the evening?

You thoughts are interupted by a pair of purple bare feet which are connected to the body of a beautiful and mesmerizing nightelf. She uses a key to get you out of your prison and leads you out in the back where you are to be chained for the next day. However the Nightelf bartender has some other plans for you, it would seem that you have become famous in the Monster girl capital for your little "stunt" towards the Queen. Now it would seem that most Monster girls would do almost anything to get the chance to keep you under their feet.

The Nightelf bartender switches to her night gown, and lies down on her bed. You are chained to the foot of her bed and collared to a short chain that is connected to an anklet on her right foot.

The Nightelf explains that this is to be your new life, you will be put into a contraption under the bar desk in the day time. To worship the sore soles of your new mistress as she works hard in the bar, and in the night time you will work as her slave at the end of her bed.

You try to get free but it is useless, this might well be the end of your story.

As the first few days passes by, you are uses thoroughly by the bartender, her bare feet always being sweaty and sore from walking around barefoot all day. She takes much delight in stepping on your face while pouring drinks, commanding you to keep your tongue in between her toes as she moans and laughs in pure happiness.

In the first few nights, you are to rub her feet while she sleeps, and if she wakes up during the night and your are not rubbing her feet. Then you are kicked multiple times in the face until you beg for forgiveness and tell her that she is your absolute goddess.

It only takes a couple of weeks before you are completely broken, she doesnt even have to command you anymore. She just shows you the part of the foot that she wants to have licked, sniffed, kissed or rubbed and you go straight to work.

You are so broken and tamed that you litteraly beg her to trample and grind your face in the bar, the same goes with the face kicking in the bed. You beg her everyday and she usually grants you your wish if she accept to do something even more humiliating. Last time you had to be her living foot stool while she clipped her toenails and made you eat them and also thanking her for the meal.

One day, while being trampled in the bar, you tell your goddess everything about the human kingdom, including where the recruitment villages are and how many of the kingdoms forces there is left. This causes the nightelf to smile and laugh at how weak you are for selling out your race.

She decides that she wants to rewards you for having shown such great initative and trust by telling her all that. The reward being that she chooses to do an ancient elven ritual of binding a persons essence to an item. In this instance its a toe ring.

This means that you will always belong to her, and always be beside her. She can shrink you at will and stomp you all that she want without anything happening to you.

The human kingdom is destroyed and you remain the footslave of your new Goddess for eternity.
112221112132212.title: The tavern closes early.

choices: You have a plan! Fight!
She has broken you... Surrender and hope for the best.
You are to slow to choose.
1122212.content:
The vampire leader brings you closer to her, and begins to take a few whiffs of your hair and neck. As if she can smell your fear and your insecurity.

"I dont think i believe your story... your blood smells of.. peasant... it smells.. sweet" she sticks out her long tounge and runs it down your cheek... " your blood... it calls to me... give me one good reason to why i shouldnt just end you right here and make you my undead foot slave for all eternity" she says with a wicked grin.

You wiggle around and try to get free, but the iron grip of the vampire leader makes it impossible to get away. You begin to panic at the thought of being the slave of such a gruesome being as the Vampire leader before you.

You will have to do someting soon, or it will be to late... With all your focus you look around to find something that could help you get away, and you muster up a plan on how to get away, but you will have to do anything flawless and without any delay otherwise you are done for...

The fear sets in... and gnaws at your very bones.... You begin to think that maybe the vampire leader would take pity on you and let you live if you surrender to her now without further resistance..

However if you choose to surrender, you will not only loose all of your dignity and honor.. you will surrender your entire kingdom and race to the gruesome fate of being enslave by the monster girls for all eternity.
Would you sacrifice all of that... to save yourself?

Or will you gather yourself, and try our your plan.. if you suceed you would get to continue your quest... But if you fail.. the vampire leader wont take any pity on you.. and you will probably end up as her undead plaything.

The vampire leader shakes you around and yells at you "Hey! snap out of it human! if you really dont have anything to say then..."

You will have to act now!
1122212.title: She doesn't believe your lie.

choices: Dont have time to look around, you use your newly aquired spear as a crowbar
No way im gonna use my awesome new spear for that, there most be something else.
11222121.content:
Time slows down as you look up at the gruesome and absolutely evil Vampire leader clad in her red metal armor.
No way that this will be your end.... You have a quest and prophecy to fulfil!

Something triggers inside of you as you feel the courage and focus of all your forefathers flow through you. You see a dagger in the belt of the vampire leader, its almost as if it is highlighted to you. In a matter of seconds and without any effort at all, you remove the strong grip from your throat and get a hold of the dagger.

The group of vampire who have a frozen look of disbelief as you take down their strong and beloved leader with such ease. Then finally the first of the group charge you with her spear, which you expertly dodge with ease. You then disarm her and use before mentioned spear to impale her.

You defeat the vampires and leave one of them alive so that you can ask her some questions.
You ask her about the shortest route to the Monster Queens fortress, and about what the Agents were looking for in these abandoned ruins.

The weak vampire tries to charm her, but the powers of your forefathers still run through you. You show her how serious and focused you are, which causes her to barter her life for the information.... You agree thinking that it wont be the end of the world if you let her live.

You get the information about the quickest route to the fortress, and the information about an ancient magical relic that should be hidden somewhere in ruins... Then you let her go.

You scavenge armor and weapons fro the corpses of the vampire agents on the ground.
1x vampire spear
1x patched armor made from parts of the vampire agents armor. ( You cant fit down in a female vampire armor, so you made an armor from some of the parts)
1x vampire dagger
1x 25 gold pieces.

You decide that it would be most wise to search the ruins for the magical relic, and as you leave the room you are struck with a sharp pain and you fall to your knees. You see images of your forefathers who turn their backs and tell you that this was the last time that they could help you... You are on your own for now on, dont disapoint them... Free the human race and win their respect.

You gather your thoughts and move onwards into the depths of the ruins, you get through the many dangerous traps and spells that were placed to repel intruders from getting the relic.

After some hours of searching you find a huge gate made of gold, could this be the room in which the relic is hidden away?

You try to open the gate but it seems like the many years has had its way on the gate... and it is rusted shut..

You could try and use the spear as a crowbar... however it could destroy the spear...

You could also try and look around for something that could be used instead.
11222121.title: You have a plan! Fight!

choices: Tell her about yourself.. and fight
Surrender and lie
112221211.content:
You thrust you spear into the gate so that you may use it as a crowbar. You use all of your might to pry the gate open, it takes a couple of minutes work but you finally get it open.. however your spear is bend and broken, there would be no reason to keep it so you throw it away.

You unsheath your new dagger and move onwards into the chamber... It is dark, however further into the chamber you see a light coming through a hole in the roof... it could be a ray of moonlight. It shines down on a white stone table with some books and tools on it.

When you get to the table you search the books and tools for something usable, you find a piece of stained parchment with some writing on it... it speaks about a crystal shard of bright blue color that should be able to breath life into inanimate objects.. maybe you could use this power for the good of the human kingdom.

You see a word that has been marked in the book.. perhaps this could be some password of some sort... it reads "illuminate".. as the words leave your mouth as you read it.. you hear the sound of rock cracking and moving...

The roof starts to collapse and more rays of moonlight starts to illuminate the dark room. When most of the roof is gone, only one dark area remains... you can hear something crack inside of it and you prepare for what might hide inside the darkness.

You suddenly see some bright blue eyes that shine like nothing you had ever seen before.. Along with the light of the eyes you being to see markings in the same magical color and light that give the shape of a huge woman that is just as high as a pillar holding the piece of the roof...

As the being moves towards you it smashes the last pillar resulting in the dark area being illuminated...

You cant believe what you are actually looking at, I tall and beautiful elf like statue in silver clad armor stands before you. It carries a huge 2 handed sword, and of course to your horror... it is barefoot.

You try and use the password again in hopes that it has a second usage... and you are positively surprised to see the construct fall to its knees at twist around as if it was in pain...

As the statue moves around you begin to notice that its grey stone skin turns to pale skin and flesh... she starts to breath and sounds begin to come out of her mouth as her face is surprised and happy. Her eyes, still as birght blue.. and the markings still appearing, could this be the power of the crystal?

The giantess begins to laugh and cry in a state of pure happiness.... then she looks over to you... grabs her sword.. and moves over to you.

You stand your ground and with a firm tone of voice you ask her about who she is and what all of this is about.

The giantess gets on a knee to get a closer look at you, her huge face striking terror into you...
"What year is this?... I ask since i am surprised that someone doesnt know who i am... Clearly alot of time must have passed since one of my reputation has been forgotten...." she says calmly.

You tried to make out who she could be... but you had never seen any depictions of such a terrifying being..
You begin to fear that you might have unleashed something terrible upon the world.. If this really 30 ft pale elf is indeed a foe.. The it is your responsibility to defeat her.

You ask her again about who she is.. and of what she is..

She gets up to look at her sword... then she begins to tell her story.

"My name is Hildur... I was known through many lands and villages as "The roaming sword"..." she says as she takes one of her hands to her head as if she is trying to remember..." I... I was exiled by my older sister.. the Queen of the monster girls... I failed her.. and my family... i was to protect our mother during my sisters crowning.. but she was killed... i was sent on a quest to find a legendary crystal that legends says could grant life... But as i entered this cavern i was fooled by a couple of annoying.... annoying human bugs who imprisoned me with the crystals power... i have been waiting so many years.. " tears run down her cheek as she looks over to you with a fury in her eyes...

You now realise that your fears had become reality.. you had released an ancient evil...

"Now you know who i am... The real question is... Who are you?... and why would a human ever want to release one so... known as me?.." she begins to smirk.

You blush of embarrassment.. knowing that you have been so incredible stupid and naiv...

You know that there a 2 possible outcomes...

You can tell her who you are... what your quest is... and say that you clearly knew who she was.. and that you released her to challenge her in combat.. however then you would be fighting this legendary champion of the Monster girl Kingdom.

You could also accept that you're not strong enough to fight this monster.. and try to lie to her, that you are a human that has accepted the rule of the monster girls... and that you came because of the legends that you had heard about the crystal and its powers.. and that you would wish those powers to be used in service of the monter girl kingdom.
112221211.title: Dont have time to look around, you use your new...

choices: You stab her in the hand.
You wait and try to trick her.
1122212111.content:
You stand your ground.. you take your daggert and gather your courage.

"I am a hero of the human kingdom, long ago there was a prophecy of a human warrior that would end the tyranny of the monster girl kingdom. I have trained since my village got burned by your lousy and disgusting race of cowards... and now my eternal and sacred quest is to take that magical artifact and use it to kill that foul being that you call your sister"

The giant elf looks at you and smiles... " well... let's see if this so called prophecy is true.. if not... im gonna crush you.. and dragged you all the way to my sister... and then tell her about how the humans try to scheme against us by using ancient knowledge."

She takes up her sword and begins to swing " Do you think you can defeat me with a mere dagger?"

You smile and walk up to her "Ohh im gonna defeat you alright.. and then im gonna take your helmet with me and through it at the disgusting feet of your sister".

This enrages the giantess and she storms you, you decide to use your size and speed to your advantage. The giantess takes a swing, you manage to dodge it and jump towards her leg with the knife. she then kicks you away. Sending you flying towards a wall, you take a second to realise where you are, you quickly roll towards as the giantess sword comes flying towards you going through the massive stone wall that you just rolled away from.

You decide that this is your opportunity so you run towards her she tries to stomp you in the ground but you jump away from her foot and climb her other leg. you plant you knife in her leg in between the silver armor which causes her to try and grab you.
