She puts a collar on your neck connected to a short leash and the you are dragged over to the rest of her vampire siblings.

over the next couple of hours you have been used in all manners of ways, you have been rubbing the feet of the entire vampire group... all of them demanding you to focus on different parts of their feet. You have been licking several of the vampire girls feet clean from all the sweat and gunk that has accumilated on their feet as they have been fighting and traveling for over 1 month. They even take great pleasure in forcing you to smell their feet especially in between their jam filled toes....

After worshiping and cleaning their feet, the leader of the vampire girls pulls your leash so you end up at her legs.
She congratulates you for being such a good slave, and says that she is going to reward your behaviour later in the evening when you are done with your chores... However.. being the slave of a band of vampire does require something special.. Something more than just cleaning a few feet..

The vampires all flock around you while asking their leader if.. they could get a taste of your warm and fresh blood.. They havent tasted warm and fresh blood for days... being used to they rations of human blood on barrels, and animal blood in the worst of times...It is a quite rare luxury to taste the fresh blood straight from the source.

The leader takes a few moments to think about it, however she finally agrees that you are to be their foot slave...AND their portable blood bag... However all of the vampires get very strict orders about not to drink to much of your blood... You are first and foremost the pet of the leader and it is only because of her generous spirit that they get to even get the option to taste your blood.

The vampires all thank their gracious leader who then leaves you over to their care as they bind you to 2 large poles so that you cant resist them... one of the vampires then ask you about where you would want to be feasted from.. You try to beg them not to feast on you.. but they take it as you being a disobedient slave.. and chooses to feast from your neck as a punishment...

They then begin to feast of you, and you end of being almost empty of blood causing you to blackout... you make up to seeing a really angry vampire leader about to punish her sisters... However before she can punish them.. you crawl over to the feet of your goddess and kiss the tops her feet.. This causes her to bow down to help you.. However... being the broken slave that you are..

You tell her that she shouldnt punish the sisters.. you explain that it must have been your fault, as your blood must have been all too sweet for them to handle... you just hope that your goddess can administer the blood the next time... so that your life wouldnt get threatened again.

Your Goddess assures you that it was never the attention to almost kill you.. especially not after all that you have shown that evening. You are carried into the vampire leaders tent, and your leash is connected to the foot of the vampire leaders bed. Your new goddess tells you that your reward from before was have your face pressed against her feet while she slept... However since you were so drained, she would rather have you rest so that you could become well against, your goddess ordered you to sleep with her boots. Because in her mind, the smell of her disgusting souls will help you get well quicker... You do as your new goddess demands... and you go to bed...


Over the next couple of days you are used in all manners of ways... Being forced to worship feet, trampled and kicked to relive stress and being a training tool for the vampires... You are being feasted on.. and if you are lucky you are blessed with being your goddesses personal slave when she seeks "relief" in the night... You are constantly being used as a living fuck toy by the vampires... also by the underlings when your goddess isnt around... They often threaten you and punish you to ensure that you are also to be their obedient plaything.


When you arrive to the capital you have been completely brainwashed and broken by the use of the vampire.
You have become a loyal pet to your new goddess... so much that she finds after some months search.. finds a wierd crystal that makes it possible to make you unable to die.. making you her obedient pet... for eternity..
1122221.title: Submit to your undead goddess. (End)

112223.content:
You draw your sword and rush towards the vampires, cutting down most of them you try to focus their leader.

As you hit the leaders armor your sword breaks, you dodge her attack and pick up one of the dead vampire agents spear and thrust it through the leader. After looting their corpses, you decide that you have had enough of this god forsaken ruin and you run for the entrance.

As you arrive to the entrance you are met with a group of monster girl trolls soldiers. They stand tall, with long arms and huge fangs. You are surprised as to how beautiful the trolls actually are compared to the stories that you had heard... However seeing how huge and dirty their feet are you instantly regret your thoughts about their appearances.

You run towards the troll soldiers, dodging their gigantic arms and clubs. One hit from them and you are completely sure that it will be the end of you. You stab the trolls with the vampire spear, and it all seems to be going well until a troll gets a hold of your arm. You try to stab with the spear however it is too long to handle with one hand, another troll quickly gets hold of it and you get captured.

One of the troll soldiers suggests that they deliver you to their Queen, however she is quickly overruled by another troll who wants you to become their own little slave.


You are bound on your hands and feet and taken to their troll lair, here you are forced to lick their foul feet clean as they feast on unlucky human soldiers from the local outpost. You try to convince them about letting you go but they refuse and decide that you need to be punished for being disobedient.

One of the trolls takes the back of your head and command you to stick out your tongue. In fear of the amount of pain that you will be in if you dont comply.. You decide to stick out your tongue.

The troll then puts forth her giant toes and uses your tongue to dig out all the dirt and toe jam between her nasty toes. You are quickly feeling a bit ill after eating so much toe gunk, you are then throw on the ground and stepped on by the trolls as they go around their business.

It stays like this for days, you are punished and forced to worship their feet all day.

After a couple of years you have been completely broken and live to serve your new masters. One day while licking one of your goddesses feet, you hear the sound of a battle horn outside of the troll lair. The trolls quickly react and begin putting on their armor. The troll which feet you are currently licking, bosses you around and tells you to lick them clean quickly. Then the horn sound comes again and it is closer this time, causing the troll to kick you over and walk on top of you. The troll not realising how heavy she is and how huge her feet are compared to you squashes you completely into her foot.

You try to cream for mercy to your goddess, however all of trolls are occupied with getting themselves over to the army. You feel your body starting to give in to the weight of each step as you become more and more squished into the sole of the troll. Your cries are now completely muffled by the trolls dirty sole, you cant move or do anything other than being stuck to foot of your new goddess.

After some hours of marching a dark elf monster girl marching behind your troll goddess notices that the troll has stepped on something, when she gets the troll to look she laughs out loud as she sees your lifeless mangled corpse completely stuck to her foot. To further the humiliation, she keeps you stuck until you one day wither off her foot.

After the trolls have fought in the great war against the human kingdom, resulting in the monster girls winning without loses. The trolls return to their lair where they feast and enjoy themselves. As your troll goddess sits back and kicks her feet up on a wooden stump, it is revealed that the only thing left of you is your upper body wedged into the crevice in between her big and second toe. Your head is almost fully absorbed by her squishy toe jam.

Game over, you lost.
112223.title: draw your sword. (End)

choices: Run for the entrance and pray that you are faster than the vampires
Stand and fight
11223.content:
You decide that you wont go down that easy, you rush towards the horrifying vampire agents and swing you sword widely in hopes of doing as much damage as possible.
Your sword connects and hits one of the vampires in the face resulting in the monster girl flying backwards with a horrifying scream. The other sisters roar, and rush towards you with their long spears.

You look around and see that this is clearly a fight that you wont be able to win if you decide to stay. You just dont have the equipment to face such opponents yet. You can try and run for the exit, it is in the direction that you are standing.

You could also try and stand your ground and take on the fight.

The vampire agents hiss as they move closer, everything seems like its going in slow motion.

Its time to choose.
11223.title: Storm the vampires!!!

choices: Stay down
Run into the forrest
112231.content:
You run towards the entrance, in a quick instance it would seem that the vampire agents are right at your tail.
You focus on the road ahead without looking bad in hopes that the vampire agents are further behind.
The vampire agents are yelling from behind you and the sound gets quieter and quieter until its completely gone.

At the entrance of the cave you are met by the sight of a monster camp, you decide to jump to some bushes at the side of the entrance. You try to sneak around the camp as you hear the vampire agents storm out and yelling to the other monster in the camp about a filthy human who was trying to escape them.

A search party was then created to check out the nearby areas for any signs of your whereabouts.
You managed to sneak out of the camp and until a field of long grown grass, you thought that the long grass could give you more cover as you moved towards a human outpost in the nearby area.

However as you where about to reach the border of which the outpost where defending, you where shocked to see it currently being invaded by a monster girl army. You quickly fell to the ground and tried to hide from the army of monster girls marching towards the outpost. However a couple of succubus girls clad in gold jewelry and leather harnesses acted like they had seen something over in the bushes where you were hiding.

Its time to make a choice, you can stay down and hope that they havent seen you.
Or you can try to run away into the forrest.
112231.title: Run for the entrance and pray that you are fast...

112232.content:
You believe in yourself and choose to stay and fight.
You stand your ground and try to prepare yourself for the many spears that are going to be thrusted in your direction. You think that with your skills and martial prowess you should be able to defeat these monstrosities.

As the vampires close in, you try and jump to the side to dodge the spears. You are successful and dodge to the side, you think that this is the moment that you have been looking for. So you rush in to take down one or two of the vampires with your sword.

However as you close in and thrust your sword into the leader of the vampires. Your rusty old sword breaks into a bunch of pieces as the Vampire smiles widely and grab you by the throat.
You manage to pull out your dagger and stab her in the side, causing her to drop you.

You dont even get to move your head around before you are pushed to the ground by another vampire.
You try to get up, but the vampire leader stomps you in the face pinning you to the ground. Naturally your fist reaction is to wiggle around and get the filthy vampire foot off your face.

Your mouth gets filled with foot sweat and foot dirt, and your ears are filled with the evil laughter of the vampire leader as the other vampires discuss what to do with you. The leader interrupts them by telling them that you are a threat to the monster girl empire, and by attacking the empires agents you have violated the highest laws of the empire.

The vampire leader can do what she wants to you without any court or systematic judgement.
"You have violated our laws human, and you have caused me and my fellow agents alot of harm" the leader said with a serious tone.

"I have decided that you will be condemned to death by stomping" The leader said while grind her foot around in your face.

You try to yell and scream but you are muffled under the dirty and disgusting sole of the monster girl.
It doesnt take long before the vampire leader adds more weight to her foot, causing you to feel alot of pain.
Then she lifts her foot up and begins to merciless stomp you while the Vampire agents stand around her and count the amount of times that she stomps your face in .

Each time her dirty sole connects with your face you are met with the foul stench of her dirty feet. And of course the pain of your face staring to give away under her strong body. However after a few more stomps the pain has dissapeared, and you cant move your body. All you can do is see the foot coming down on your face and then get raised again. After a few more stomps again, your vision begins to blacken as you fall into unconsciousness.

The last thing you experience s the sound of the vampire leader laughing at you as she moves her feet around while she toys with your dead face.

Then When you are completely gone the Leader adds all of her weight resulting her stomping your head completely flat without anything cracking or breaking. The other vampires then grab your legs and pull your lifeless corpse with them. This corpse will be used for feasting later in the evening.

You have become nothing more than a snack for the vampires, without you to complete your quest and defeat the terrible monster Queen. The human race will surely fall, and the survivors will become slaves to all monster girls in the world.

Game Over.
112232.title: Stand and fight

choices: The priestess was standing in front of it. Was she expecting you?
Nobody was around. Something feels off.
It was in ruins! And something big was lying in its debris...
113.content:
What am I thinking, you thought, I can't so recklessly throw myself into battle just yet. I'm not priest or shaman, gods don't watch over me. I need a blessing from one of them, only then will I be ready to depart on my quest.

There's a certain shrine nearby, which also served as a house of a powerful priestess, renowned across the land as one of the kingdom's greatest monster girl exterminators. She defended many towns and villages from monster attack.Whether you were rich or poor, powerful or weak, smart or stupid, each human life was precious in her eyes, and she would come to your aid. You still vividly remember that one time you were in need of her help.

--------------------

It's been two years since them time our village was plagued by giant footprints that suddenly began appearing on the roadsides near our village. With monster girls being a thing in this world, it's no surprise that people began worrying that they must've been left by one of them. Things got worse when people started finding crushed corpses in those footprints, as well as chewed out human bones near them. The village began sending search parties every night in order to find and kill the beast, but they were never able to find anything. Whatever it was, it preferred dealing with smaller prey.

One evening you were all alone on your farm, the rest of your family had some business to deal with in the village. It's been a normal, quiet evening, until you began hearing some commotion outside. You quickly left your home, a pitchwork in your hand, in order to deal with whatever the problem was. What you saw terrified you.

A young man, no older than you, running for his life, and a giant girl "slowly" following him, laughing all the way. The giantess had a few distinctive features: two long horns sprouting from her head, a long, ginger hair, and soul-piercing red eyes. Her body was covered in some black-striped,yellow cloth, probably made out of a few tigers. Although she was gigantic, her body was in structure similar to a younger human. You knew well that she wasn't young, though. She was an oni, an ancient, horned beast from old myths and legends. Those demons are as old as they're big, and this one was very big.

Your eyes trailed back to the boy, clearly exhausted from all the running. You were debating whether to try and help him, or stay back and protect your home. The inner hero finally won, and you broke into a run. Shortly after you did, the boy finally fell on the ground, unable to move. The oni smiled, her prey finally worn out, allowing her to take a look around the place... And finally notice you.

You froze as her eyes met your own, the blood-red orbs spelling your doom, the sight instantly sucking out all of your bravado. With a sudden jump in energy, you turned around and began running rowards the village, the only safe place around. He heard the giantess laugh in your direction, and a sound of heavy steps, followed by a scream and a wet crunch. Looks like she forgot about her previous victim, and focused on a new prey. Although her steps were big, you were just too far away from her, and the risk of you reaching the village's walls before she cathes up to you was too high. Thus, she broke into a run herself.

The sudden increase in earthshakes made running away very difficult. It would be difficult to stand under those circumstances, let alone run. You quickly fell on your knees and began crawling away. There was no hope of outrunning her in this way, the quakes growing louder and louder. When they were literally right behind you, you jumped into a run once again, only to immediately crash into a giant foot that suddenly appeared before you. You fell on your back, looking up at a smiling face on the oni girl. A cruel smile, to this day still haunting you in your dreams.

The view of her face was quickly replaced by the dirty sole of her enormous foot. The thing was massive, able to easily cover your body from head to toe under just the arch itself if she wished to do it. Instead, she's decided to put your body under the ball of her foot, with your head sticking in between her big and second toe, just so you could see that smile again. She began squeezing it "lightly", putting you through incredible pain. You seriously thought your head was going to burst just from the pressure. Your screaming head an undortunate side effect: some sweat that accumulated in-between her toes found its way into your open mouth, forcing you to cough and gag, and the disgusting taste of the bodily fluid almost making you vomit. The oni found this predicament very amusing, and so instead she stopped squeezing your head, and instead pressed you head into the crevice in-between her toes, slwoly rolling it around, using your still open mouth and hair to clean it as much as she could. When she deemed the job well done, she released your head once again, and move her foot so that you'd be right under her arch. She pressed down, forcing you to scream out loud in pain, and once again take some sweat and dirt into your mouth. She wasn't giving you a break from the pain either, the pressure just kept on building and building. You thought your bones were about to snap, but just as they were about to reach their limits, she let go. You let out a big sigh, taking in the fresh air. You opened to your eyes to great the evening sky, but instead you were greeted by an image that's still burned in your memory.

The oni stood to her full height, easily dwaring you, making you feel like an insect. Her foot was hanging high above, positioned right above your body. This was it, she was going for the kill. You had no strength left in you to move out of the way. You looked her one last time in the eyes, those blood-red eyes. She gave you a wink, and you broke up crying. Her foot fell, this was the end... When suddenly!

A burst of light filled you vision. Though it was bright, it wasn't painful to look at. You were watching as the oni was being slowly vanquished by the column of holy light she was being bathed in. When it finally stopped, the oni was gone, only a small pile of ash left on the ground. Up above it you saw a silhoutte of some woman, hovering in the air. After a closer look you've realized you're looking at the priestess from the nearby shrine, or at least that's who you thought she was. You never saw her in person before, only heard her appearance being described by folks from the village. She was clad in red-white overalls, including a red top with white sleeves, and a red skirt with white wavy patterns on it. Her feet were covered by white tabi.

The priestess landed on top of the oni's remains, skattering her ashes to the wind. You've heard the oni simply impossible to kill permanently, they will eventually regenerate, getting rid of them is only temporary. That day the priestess made one powerful enemy, just to save one soul. You wanted to thank her, to get on the ground and kiss her tabi out of gratitude. Alas, you were too tired to do anything. Your head fell back to the ground as you finally let yourself pass out.

When you woke up, you were back in your bed, your family standing around it, happy that you finally regained consciousness. They asked you what happened, and so you explained them what happened the last night. Their faces went from pure shock and terror to those of relief. Your dad sent two of your younger brothers with a few sacks of our finest corn and rye to the shrine as a way to show gratitude for saving his son's life. A few days later, when your wounds healed and your strength and vigor came back, you were ready to go back in the fields and work off those sacks.

--------------------

Your long reminescing of this event made the trip towards the shrine pass very quickly. You were able to finally see the stone pillars that would then lead towards the shrine itself. You sped up your pace, motivated by the prospect of being guided and strengthened by the gods themselves, and becoming the next defender of those lands. When you finally reached the shrine...
113.title: In need of a blessing

choices: The priestess, looking just as you remember her.
The priestess, but she looks very different. Could she be possessed?
A monster girl!? Here!?
1132.content:
Something was wrong. The shrine, though it looked impressive, felt borderline abandoned. No a soul in sight, no wind howling, no birds singing. This place felt... dead, devoid of life. This, combined with the silence hanging around here made you very nervous. You considered leaving this place, and moving on with your journey, but then your inner hero felt like waking up again. There's a chance that something could've happened to the priestess, and if that's the case, you can't simply leave her. It's at least worth checking around if she's fine.

"Uhm... H-Hello!? Is anyone here!?" You called out in the shrine's direction. No response, as expected. Slowly, you approahed the shrine's main entrance, your hand reaching for the door. Suddenly, you've heard somebody's voice from the other side.

"Oooo, and who might this be? Coming, darling!"

That was't the voice of the priestess. Granted, she never spoke to you before, so it might as well be her... But it just didn't sound right! You backed away from the door, just in case it wasn't her.

Finally, the door opened, and behind it was...
1132.title: Nobody was around. Something feels off.

choices: Open wide, very, very wide, little one.
Refuse, her toe is revolting.
11321.content:
The door creaked open before a wide, icy blue eye peeked out at you, "Oh, so the incantation did work," She said under her breath, opening the door slightly more, just enough so you could see her mouth curl up into a smile, not as warm or welcoming as a smile to a friend but more a relieved smile as if she had found a tool she needed.
"Incantation?" you ask, now intrigued walking up the steps toward her.
She backs away from the door and threatens to shut it, "Not yet, young warrior," She retorts, her voice cold and strong. "I know your face, but are you sure the only you is you?"
You smile nervously, "What?" you ask, the question mark all but appearing over your head.
"'What' is not a sufficient answer, little one."
Confused, you look at her for a moment in silence, "My name is-."
"Not a sufficient answer," She says, more forcefully now.
"What do you want from-?" You ask, worried she may not help you, and getting more and more uncomfortable.
The Priestess begins chanting some strange set of words beneath her breath, you watch as you fidget slightly, unsure how to feel about this meeting.

She opens her eyes to look at you, now glowing an all to familiar red you recognized from your nightmares, her lips forming a terrifying grin, revealing an even more terrifying set of white, sharklike teeth.
You stood, frozen by fear and shock as she grew to the same height you remembered the thing that had tortured and nearly killed you years before.
"Miss me, little one?" She deeply purrs.
You manage to break out of your paralyzed state and instinctually run the other way, not thinking where you were going, not thinking what any of this meant.
She pushed you down as you fell straight on your face in the dirt before she rolled you over with her toes for you to look up at her.
"It's truly remarkable what a little glamour can do, isn't it, little boy?" She said as she pins you to the ground with her disgustingly sweaty, dirty foot, putting your face right where it had been before, right between her big and second toes.
You try to reach your holstered sword but she feels your hand moving beneath her foot and presses down harder, so hard you gasp for breath. You immediately begin coughing and wheezing from the horrid smell. It made you want to vomit, no, it made you want to die, for even death was preferable to the hell that was her foot stench.
"Are you trying to get your sword?" She laughed as her foot drenched your body in her sweat, "Did you honestly think I wouldn't think of that?"
"Your kind ain't known for their intelligence," You taunted, even though you didn't think there was a stigma either way.
Her grin fell a bit before she gradually started to squeeze your head between her toes, "You want me to kill you?" She threatened, increasing the pressure.
You winced and began to cry, but stayed silent, hoping only for it to be over soon, hoping to get away from this nightmare figure and her nasty feet.
"Oh, I get it," She chuckled sadistically. "You want me to kill you... Nope," She said as she relived the pressure.
Now you did begin you cry, this was beyond cruel, she was just going to prolong this for who knows how long. "Please, just kill me," you whimper.
"No," She said simply as she lifted her toes over your face, letting the sweat and dirt drip on your face in the most humiliating, stomach churning way as she wriggled her toes on your face as you winced in disgust.
"No, I think I'll keep you as a foot cleaner. Might as well start now, I imagine the taste of my sweat will remind you of when you were little, hmm?" She said as she pressed her enormous big toe on your pursed lips.
Your heart sank and you thought you might throw up just at the thought of what she was implying.
"Open your mouth, little boy. Clean my big toe," She ordered, her face grinning evilly in anticipation.
You refuse, tears still streaming from your eyes in terror and disgust at her feet.
"Suck my toe, or things will just get worse from here."
11321.title: The priestess, looking just as you remember her.

choices: The giantess kidnaps you! You wake up in her dungeon
You wake up in the nearby forest, in an unfamiliar environment.
113211.content:
You know there is nothing you can do, and that refusing her offer would result in a lot of pain and even death for you. You prepare yourself for the taste, and submit to your new mistress. You open your mouth as wide as you can, barely allowing her massive big toe to enter. "Suck it! Lick it clean foot cleaner!" You do as she says, and suck her big toe while running your tongue all over it. You swallow the dirt and sweat you lick up, despite the unbearable salty taste. You repeated this disgusting process for each of her toes. By the end of it, you felt so degraded and fearful.

She lifted her foot up, freeing you and she stood there in silence, staring at you. You felt so weak and useless. You considered making a break for it to a nearby forest, but wondered if it would be worth it. You started feeling dizzy, and saw the massive figure which you have just finished worshiping muttering something. You faded away
113211.title: Open wide, very, very wide, little one.

choices: The Oni Takes You Home.
PLOT TWIST!
113212.content:
You stare off into space, not wanting to make eye contact with her and trying to convince yourself you were anywhere else but here.
She grins even wider as she wriggles her big toe on your lips, "I was hoping you'd say that," She said before whispering a few nonsensical words into the air. You had no idea that was supposed to mean, but soon that became horrifyingly clear.
Your jaw muscles loosened and soon your entire body went numb and paralyzed. You began to panic, hyperventilate even, which just forced you to breath in more of her foul smelling toes. This must have been some sort of spell.
"You're lucky I didn't break your jaw, I wanted to. But no, we don't want to go too overboard, I gotta save some for later," She said as she played with your jaw, pulling it open with her toe and letting it go, just to pull it open again.
With your eyes, you begged her not to go through with this, and for a moment she almost had a look of guilt in her eyes... Right before going back to grinning and lifting her foot above your face.
"Here we go, little boy," She said as she spread her revolting toes, even more sweat dripped on your face, and in your mouth, making you cringe and retch in disgust.
Another drop of her sweat fell into your mouth as you cried and gagged. All the while she slowly inched her nasty toe closer and closer to your open mouth.
You tried to focus on closing your mouth, on regaining control of your body, but there was simply nothing you could do. But you refused to accept that her grimy, sweaty toe was going into your mouth, you could not let this happen.
But, despite your refusal to accept the grim reality, you could only find yourself staring helplessly as the tip of her toe brushed your lips.
She laughed cruelly, "I want you to dread this a moment longer," She said, stopping just before you were forced to taste her feet.
And dread it you did. So much so that you would have resorted to actual begging if you could speak.
Apparently that moment was enough as she began to shove her toe inside your mouth as you screamed. The moment that your tongue made contact with her toe you thought it would kill you, and it showed apparently.
She laughed uncontrollably above you as she swirled her toe around inside your mouth, forcing you to taste every bit of it. Every piece of dirt, every drop of sweat, it was the closest thing to hell you could think of, maybe even hell was preferable to this.
Her sweat trickled down your throat as you coughed and gagged before she began jamming her big toe in and out of your mouth.
"Clean my toe, little one," She instructed as she fucked your mouth in the worst possible way.
Involuntarily you began to suck her toe as the grime and sweat came off her toe and into your mouth and you are forced to swallow. She laughed at you as she wriggled her disgusting toe on your tongue, you looked up at her and...
113212.title: Refuse, her toe is revolting.

choices: Choose Magic and Suffer
Choose Combat (and still probably suffer)
1132122.content:
The face of the oni changed, going from gleefully sadistic to strangely empathetic and regretful, and then suddenly she was not the one at all, she was the priestess, a huge version, but the priestess nonetheless.
Questions race through your mind as everything changes quicker than your mind could hope to fathom.
Her foot raised off of you, and then your entire reality changed. It was like waking up from a dream, as you found yourself standing before the priestess, right where you had been standing in the doorway.
Questions still raced through your mind as you stare at the priestess with wide eyes.
"My apologies, I, ah, had to explore your mind, to make sure it was really you." The priestess said awkwardly, rubbing the back of neck. "Anyone could have answered that signal I sent out, you understand. And glamours are common among magic users."
"What the hell was that?" You demand, rage seething out of your words as you start to realize what she did.
"Necessary, I'm sorry. In order to make certain that I knew who I was talking with I had to explore your mind. Glamours change the aesthetic of the body, not the soul," The priestess answered, clearly guilt-ridden and understanding of your rage, "If you have any questions, I would be happy to answer them. Anything that will gain your trust. Trust being essential in our relationship, if we wish to achieve our goals."
"Did that have to be that long, couldn't you tell earlier?" You ask, still skeptical and angered with the priestess.
The priestess sighed, "The incantation works as a form of hypnotization, like a dream shared with the spell caster, me, in this case. During this time, you fall into a deep trace, while I remain perfectly conscious, sharing your "dream" from an outside perspective, and in this case, took the form of your tormentor," she said, almost defeatedly. "So time feels much longer for you, your minutes were my mere seconds," She said as she opened the door further to welcome you inside.
You hesitate from entering to ask one more question, "Did it really have to be that scenario?"
The priestess looks down at the ground and then back up at you, "Your mind creates the scenario, not the spell caster, although once made a part of your nightmare, I had to keep up the illusion, if not, the spell would have failed. That and I have yet to master this particular spell, so it was, admittedly, flawed in it's casting and for that, I sincerely apologize." She stared at you a moment longer, conflict in her eyes, "And I am also half monster, and my own desires may have influenced the outcome, but I can assure you, I never meant for... that."
"Your half monster?" You ask.
"Yes, and that is not information I normally volunteer. But for you, it is an offering of good faith."
"How do I know, you are not just using a glamour?" You ask one final question before making your decision whether to follow her or not.
"Can you read my thoughts?" She asks, showing a bit of impatience.
"It's not likely," you shrug.
"Well, your just going to have to trust me," She says, beckoning you to enter the temple.
You sigh, you know you hadn't come all the ways up here to just walk away. You decide to follow her inside.
The door closes shut behind you as you stare up at the large cathedral ceiling and intricately carved statues.
"Before you ask the obvious," The priestess begins, glancing over her shoulder at you, "I am half oni, but I maintain human form due to a combination of magic and genetic "defects". And I decided to become a priestess after witnessing first hand the horror the monsters inflict on the humans."
"Is that why there are no other priests or priestesses up here with you?"
"Yes, it is also why I am not formally trained. I knew in most places I would be killed on sight unless I could figure out a way to blend in. So, when I came up here on this mountain, I found this temple, ruins overrun with wildlife when I first came upon it, but full of knowledge. I used this knowledge to teach myself to use magic, now I use this wherever I can, to help whoever I can," The priestess said as you and her walked through the halls.
"I am also sure your wondering why I would send for you, a lowly village boy. What could I possibly need from you?" She asked.
"May have crossed my mind." You reply.
"There is a task I need done, one you have an infinitely better chance of pulling off than I. But I knew you wouldn't stand a chance charging off into the unknown in your state, you'd be nothing but a piece of meat among wolves," She said, chuckling a bit.
You feel a bit insulted as-.
"Don't even start in feeling that way, I was just going to tell you that you have greatness, er, the potential of greatness. But charging off blindly would just be a waste, one far too many make. And after what happened when you were young, well, I feel a bit responsible for you. So, I want to start you off right."
"And how is 'right', exactly?" You ask.
She turns around to look at you as you come to a fork in the halls, "Depends on you," she says as she begin to point to the right hall. "That way is the arena, I can teach you in the art of combat, and before you tell me that you know how to swing a sword, let me tell you that I've watched you train and in a real fight you'd more likely hurt yourself than any foe."
Once again, you are insulted, but really, the more you think about it- on second thought-, no she really was right.
"On the left is the mage tower and library, I can teach you to use magic and can enchant you and your weapons, armor, exedra. But-, let's just say, you won't like what some of that entails."
"Why, what does it entail?"
"To learn fast, like you need to. Pain, disgust and fear, a lot of pain, disgust and fear. And trust, I'm big on that."
You wipe your hand over your face, "It's just lie one of those 'choose your own adventure' books," You lament.
1132122.title: PLOT TWIST!

choices: Rest Before Shitstorm.
Just DO IT!!!
11321221.content:
One sardonic thought crossed your mind as you realized each path was to entail quite a bit of suffering: "Why choose the lesser evil?" And as stupid as the thought was you knew that, while the reasoning was skewed and more or less just your own ironic edgy humor acting up after a (hallucinated) traumatic event, the result would be the same.
"Hmm," The Priestess hummed, looking at you, "You want to learn magic, I had not expected that."
"I was actually still thinking on it," You reply, starting to consider combat.
"Trust me, I can tell you will choose magic."
You sigh, "Okay, fine, what will the training entail?"
The Priestess turned walking further down the hall, her white robes trailing behind her, she wordlessly motioned for you to follow, "You will not enjoy it. And for this reason, once you say yes, there will be no backing out, because you will try, and if I allow you to do that, you will not receive any power. So, as final confirmation-."
You stop in defiance, knowing she's avoiding the topic, and at this point you feel a bit like you are being coerced into something you don't fully understand, "No, you tell me what the hell you plan on doing to me before I consent to anything," You say firmly... The was before a wave of fear came over you as the woman, clad fully in white turned around to look at you, a bit of frustration in her icy eyes.
"I understand your skepticism, boy, but I was the one that saved you from being stuck to Titania's foot when you were a child, and whatever that involved, so I don't think a bit of trust is too much to ask."
You considered her words as you stared back at her. But before you could say anything, the Priestess' expression softened and she began to speak once more, this time quieter and less frustrated.
"... But I gave you a choice, and the notion of freewill is meaningless of you are not properly informed," she said with a sigh.
The Priestess walked up to you, almost uncomfortable close, "Time is a commodity we do not have, you do no have. And magic, the kind that you use in the field, not in a temple, takes years to learn, traditionally that is, far longer than the human lifespan. So to get around this, an alternate path to the arcane had to be made, but like I said, it's not pretty... And you can wipe those fears from your mind I can promise you that you won't be losing any appendages," She says with a slight chuckle before returning to her more cerebral nature. "No, it involves the fears or phobias of the learner, not just like a person with arachnophobia holding a tarantula either; prolonged exposure, periodically over a very long time"
"So, does it involve overcoming one's fear?"
"No, it involves experiencing fear, and engraining that fear into a person's mind so deep it will-... Yeah, you get the picture. And considering Titania already managed to plant the seed for that fear, and then there was that incident out there, no telling how far we will have to go to push it further, but while it will be harder, it will be quicker."
"So you're going to throw me to a bunch of monsters and let them torture me?" You ask, cringing slightly.
"I'm going to periodically read an incantation to imbue you with magic, while I carry out the torture..." The Priestess said as she reached down to unzip her boot before you could hardly process what she was doing. "Just so you get an idea what this will be like," She said as she popped her foot out of the white boot.
The horrifying stench clouded your senses immediately as her sweat literally dripped to the floor from the tips of her large toes. You gag on the stench as you question how and why, such an inconceivably angelic figure would have such feet.
"I told you, just because I'm on your side doesn't mean I'm not still a monster," She said as she spread her foul toes, allowing her toe jam to ooze from the crevices, your eyes began to water at the smell and your mind race as you realized what she was going to do to you.
"It's been so long," She laments under her breath almost orgasmically, and so quiet you could only barely make out what was said.
You look back up at her and for a split second she had a slight, sadistic smile as she stared back at you before snapping back to her more sensible side.
"I really am sorry, if I could pass this task to anyone else I would," She says regretfully.
You sigh while you nod your head slightly, now knowing what this meant, cringing all while you accepted.
"I do hope we can still be friends though, y'know, outside of our sessions," The Priestess says awkwardly, "Just try to think of me differently when I'm-, okay?"
***If you, on the off chance decide not to pursue this path, just refer back to the previous chapter.***
11321221.title: Choose Magic and Suffer

choices: Little ghost, little ghost. One I'm scared of the most. Can you guess?
LESSON TIME, KID!!!
113212211.content:
Fortunately, the Priestess had some mercy and allowed you get settled in a room within the temple and get some rest after everything you had been through, before putting you under her feet. Unfortunately however, was the place you were put; the basement. The dark, dank, basement. Even worse, it seemed to be some sort of prison, even worse than that was how large the cells were, it didn't take you long to deduce what these cells were made to hold. But even as large as the room was, you felt a bit claustrophobic, and that may have to do with the lack of bars and more in line of big metal doors with a little circular window. It felt like solitary confinement.
"You don't have to worry, kid, I cleared out the monsters and creepy crawlies down here ages ago," Said the familiar voice from the doorway of your cell/room.
Your turned as you prepared your bed, slightly startled, and then even more startled when you saw the Priestess' eyes giving off a faint blue glow on the shadows, fortunately though she had put her boots back on.
"I am sorry you have to be down here though, it always freaked me out a bit down here. But, it is the safest place to be," She said with a sigh, "It is for this reason, I have decided to accompany you down here."
You look at her a moment, she looked at you with a sort of kindness not unlike a mother gives a scared child, and while you appreciated this kindness, you didn't want her to think of you as a lamb that must be babied. "You mean, you'll-?" You asked, motioning with your eyes to the bed, an awkward look your face.
The Priestess looked from you to the bed before giving a warm chuckle, "No, that's not what I meant. I'm going to be down the hall a few blocks, so if you need anything just knock," She said, seeming to try and give a reassuring smile, but from the shadows where she was, and considering her teeth and lips seemed to give off a slight glow with some sort of magic as well, she just seemed creepy. And she seemed to notice your disconcertion and in her attempt to lighten your view of her she changed her expression to a more playful one, but she looked even creepier, like a predator stalking it's prey through the dark.
"And if I, y'know, hear anything over here, I just wanted you to know I won't shame you for it or anything. I understand people have urges, I mean how do you think I stayed up here so long without going crazy?" She continued, never breaking eye contact.
The more she talked the more you felt really uncomfortable.
"In fact if you want maybe I could come over and help-..." She continued, stepping out of the shadows toward you before pausing and really looking at your face. She gave a forced giggle, "Um, that was a joke. Why are you-...?"
As soon as she said that you did the first thing you knew how to lighten the tension, "Oh, haha, now I get it. Ha ha ha!"
The Priestess paused as she watched you spare her the continuing feeling of awkwardness, "Yeah, see, I've got a sense of humor," She said with slightly less forced laughter.
You went back to setting up your room as you carried on the giggling comically long, "Seriously though, you don't need to move down here with me, I'll be fine. I mean, I don't want to-..."
The Priestess looked at you more troubled now, "Kid, I just can't stay up there in my cozy bed knowing you're down here, especially considering everything I'm going to have put you through," She said, her voice quiet and full of guilt.
You nod your head slightly, feeling a bit of pity for the Priestess. This wasn't going to be easy on either of you.
The Priestess looked back up you, a bit of forced playfulness returning, "So instead I've decided to stay in my cozy bed down here... That was also a joke," She said smiling toward you. "G'night, kid."
You give her a small smile back as she closes your door.
Then, you realize that this was a prison cell and she just shut the door-.
"I removed the locks," The Priestess yelled from down the hall, putting you at ease a bit.
You climbed into your hammock and produced a book on magic you had picked up from the temple's library before putting out the gas sconce above your head and going to sleep.
But during the darkness of sleep something happens... ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) <— Pay no attention to Lenny.
