choices: She cleans you up and puts you back to bed (NICE SIDE)
"I want to play a game." (OBVIOUS EVIL SIDE)
11321221121.content:
You are surrounded by waves, waves of air and noise in the light. You feel the colors blue, white, and black as you float as nothing through nothing. It was like-.
Squeak. Squeeeak.
Your mind started to return to reality as the quiet but still sharp sound of rusty hinges echoed in your skull.
Clink. That sound was unmistakably the sound of door closing.
It took a few short moments for your physical body to start to respond to your mind's commands and once it did, you opened your eyes to nothing but complete crushing blackness. There was an all to familiar, foul smell in the air, and a weight on your chest.
As you realized what was happening you felt something lightly trace across your lips with an unnerving giggle, your eyes went wide, you clenched your mouth shut and bolted up.
"That ain't gonna save ya, kid," The Priestess said with a chuckle as she pushed your head back down into your pillow by lightly stomping your face with her huge grimy foot.
She reached up and flicked on the gas light, revealing her form. She was a fairly small oni, standing over you at around 12 feet tall, but still enormous to you, with two small horns sticking out of her long and wild white hair. Covering her was a white, torn, translucent gown, which also served to hammer home the dissonance of a monster torturing you while looking like an angel. Her skin was so pale it was almost luminous in the darkness, and now that she was fully transformed, her eyes mouth, and even her nails really did glow.
You stared up at her from beneath one of her massive soles as she wriggled her sweaty toes over your nose, almost drowning you in her foul toe jam and stench.
The Priestess grinned widely down at you, and that was enough for tears to start welling in your eyes under the weight of the torture and extreme terror.
Then she lifted her foot to inspect your face and stared at you a moment before giving a girlish but unmistakably evil laugh, "There's my fucking footprint of sweat on your face," She said between laughing hysterically.
In your mind you asked yourself how such a woman you had known could be so-, so evil. This was the woman who had saved your life from something like this, she had been kind, almost motherly even. But now she was some kind of nightmarish torturer, not just doing what had to be done, but enjoying it and going as far as to humiliate you.
The Priestess continued laughing before lifting her foot over your face again, the sweat and grime dripping on your face from the tips of her blue glowing toes, "Oh well, I suppose I should probably get on with the incantation," She said with a sigh.
"You've not been doing that-?!" You scream.
The Priestess planted her foot back on your face, again drenching you in the filth of her soles, "I think I'll enchant you with increased durability and endurance first, it'll enhance your physical form," She said, running a finger down her jaw. She laughed again, "Well, if you thought endless exercises were brutal, this is how you get fit..." She grabbed your face with her toes, leaving you to scream in the suffocating prison of sweat and toe jam, "... The bad way," She quipped before releasing your now sweat-drenched face.
You laid back choking on the stench as you desperately attempted to catch your breath, the smell was so thick around your head now you could cut it with a knife. As you breathed and gagged on the smell of the Priestess' toes you found yourself beginning to pass out, your vision was distorting and going dark, and your reality started to shift.
"Oh, no you don't," The Priestess said with a bit of panic as she "lightly" slapped your face with her foot.
Even as your mind started to slip you could still feel the waves of magic hitting you, forcing you back to the horrifying reality.
"Sorry kid, but if you go unconscious, this is all for nothing, I really don't want that," She said as the spell brought you wide awake again.
You looked up at the Priestess, and even as she held you beneath her feet, her face seemed to spell compassion and guilt once more- before morphing back into once of gleeful sadism.
"Alright, kid, I'm going to start but first, I'm going to have you open your mouth," She said tapping her big toe on your mouth, and already you could feel the sweat coating your lips.
You shake your head, knowing she will take any chance she can get to drive her toes in your mouth.
The Priestess grits her teeth impatiently, "I said; OPEN WIDE, KID!" She says as she painfully shoves her big toe into your mouth.
You sob pitifully as she begins the incantation. The Priestess' toe got to know every single tastebud in your mouth, swirling it around as you drank down her foot sweat.
You try to focus on the goal, but this is too much, and just plain cruel, and you knew under no circumstances would she stop. You bite down hard on her toe, but it does nothing but scrape off more grime for you to swallow.
The Priestess smiled down at you as you attempted this, "I should make you do that all over my foot, give it a real deep clean," She said with a chuckle before forcing her other four toes into your mouth as well.
Now, your jaw felt like it was going to break as she wriggled her toes on your tongue. You almost forgot that the dirt and sweat, or even the stench wasn't the worst thing in store for you. It was the toe jam, and now that all five toes were in your mouth you could start to feel it ooze onto your tongue.
"No! No! No! No!" You try and scream as you flay around, trying anything to escape before you really taste it.
"Oh, you wondering what my toe gunk tastes like?" The Priestess says, making your heart drop in horror.
You sob, violently shaking your head, begging her not to do what you knew she would.
The Priestess grabs hold of you tongue with her nasty toes. Now, you got the full effect of the foul substance as it covered your tongue. You screamed as best as you could due to the overload of nastiness.
The Priestess laughed as you tried in vain to pull your tongue back, then she kicked it up a notch by running your tongue through the crevices of each of her toes, making you lick out all the sweat and toe grunge there.
At this point all you could do is cry in despair as you were used, as you were made to suck and swallow the filth.
The Priestess seemed to note your despair and resignation with a curious tilt of her head, but you were sure she was more concerned with the lack of fear now. She even wiggled her toes inside your mouth and shoved her feet further into your mouth to get a reaction. And she did, but nothing on the level she wanted.
The Priestess pulled her toes out of your mouth before inspecting her now clean toes, "It's been ages since I've had a proper foot worship session like that," She said, finally moving off of you. "The effects of that incantation should take effect by tomorrow," She said before turning to look at you, "Oh yeah, I gotta thank you for that, kid. And, I'm also sorry," She said with a mix of sadistic joy and compassionate shame before walking toward the door.
11321221121.title: MONSTER (Becoming a Wizard... The Hard Way)

choices: "Under the bed? Really?" (Into the Boots)
"Can't believe I still can't cast a light spell. Now where's that lantern."
113212211212.content:
The Priestess turns around to you just as she was going to leave, a huge smile on her face, "Actually, I think I want to play a game with you," She says with glee.
"Oh no," You say with your voice cracking a bit as, just when you thought the nightmare had ended, you were being dragged back in.
"No?" She asked mockingly, walking toward you, uncomfortably close as she leaned down to you, asserting her power over you. "You should be happy, you're getting what you wanted, you think the kind of power you came up here for will come easy? Did you expect? You think the monster out in the wilds will be so kind as to simply lie down for you?" She yelled into your face like a drill sergeant before grabbing you by the neck and throwing you to the ground.
Her grip, nor the landing all that painful, but her sudden outburst was frightening. You stare up at her as she shoves her other, still horrendously filthy foot over you, effectively pinning you below her.
"I should see if we can squeeze in another incantation right now," The Priestess said as she spread her toes and the toe jam began oozing over your face as you wretched and heaved in disgust.
"But that would be boring," She said as she lifted her foot off of you.
The Priestess moved across the room from you, her dirty foot leaving prints of filth on the floor, she turned back around toward you, "You should go hide," She said, pointing her toe at you, "This temple is huge, you should have no problem staying hidden until morning."
You shudder at the idea of playing hide and seek with this woman, in a dark, seemingly infinite series of ancient rooms and hallways.
"But if I catch you, guess what I'll do?" The Priestess says excitedly. "I am going to shrink you, and put you in my boot for the morning. Believe me, hell could not compare," She said with a cruel laugh.
You stared back at her, wide eyed, you did not want to find out what the inside of her footwear was like.
"Run," She whispers, her grin growing unnervingly wide.
You bolt up off the floor and almost trip over yourself down the halls of the basement before heading up the stairs into the main floor of the temple. As you ran out into the larger than life halls, any sense of exhaustion was lost on you. Maybe it was the endurance incantation working quicker than expected due to the trauma, or maybe it was the images of The Priestess' grimy, sweaty feet flashing in your mind, and the thought of what being inside her boots would be like that worked like a horse whip.
What concerned you more than running out of steam was the fact that your footsteps echoed loudly through the halls as you ran across the pale moonbeams that shined through the ceiling.
You looked behind you as you ran, even though you knew that not looking behind you was practically the first rule of running away from things. But there was nothing but a dark, empty hall behind you. You turned forward again before rounding a corner. You weren't thinking as you turned, and only after the point of no return did you think that around sharp corners is one of the stock places to hide.
But there was nothing, just an empty hall, again.
You sigh in relief as you look around for a way out of the hall.
"Fee fy fo fum, kid," The Priestess's voice calls out from behind you.
You freeze and look behind you. She wasn't on the same hall as you, but she was definitely on the same level, and approaching, thought rather slowly judging by the speed of the footsteps, and... yep, it sounded like she had her boots on.
Quickly thinking, you ran past a door next on the side of the hall and pulled it open before slamming it shut, only for it to slowly creak back, leaving it slightly ajar. You then quickly hid behind one of the many large pillars that lined the halls further down.
And behind the pillar you breathed as quietly as possible as you heard the footsteps approaching down the hall.
Click, click. Click, click. Click, click.
You shook with fear behind the pillar as she walked behind it, your hands came up and covered your mouth and nose to prevent your heavy breathing to be heard, as you waited for her to leave.
Behind the pillar you could hear the Priestess humming to herself as she walked through the doorway, even going as far as to lock the door behind her, thinking she would have you locked in.
You waited a few moments, still not comfortable with really trying to catch your breath as you heard her tear the other room apart searching for you.
After a few short seconds more you sneakily snuck over to the other side of the hall to find another door. You found a large set of double doors fairly quickly and, as quietly as possible you opened the door and crept inside.
You found yourself at a stairwell, and deciding that the Priestess would probably think you were on the same level you decided to head up to the top floor, the attic would probably be the best.
Eventually, you reached the end of the ascent at the third floor, careful to always be on the alert for the Priestess coming up behind you. But that was the advantage her wearing boots to intimidate gave you, you could be quiet while she could not.
You opened the door to the top floor you doubted if it was the attic though, and to your surprise you were in a tower that had been fashioned into a bedroom that overlooked the entire mountain and the plains below that.
Looking out the window you could see the lights from your village and off in the distance you could see the faint glow of the city of Galdran on the horizon. No wonder The Priestess always knew when your village needed aid, all she ever had to do was look out her damn window.
And as if the very thought of her beckoned her to you, you could hear the distinct clicking of the Priestess' high heeled boots coming the stairs. Panic started to set in as you frantically looked around the room for a place to hide.
Under the bed, maybe. Yeah, you might as well climb into her boots yourself, that would be the first place she'd check.
But as you looked around the room more, and as her footsteps got closer and closer, you realized you were out of time, and out of options. Under the bed it was then.
Opening the door the first thing you saw from under the mattress was her white boots, now much larger than the last time you had seen them due to her now 12 foot tall form. You once again held your breath as she began to search the room.
113212211212.title: "I want to play a game." (OBVIOUS EVIL ...

choices: Under Her Heel ("Cleanest" but Most Painful Area)
Under Her Toes (No Pain but Very Nasty)
1132122112121.content:
The Priestess girlishly giggled above you as she kicked off her right boot. Even as quick as the smell of her foot clouded the air around you, the dread hit you quicker, the moment that you heard her giggle, you knew you were fucked.
"I can hear your breathing dow there, kid," The Priestess said as she stepped toward you, her right foot making a disgusting squishing noise every time it made contact with the floor.
In panic you quickly crawl out from under the bed in an attempt to put some distance between the two of you.
Instead you felt the Priestess' foot step onto the back of your head, holding you in place at the floor, "You played a good game, I'll admit I even had to use a few sense heightening spells to find you. I didn't think I'd have to use that. And even then you lasted a lot longer than I thought you would," She rambled as you struggled to remove her foot as her sweat trickled down onto your face.
"I'll make sure to give you a useful enchantment while you're in my boots, I'm thinking...-" The Priestess said, wriggling her toes before you felt a slight decrease in pressure.
You knew this was your moment and with a burst of adrenaline you took it without hesitation. You reached back and grabbed hod of her ankle before twisting it just enough for her to lose balance.
The Priestess stumbled back, her glowing eyes wide with sudden fright as you crawled to other side of the room, "Good one, you're just full of surprises tonight!" She said with an unnervingly aroused grin.
You wordlessly picked yourself up off the floor trying to keep the bed between the two of you, your heart beating in your ears as you tried to think you way out of this situation.
The Priestess glowered menacingly at you, her eyes shining through the strands of hair that hung down over her face. Never breaking eye contact she reached down and picked up her boot, "Tell you what, kid, if you can get past me and back out that door, I'll let you loose. But if I catch you, and, let's be honest, we both know I will, I am going to leave you in my boots for at least until..." She said, looking back at the clock as you followed her gaze, "Until 7:00 in the morning I guess," She said casually.
That was going to be around 6 hours, and you knew that was going to be 6 hours too long to be under her feet.
You reached over and grabbed a small clock on the nightstand and held it in throwing position, ready to pitch it at her before you made your dash behind her.
The Priestess pulled her boot back in a similar position, and as you panicked and decided to throw the clock as well, she decided to throw her boot as well.
Almost instantly everything went dark for you as your body fell backward onto the floor, and as soon as you took a breath you realized you head was inside her boot. You coughed and gagged on the stench in the darkness as you reached up to pull the boot off of you. But before you could you felt The Priestess' body fall on top of you
"Nice arm!" The Priestess exclaimed as she pulled her boot off of your head, revealing her batshit insane face. But instantly you noticed a small bit of blood coming from her mouth where you assume the clock hit her.
"But now, I gotta punish you for that," She said, "Yeah, not only are you spending the next several hours in my boot, your mouth is staying open as well," She said with a loud howl of laughter. "And you know what that means."
You began to cry, but you knew this was a losing battle to fight her, so in desperation, you tried to appeal to her humanity, "Please don't you scream," you're voice cracking under the weight of despair.
The Priestess looked at you with glee as she stood up over you, pinning you beneath her sole, "Oh beg some more. I love how you cry beneath my nasty feet," She said as she reached down her underwear and started to moan an incantation.
With that you started to get smaller as her foot got bigger and bigger until your whole body was beneath it, and you knew that whatever humanity she had before was gone now, she was fully a monster.
As soon as The Priestess thought you were small enough to fit comfortably (for her) in her boot she stepped off of you and held you in front of her face, "Before I debilitate your jaw, I want to hear you beg one more time for me to spare you," She said, a sadistic twinkle in her eye.
"Fuck you," You blurt out.
The Priestess laughed, "Keep talking like that and I might put you down there so you can do it yourself. In time, I probably will," She said before saying a few magical words to open your mouth and then dropping you down into her boot.
Before you even hit the sweaty insole with a nauseating squish you were inhaling the paralyzing footstench inside the foul chasm. You stood up and realized with disgust that you nearly stuck to the soaking insole. And this was up on the heel part of the high heeled boot, and you could not help but dread what it was like down in the toe area.
"Her comes my nasty foot," The Priestess said with a chuckle as she lowered her foot down into the boot, her toes wriggling in excitement as she stared into your frightened eyes.

Where do you end up beneath her foot?

Under her heel you will be painfully smashed and ground into the insole (You cannot be crushed while shrunk), you will likely be eating dead skin and dirt.

Under her toes will be fairly painless (unless The Priestess decides to squeeze you between her toes), but you will be swamped in footsweat and will probably be eating more toe grunge than you ever wanted to.
1132122112121.title: "Under the bed? Really?" (Into the Boots)

choices: Join The Priestess for Breakfast and See what She Has to Say.
THE GREAT ESCAPE/RUN, READER, RUN!!! (I couldn't decide)
11321221121212.content:
As her foot descended on top of your shrunken form The Priestess flicked her toes to knock you down into the ball and toe area. You fell onto your back with a slight splash of foot sweat.
You moaned in disgust as you dragged yourself through the 1 inch (to you) layer of foot sweat to the end of the boot to maybe at least spare yourself the horror of being caught beneath The Priestess' toes. But you were too late as her wriggling toes quickly slid over you as your mouth was held open by some terrible magic, all you could do was scream in terror and revulsion.
The inside of the boot would have been completely dark if for the light radiating off of the Priestess' toe nails that allowed you to see up close the unholy torment that was to befall you. It was just like being under her feet before but this time the stench was magnified 100 fold and when her sweat and toe jam oozed over your face and into your mouth, it covered your entire head.
As you were forced to drink The Priestess' foot sweat and eat out the toe jam from the crevices between her toes your body began to convulse and spurt and sputter as the tears ran down your face. You gagged and coughed, and you didn't know why you did not vomit, but you guessed that the only reason you were not throwing up, blacking out, or even dying from the smell and taste of her feet was some sort of magic she was imbuing you with.
You could feel the Priestess sit down, even though she kept the pressure of her toes on your face on as she forced you to lick underneath and between each of her toes, the stomach churning taste in you mouth making you sob in despair.
Then you heard her start to moan an incantation, and you knew exactly what she was doing, "Cry for me," She purred as she scrunched and kneaded your head under her toes, drowning you in her foul sweat as she rubbed her toes over your face.
This continued for several minutes as the Priestess moaned along with your cries inside her footwear, until you felt her shake and shudder as she finished the incantation. "Fuck! Titania may be a bitch but she sure knows how to have fun!" She exclaimed. "You can go ahead and blackout now, but I think I'm just going to keep going," The Priestess said before she lifted her toes over your face before trapping your face underneath her big toe as she forced you to lick the grime from it.
After whatever magic bind to reality was severed, it was not long before you drifted off into blackness.

For hours you remained just vaguely aware of what was being done to you, that was until you awoke to the sound of the Priestess' soft, sprightly humming and, to your horror, you were still trapped under her toes. But seemed different, for one, you were seemed a bit larger, enough so your legs were down on either side of her heel and your head was still beneath her toes. And also, it appeared either you were large enough, or the Priestess was now small enough for the tip of her big toe to be inside your mouth. And when you looked over you noticed that the only light down in the boot now was from what looked like a giant glow stick that cast a greenish light.
You groaned and shook your head as you tried to spit out The Priestess' toe.
"Oh, you're awake," The Priestess said, her voice back to being what you had come to expect from her, without the taunting madness and sadism that had rang in her tone hours ago. And you would have thought she was back to normal if not for the fact that you were still being kept under her feet.
The Priestess pulled her toe out of your mouth as she continued humming, "I'm sorry about last night, but I do think you'll be happy with the effects of the incantation," She said with obviously feigned professionalism.
You wanted to burst out screaming at her in anger but unfortunately your jaw still wasn't working.
"It's only a few minutes to 7:00, I'll let you out then," She said with a slight shift of her weight off of you.
Shit, she really took that schedule seriously.
Over the next several minutes it seemed The Priestess' toes were either trying to rush into your open mouth, squeeze your head beneath them, or cram your face into the filth between them. Needless to say, it was a long few minutes, but it wasn't any worse than anything else you had endured.
Above you could could feel The Priestess begin walking as almost every step had accompanying it the unpleasant sensations of having the breath stomped out of you, and one of her toes jamming into your mouth.
"I made breakfast," The Priestess said, wriggling a toe in your mouth, "I'm just going to take you to the shower and get you back to normal size. Or I mean, I could just keep you that size, you'd certainly be easier to hide if trouble were to come by," She mentioned, sending a bit of fear through you as you considered being held captive by this crazy woman. "But, on second thought, I think you've proved yourself fairly adequate in combat. I underestimated you once, I don't make the same mistake twice," She said cheerfully as you heard a door open. "My mouth still kinda hurts, still, I think the clock took the brunt of it," She added under her breath, reminding you of the clock incident.
You felt the Priestess sit down before she reached down the pull her boot off.
You felt her foot slide off of you, leaving you to wallow in her foot sweat before the boot was tipped upside down and you fell out drowning you in blinding light for the first time in what felt like eternity. And suddenly you were laying on a white tile floor in an almost complexly white, sterile room that you could only assume was the showers. And you were normal sized, which came as a shock after hours of being only inches tall. Slowly the blinding whiteness ceased and you regained control of your numb mouth.
You wordlessly glowered up at the Priestess as she sat on the bench in front of you, the only remainder of her oni form being the two little horns protruding from her platinum hair. And then there was the slight split in her lip as a reminder of the fight, as if either of you needed another one.
The Priestess stared back at you for a moment before diverting her gaze in guilt, "I'm really, really sorry, kid-."
"Fuck off," You managed to hiss through the numbness in your jaw.
The Priestess continued to stare into space, hardly reacting to your outburst. "Yeah, I deserved that," She sighed softly before standing up, "I'll be out in the dining room when you come out, you can call me all the names you want when over breakfast," She said as she walked out of the room, leaving the door to swing back and forth in her wake.


*Why is this sentence here? To be comic relief and keep my character count from having three 6s in it. (๏ᗝ๏) I was raised a bit superstitious so if I left it... GAME OVER MAN!!! GAME OVER!!!*
11321221121212.title: Under Her Toes (No Pain but Very Nasty)

choices: Be aggressive! She's no better than any other monster!
Be calm. Try to keep peace between the two of you for now.
113212211212121.content:
Thinking of what you had to say to the priestess is the last thing on your mind as sudden lack of an immediate threat leads you to retch over what has happened the past night. Every corner of your mouth begun to ache as feeling returned. All the saliva normally swirling around tastes like it's been replaced by the Priestesses sharp salty foot sweat.

A few seconds of spitting followed. After, you pick yourself up and turn on the shower. The water did little to ease your distress. The smell of vinegar and fine cheese seemingly burnt into your nose, the only part of your body in more pain than your jaw. You rinse your mouth out a few times, your tongue finding a layer of toe gunk caught between each set of your gums and cheek. You clear it out with your finger after the near paralyzing refresher. After a few more painful rinses you decide to stop. You aren't sure if the smell had left you, or if it ever would, but you were hungry for something that wasn't foot funk.

You walk toward the dining room, slowly as you lament facing the priestess. Thoughts swirl through your mind on what to say. You wanted to curse her out. Scream over the terrible torments you have had to suffer. AND for her torturing you this morning in her "nice" mode. Though, you gained two powers that would have taken you years of experience otherwise, and triggering the priestesses crulelty is not on the top of your to-do list. Perhaps she feels a small fraction of the terrible pain you feel? You bend the corner and see the priestess sitting at a dining table, a plate set for you.
113212211212121.title: A much needed shower.

choices: She has you try the spell.
Something Else?
113212212.content:
You close your eyes feeling your body quiver with fear. "Just get on with it," you whisper shakily.

The Priestess replied, "Very well. Lay down boy." You follow her instructions, your eyes were still closed, you didn't want to see that sweaty foot, those toe jam filled crevices or those sweaty soles. You smelled it before it touched your face, the revolting awful odor penetrated your senses and sent your mind reeling. You gave out a pathetic cry of despair as the Priestess began chanting.

You mewled like a drowning kitten as she finished the incantation and explained what power she had gifted you.

"The first magical skill I am giving you is a Super Sensory spell. With it you can make your eyes three times as sharp. Your hearing three times as keen. This applies to all of your senses and will be an excellent first step to allow your training to proceed rapidly."

Your mind was clouded by foot stench and the slimy feel of her foot pressing against your face. At first you think that would be an amazing power but then you realize in horror what her last statement meant. It meant you could SMELL three times as powerfully and she intended for you to use it during your training with her!
113212212.title: Just DO IT!!!

choices: Fall back into the shrine
Try and flee into the forest
11322.content:
The priestess appeared in the doorway before you with a sultry smile on her face. It's hard to imagine the powerful priestess as anything other than a serious warrior, however those robes are unmistakable. Her straw sandals softly clicked against her heels as she made her way down the stairs towards you. As she gets closer you notice a faint copper-like smell in the air, was it blood?

"Hello little one." The priestess held out her hand as she got close to you, "have you come all the way out here just to see me, how sweet!"

"Um, priestess...are you feeling alright?" You hold your ground, unsure of what exactly you should do. "You don't seem quite like yourself."

"Aw are you concerned about me, what a gentleman!" She catches your arm in her iron grip while smiling sweetly at you. "There's no need to be scared, be good and come along with me now." Without waiting for a response she starts to slowly drag you back towards the shrine.

While you don't know exactly what is wrong with the priestess you do know that if you go with her you'll never figure out what happened here. Before you can help the priestess you have to find a way to escape from her. She seems focused on the shrine while dragging you along so you summon up all of your strength and manage to wrench your arm free from her grip. With a deft roll you put some distance between you and her while rubbing your throbbing wrist.

"Oh you naughty boy," The priestess's eyes briefly flash a bright purple, "I suppose that I'll just have to punish you until you submit to me, ready or not here I come!~ " She starts stalking towards you again and it doesn't seem like she is going to go easy on you.

The priestess is now between you and the exit to the shrine back to the forest and the open door to the shrine just up the stairs behind you. Now the time has come for you to make a choice, do you try and flee into the shrine behind you? You could lock the door and put some distance between you and the possessed priestess. On the other hand you have no idea what you might find inside the shrine. You could flee into the forest and try to find help, but you'll have to get by the priestess again...if you can get past the priestess again...

What do you do!?
11322.title: Possessed Priestess

choices: Help her up like a gallant knight
Try and find out if she knows anything first
113221.content:
You decide that it's best not to tussle with a powerful possessed priestess a second time and run back towards the shrine door. Hearing an angry voice behind you gives you the extra kick you need to make through the door safely. Not wasting any time you quickly slam the door shut and slide the heavy bar into place, locking the priestess outside. Breathing a sigh of relief you take a moment to collect yourself, but then you hear a noise coming from somewhere within the shrine. It's hard to tell but it sounds like crying, could there be someone else here?

Carefully you make your way further into the shrine, following the sound of crying to it's source. Eventually you come across a large room, seems like the main prayer area with a number of pews and an altar dedicated to your goddess on the far side of the room. Next to the altar you find something really surprising, a young woman perhaps in her early twenties is down on her knees with tears streaming down her face. Judging by her expensive looking dress and numerous pieces of jewelry on her she is probably some merchant's daughter. She looks up as you enter the room and wipes the tears from her eyes.

"O-Oh, are you human?" Her eyes light up with a brief glint of hope, "Are you here to rescue me? The priestess here has gone completely mad! Quickly come help me up, she hurt my ankle and left me here!"

"Did the priestess hurt you? It seemed like she was possessed by something evil." You cautiously approach her, you need to try and figure out what exactly happened here. "Do you know what happened to her, why is she suddenly acting like this?"

"There's no time!" She frantically reaches her hand towards you, "A truly gallant knight would help a maiden in need, that's what you are, aren't you?"

This woman clearly needs your help, but she might also know something about what happened here. However with an angry possessed priestess nearby time is of the essence! Do you bravely leap into action to help a maiden in need or do you try and question her further to see if she knows anything?
113221.title: Damsel in distress

choices: Give in and submit willingly
Struggle in defiance
1132211.content:
That's right, it's time to prove yourself as a true knight and rescue the damsel from her perilous situation! You rush over to her and grab her hand to hoist her up to her feet so that she's standing next to you. Now that you have a chance to get a better look at her you can really appreciate her beauty. Her long autumn brown hair, that elegant forest green dress, all those gold and silver accessories. All the way down to a pair of leather flats, each decorated with a cute little bow. While staring you realize that her ankle seems perfectly fine and she also isn't leaning on you for support...but that could only mean...

"I must thank you sir knight, you have been most helpful." She roughly grabs your chin and forces you to gaze directly into her eyes, as soon as you see the bright flash of purple within them you know it's too late. "Most helpful indeed."

As you continue to stare into her hypnotic eyes you start to lose feeling in your arms and legs, you can't even struggle against her. After a moment she unceremoniously drops you onto the floor, your legs buckle beneath you, it's all you can do to just keep yourself up on your knees. The maiden turns around and clears all the holy objects off from the top of the altar, all of the divine symbols of your goddess tossed aside so that she may have a proper place to sit.

Using the altar as a makeshift bench the mysterious girl crosses one leg over the other so that her foot swings freely just a few inches from your face. You are filled with confusion and anger, unsure of what exactly to make of this situation before you. Reaching down she slides her heel out of her shoe and lets her footwear dangle lazily from her toes. As you crane your neck up to look at her you finally notice the faint shimmering of magic around her. Of course, it all makes sense now, she used illusion magic to make herself appear human, a trap commonly used by powerful monster girls.

"Are you only now just realizing your foolish mistake little knight?" She laughs down from her position above you, clearly this isn't her first time using this trick. "You boys always fall for the simple damsel in distress trick, you make it all too easy for me!~"

"Ugh...Who?..." You try too speak but you mind is still reeling, still attempting to make sense of all of this. "Just what...are you exactly?"

"Heh, you still don't even know what hit you huh? How sad..." She then moved the toe of her shoe under your chin and moved your head so that you were looking up into her eyes. "Maybe if you show me the proper respect I deserve I will grant you the honor of knowing who so easily bested you!"

"Y-You want me to beg?..." You swallow hard and struggle to maintain eye contact with her, the power she radiates is strange and almost otherworldly. "...Just for a simple introduction?..."

The smile gently fades away from her face, "Are you seriously that dense? You are in no position to start questioning me! Now quit stalling and do as I say!" She leans in, her hungry purple eyes glare at you with a barely restrained anger. "Unless you want me to force you into obedience, go ahead and try me."
1132211.title: Mysterious Maiden

choices: a kitsune!
(something else)
11323.content:
No! It cannot be! They're here too!?

You quickly took your sword out, ready to defend yourself and strike back at the foul beast. The monster girl didn't seem all that bothered by your action, though, as she chose to lean against the door, and simply stare at you, a sly smirk on her face as she did so. It was clear she didn't think of you as a danger to her. You chose to return the glare with one of your own, taking a closer look at her unnatural features, trying to judge what species of a monster girl you were up against.

After a short while, you came to a conclusion, that the beast standing before you was definitely...
11323.title: A monster girl!? Here!?

choices: Attack! That's your only chance!
Drop on you knees and beg for mercy.
113231.content:
There was no doubt about it. The fox-like ears coming out of her flowing, golden hair, as well as a set of 9 golden tails twirling behind her could mean only one thing: you were facing a kitsune, and an incredibly powerful one at that.

The girl's body was that of a human woman, a mature and beautiful one at that. With kitsune it's hard to tell if it's her body, of a possessed one, or a trick, a mirage masking a more hideous form. Regardless of its origins, you had to admit that this monster girl had good taste.

The clothes only added to her looks. She was wearing a traditional outfit similar to those worn by ancient shrine maidens: a yellow hakama over a white kimono. On her feet was a pari of tall, black geta, adorned with golden waves. On her left foot was a red-white sock, which weirdly enough reminded you of something, or someone. By contrast, her right foot was resting in her geta without a sock, completely bare to the world, giving you a good look at her long, gold-painted toenails, although calling them "claws" would be just as accurate.

"Has something caught your attention?" the monster girl asked in a mocking tone, intrigued by the attention you were giving her feet. You quickly shifted your eyes to look into her own. As red as a ground cherry they were, you didn't like that at all. It remineded you of that oni girl. You took a fighting stance, ready to attack at any moment. First things first, though, you needed some answers.

"Wretched fiend! What business have you here? This sacred place is off-limits to you kind!" Even though you tried to come as intimidating, the kitsune responded with a giggle, once that made you quite uneasy.

"Teehee, you're such a cute little thing, I almost feel sorry for you."

"Sorry for me!?" You shouted back "Answers my question, or you'll be the one regretting this encounter!"

The fox girl stopped laughing, but the smile still lingered on her lips. *Sigh* "Silly boys these days, always confusing bravery with bravado." She began to stare at the sky as she continued "Aw, what the hell, you're not leaving this place anyway, so I might as well tell you what happened."

The fox sat down at the steps of the shrine, inviting you to do the same. You weren't foolish enough to fall for an obvious trick, especially after that "not leaving" part, but you did sheath your weapon. The kisune loudly sighed.

"Suit yourself. Now, handsome knight, to answer that question of yours. I'm here on a special errand from the Monster Queen herself. My task was to deal with a human uprising, led by the previous owner of this shrine. As you might guess, I was successful, and the insurgence has been dealt with. Currently I'm waiting here for the Monster Queen's next orders, while dealing with the occasional intruders, be it other valiant heros like you, praygin for a blessing, but getting a curse instead, or common burglars, seeking riches, and paying dearly for it."

If it could, your jaw would most definitely be on the floor. This kitsune, an agent of the Monster Queen herself? She must be even more powerful than you thought. To bring the priestess down, as well as a whole army down with her...

"W... W-what happened to the priestess?" You asked, visibly shaking, clearly overwhelmed by the information you just received "W-where i-is she? She c-couldn't h-have d... d-d-"

"Died? Hah, don't make me laugh, that would be too simple, and too light of a punishment for her. She's currently being punished for her transgressions againt the Monster Queen. The punishment is supposed to last 100 years, but I give her 10 years before she snaps and dies. Still better than her men, they just have to last 10 years, yet each one of them snaps after just a day of punishment. I took a small break from punishing them, see?"

As she said it, the kitsune took her right foot out of her geta, and rose it towards your face, giving you a good look at its sole, and what a dirty sole it was. From her to toes, it was covered in sweat, with some lint and dirt stuck to it. Even though you were quite a distance away from here, a peculiar smell reached your nostrils. The funky smell was definitely coming from her foot.

"Ugh, a foul beast indeed. I wouldn't expect the likes of you, even this high in hierarchy, to take good care of your bodies."

The girl pouted, before giving you a toothy grin, shwoing off her fangs. "Aw, don't be so mean. You'll change your mind soon, you'll have no choice but to live with it for a while."

"What do you mean?" You asked, half out of fear, but half out of curiosity "What does your punishment entail?"

The kitsune giggled maniacally, creeping you out. "You still haven't figured it out? I turned them all into socks! And I'll turn you into one too!"

Silence. Complete and utter silence. You were slwoly processing what she just said. With each second your face was getting paler and paler.

"S... Socks? You turn people into socks?..." Your looked at the kitsune's left foot "Then that means it's-"

"BINGO!" the monster girl shouted, enthusiastically taking her left foot of the geta and raising it next to the left one, giving you a good look at the red-white striped sock. It was relatively clean, though there were some darker spots on it, no doubt caused by the fox's sweating. Those stains would forever taint the priestess' body and appearance, were she to ever be released from this torment.

"I must say, though the girl was foolish, she does make a very good sock. She's going to last me for a good while. Who knows, maybe she will survive those 100 years. I wouldn't bet on it if I were you." The girl put back both of her feet into the geta, and began to slowly walk towards you. "The same can't be said for my other socks. They wear out so easily. A tear here, a tear there, and before you know it, it's completely unusable. I then have to destroy it, and bind the human's soul to my foot for all eternity. It feels quite nice, but I'd rather just have another good sock. Will you be the one?"

Blue wisps began to form at the tips of the monster girl's nine tails, and her eyes began to glow blue as well. She was quickly whispering something under her nose, most likely a curse that turned so many humans before you into her footwear. You had to act fast, you don't want to end up as a sock, but you also want to help the priestess! What to do, what to do!?
113231.title: A Kitsune

choices: You wake up in the village! Time to play!
You wake up in the village, but they need time to set up the game!
The Kitsune lied! She's enslaved you!
The Kitsune lied and turned you into a sock!
1132312.content:
This Kitsune looks almost completely unscathed despite having apparently defeated the priestess. The Priestess managed to obliterate an oni girl in seconds. You are a farmer who just bought a sword and haven't even trained with it. There is literally no way you could possibly defeat this wicked fox! As soon as this realization hits you, you drop your weapon and fall to your knees! The Kitsune girl, confused by this action, stops her muttering. "What are y-"

"Please spare me! I'm just a fool who...ugh...w-who..." Now that you're on your knees like this, her foot odor is tainting every breath you take! It's horrible! And she's got her damn geta on! "w...who-"

The fox suddenly bursts out into laughter! For a good twenty seconds, she merely laughs at you as you suffer on her foot stench and try to keep your breakfast down long enough to keep begging. "Finally! A human who knows his place! In all the centuries I've been alive, this is the first time I've seen one of your kind actually use his brain! A shame you already seem to be having trouble with my feet. I really hoped I'd find another like this priestess! Someone who was strong enough to make me break my sealing spell to knock out."

Sealing spell!? Your eyes widen at the implication. "You mean..."

"Thaaaat's right! What you're smelling right now is far weaker than normal! I've been around for nearly a millennium! Surely you didn't think THIS was the scent of nearly a thousand years without washing my feet!" She wiggles her foul toes and you nearly throw up from the stench it kicks up! "Hmmm...alright! Since you're the first human to give me the proper respect...I'll go easy on you!"

"E-easy?" You ask. Given that this is apparently a super weak version of her foot odor, you're not sure you can even handle easy!

"Mhm! We're going to play a little game! If you win, you can have the priestess back. If you lose, I'll bestow a curse upon you! The curse will make you unable to refuse anyone who asks you to sniff their feet. Annnd...you'll never acclimate to the smell~"

"A-and if I don't want to play?"

Her eyes begin to glow blue again.

"Okay! What's the game?"

"Simple! It's a guessing game! I'm going to take you back to a village of Kitsune and blindfold you! Then you're going to sniff nine pairs of feet and guess how many tails each girl has! If you get more right than wrong...you win!"

Willingly sniffing monster girl feet!? "You've got to be joking! That's disgusting! I'll never-"

"What kind of sock do you want to be? Low cut? A stocking?"

"...when do we leave?"

The Kitsune giggles and pulls her bare foot out of its sandal. "Right now!" She mashes the foul thing against your face, and now her eyes glow purple! "Sniff." Suddenly, you find yourself taking in a deep whiff! And holy hell does it reek! Your eyes cross as the nasty stench slams into your mind! It's so...f...foul...

Everything goes black.
1132312.title: Drop on you knees and beg for mercy.

choices: You win their game
You lose!
11323121.content:
You let out a groan as you start to wake back up. Ugh...those feet were horrid! And that was with a seal! Your vision is blurry at first, but it starts to clear up...and you find yourself naked in a cage! "Wha? Why am I..."

"Morning sleepyhead!" Says the Kitsune from the temple as she hops into view. She takes a seat in the chair in front of your cage, and you can see that she found herself another sock...that's already tattered. "Hehe, jealous? You will be by the time this game is over! At least his suffering was short lived!"

"Why am I in here!? I thought you said we were going t-"

She pushes a tail against your mouth. "Shhh...I'm still honoring our deal. The cage is just to make sure you don't run!"

"Hmph! Unlike your kind, I have honor! I won't run away!"

The Kitsune rolls her eyes, "yeah yeah, I've heard that before. But one whiff of a three-tail or higher and you all freak out. Trust me, we need the cage."

"Okay, but why am I naked?"

She grins. "I thought I'd make our game a little more interesting! If you guess enough right to win, you're free to have any of us pleasure you in the method of your choice! Buuut, if you lose...well, let's just say that taking your pants off will remind you of this day...and probably make you pass out."

You grimace, "really? You're going to curse me AND make my penis smell like your wretched feet!?"

"Yup! Now let's begin!" The Kitsune snaps her fingers and a blindfold appears on you. "I'll go get the girls!"
11323121.title: You wake up in the village! Time to play!

choices: She picks a Kitsune with a low tail number
She picks one with a high number
She picks two girls
She does it herself!
113231212.content:
Your vision has been completely enveloped in darkness. This blindfold must be enchanted because it's not letting any light in whatsoever and certainly doesn't feel thick enough for that. You hear voices outside the room. It's muffled though, so you can't make out what they're saying. Eventually, the door opens, and you hear two sets of footsteps.

"Alright!" You hear the Nine-Tail say. "Now just put your foot on his nose, take the barrier down, and tell him to sniff!" Barrier? Why would...oh, they're keeping you from getting extra whiffs to guess from. Damn.

The Kitsune in question walks up, giggling to herself as she does. "You ready for my stinky feet? Doesn't matter!" She mashes your face beneath a filthy foot. "Sniff!"

Afraid of what will happen if you don't comply, you brace yourself and take a deep whiff only to immediately recoil and hit the back of the cage! Eugh! That's horrible! You cough and rub your nose, trying to clear out the horrible stench. Your eyes are watering! "U...ugh..."

"Well human? How many tails do I have? Hmmm?"

Sheesh...you can practically hear the smugness coming from her! You don't have much context for Kitsune foot odor, but given that you didn't pass out, she's probably on the low end. "Uuuhhh...three?"

"Wrong!" She shouts. "I've only got one tail! You're bad at this. Hope you're looking forward to one of us making your dick stink!"

You hear her skip away, leaving you with one thought. ONE tail!? Her feet are that bad at ONE!? You've made a grave mistake in agreeing to this. Though..given the alternative...

While you're thinking, the next Kitsune enters the room. "Come, human. I haven't got all day." You sigh and crawl forward until you reach the front of the cage and another foot presses on your face. "Sniff."

This is going to be hell, isn't it? You grimace and sni-

Twenty minutes later, you wake back up. "Th...that was revolting! How in the world can anything have feet so foul!?" You'd only experienced the stench for a brief moment, but it was nothing short of pure hell!

"You clearly don't have much experience with our kind. Answer the question, human. How many tails do I have?"

"N-nine! I can't imagine anything smelling worse than th-"

"Wrong. I have seven. Are you sure this human is worth the effort to curse?"

"Well, he's definitely a wimp." Says the Nine Tail, "but it'll be funny to watch him collapse before every monster he sees!"

The seven tailed fox scoffs and walks out, leaving you dumbfounded. These monster girls are so powerful! You hardly have time to register what you just heard before another walks in. "Come on human! Get your nose in there good! I want you to get the fuuullll scent!"

You hate this...you shouldn't have ever left your home! You should have been a farmer! But...it's far too late now...you press your nose to the newest foot and sniff it.

Your brain is blasted with a third dose of rotten, cheesy stink! As the foot is pulled away, you clasp your throat and writhe on the ground as your blindfold is soaked with tears and the air is filled with the sound of your suffering and choking! At this point, passing out would be preferable to the nose pain and nausea. You unfortunately remain conscious, though just barely. Well, it's more than one and less than seven...not a lot to go on. "Fhk...fhh...five?"

"Nah! I've got three! It's cute that you keep high-balling us though! Too bad you only have two wrong answers left! It's fun to watch you at our feet!"

Dammit! This is bad! Though...you'll at least recognize the two-tail now! Probably...the next Kitsune approaches and puts her foot up to the cage. Knowing the drill by now, you press your nose to it, grimacing at the filth you can feel coating her sole. "Sniff!" You take in your next sniff of fox feet and shriek at the disgusting scent! The smell burns your nose, lungs, eyes, everything! You whimper and stumble back before flopping over, unconscious.

When you wake back up again, you can still feel the burning sensation in your nose. Ugh...well, they were worse than three, not as bad as seven... "f-four?"

"Ooooh, so close! First time you've low balled it though! I've got five!"

Your heart sinks. You've already gotten four out of nine wrong! You have to be perfect from here on out!

The next fox approaches and puts her foot up. "Ready?" You aren't...you really aren't! Still, you put your face up to the new foot... "sniff it!"

Vile doesn't even begin to describe what you breathe in! The stench is just...unreal! Of course, you black out instantly. But when you wake up...your brain is a mess! "Fhfh...feet...feeeeeet..."

The Nine-Tail giggles, "whoops! He broke! Hold on!" She chants a little incantation, and your mind unfries! "How about it? How many tails?"

It's got to be nine, right? They literally broke your bra-wait. The Nine-Tail probably would have made you sniff HER, right? The person who said sniff definitely wasn't her! Which means... "eight!"

The Kitsune all pause, and then the Nine-Tail speaks again. "Well, congratulations human..." Yes! Finally you got one ri- "you get to feel Kitsune feet on your dick! And be cursed by me! What an honor!" Your blindfold vanishes, and you see eight other Kitsune in the room. The Nine-Tail was indeed the one with her foot up to the cage!

"What? B-but you..."

"Changed my voice so you couldn't cheat and use something other than your nose! Bet you thought you were clever, huh? Now, let's see...who gets to mark the human's cock?"
113231212.title: You lose!

choices: You are outnumbered, better to do whatever they want...
They are just looting deserter scum! Charge at them!
Reader's Choice
1133.content:
To your shock and surprise, the shrine where the priestess was supposed to be was in complete ruins. It seemed as if it was burned, probably few days ago as there were no scorching embers anywhere. Among the debris however, you could see some movement...

"Dangit... I told the two of ya that we hafta come 'ere sooner! No loot left 'ere!" Said a female voice
"You'd rather be caught by the Empire's legion, or the humans, nya?" Said a second feminine voice, making a distinct meow at the end... making you almost sure that it was a catgirl
"I ain't seen any since Flame Division came through 'ere. The two of ya are jus' paranoid." Replied the first voice
Flame Division? Could they be the ones responsible for burning the shrine? Their name surely would suggest that
"Speaking of Flame Division. I wonder what did they do to that priestess who lived here, nya?" Said the voice that sounded like a catgirl
"I reckon they gonna have sum fun with 'er. T'was a big enemy of the Empire that bitch." Said the first voice again, hearing the great priestess called a bitch, made your blood boil, but you stayed quiet and kept listening in...

"Quiet you two! Less talking, more searching!" A new, stern-sounding voice suddenly spoke
The other two then seemingly went back to looting what remained of the shrine. There seemed to be at least three looters then, presumably all being monster girls. Your chances didn't seem too good in direct confrontation there, especially considering you still had no clue what species they all were exactly...

Bad luck however decides to strike you at the worst possible moment however, because just as you stand in front of the burnt shrine, one of the thieves accidentally causes a part of scorched wall to collapse, which was the only thing keeping her from seeing you. The girl quickly looks up, she has slightly-below-shoulder length brown hair, and from her dog-like features, you are able to quickly realize that she is probably a kobold!(Think less of a MGE kobold, and more of Polt from Monster Musume, since her feet are more human-like).
"Oi, we were 'ere first maggot! Get outta 'ere!" She says, from her thick accent you quickly realize she was the first of the voices you heard before
Hearing her however, the other two also come to look, and so, you soon see them emerging form the ruins on your left and right sides. One on the right is a catgirl, just as you suspected, she has averagely long brown hair, and a tanned skin, with a playful smirk that gives you a feeling she might be a bit of a trickster. One on the left looks tallest of the three, and has long blonde hair, judging from the stripes on her tail and ears, as well as the claws, she is probably a tiger girl, her expression is a rather serious one...

"Oh, looks like we have a human here, nya... I didn't have my feet pampered properly ever since we deserted. Say, if you kneel down and worship my feet, I might share some of the treasure with you." Said the catgirl, raising her leg, currently covered by a shoe, as if to tease you
"We ain't sharin' no treasure just 'cause your sweaty feets get sum lickin'!" Said the kobold girl

"I am not interested in any treasure, I am looking for the priestess from this shrine." You said, deciding to make it clear you don't want trouble... even if you were disgusted when seeing what's left of respected priestess' shrine being robbed like that
"That's even better nya! We can show you where she was taken... if you convince us of course, nya..." Said the catgirl, obviously meaning worshipping her feet again
"Oi! If you're gonna get yer feet pampered, then I wanna get mine pampered too!" Said the kobold girl, pointing at her feet which were covered only by sandals, giving you a nice view of their tops, aside from claw-like toenails and little bit of fur covering them, they were pretty much shaped just like human feet.
"I don't want to touch your feet at all!" You said
"You pamper us, or we beat you up." The tiger girl suddenly says on your left, she seems like a person of few words, and to your bad luck it seems like she also wants her feet worshipped
"Ya, wot she said'!" The kobold girl confirmed the tiger girl's words
"Nyaaa... seems like those two won't let you go now human." Said the catgirl, and you seen her remove one of her shoes, revealing her beautiful looking pale foot, covered by a toeless sock, which gave you a nice view of her toes, with slightly claw-like shaped toenails(But not as claw-like as the kobold's).
"Why don't you just start and get this over with quicker, nya?" The catgirl said teasingly, sitting on a piece of the stairs that somehow held together when the shrine burnt, and extended her foot towards you... wiggling her toes invitingly.
1133.title: A band of thieving monster girls in the ruins!

choices: Offer Taina a foot rub, she is probably tired from her travels.
Offer to pay Taina to take you(She probably needs money for travels after all)
Give up, and just get on your way alone
11333.content:
"Got you, wicked beasts!" A voice suddenly sounds from nearby bushes as you started considering the offer, knowing you could not stand a chance in combat

A girl dressed in strangely exotic red and white, kinda baggy clothes, and holding some foreign looking kind of polearm suddenly bursts out from the bushes! The monster girls are too surprised to react before she throws three strangely shiny pieces of paper towards them... the tiger and the kobold both get hit, while the catgirl manages to evade it by pure luck!

"W-what the heck, nya?!" She exclaims, suddenly looking fearfully towards her companions... who started to shine almost blinding light while seeming to be in some kind of stasis, before actually blinding you for a moment... and turning into a little tiger kitten and a little kobold puppy respectively, without any human features whatsoever.

"Take those other two fiends, and leave this sacred place alone before I cut you down with my naginata!" The girl said, she seemed about your age, with long brown colored hair, and due to nature of situation you just avoided, you also noticed she had sandals and white socks on her feet.

"O-okay, nya! We will get revenge for this though!" The catgirl said, quickly grabbing the adorable new animal forms of the other two before running away, and disappearing into the bushes, she even forgot the shoe she took off before starting to tease you.

"Thanks a lot for the help." You say, approaching the mysterious girl
"Hmph, it was nothing. I couldn't let that scum loot the shrine... or rather what's left of it. You made a nice distraction for them though." The girl said, a bit coldly for someone who just saved you...
"Y-yeah... do you know what happened here? I wanted to get a blessing before going on a quest to stop the Monster Girl Empire, but I found it like this." You decided to ask
"Well, I don't know... I just arrived here few hours ago, travelling between shrines around this country as part of my shrine maiden training. It was like this when I arrived, but then I went to look around for some clues, and those three suddenly appeared." The girl explained
"Shrine maiden?" You ask, unfamiliar with that title, the girl was probably a foreigner
"I'm a foreigner in case my clothes didn't clue you off yet. I guess... you could say I am like your priestesses, just with additional combat training regarding combat against demons and monsters." The girl explained, seeming a bit irritated having to explain that, she probably was getting asked about it a lot.

"Oh... that explains how you were able to easily get rid of those three like that." You say
"Well of course. I've defeated much stronger monsters and monster girls than some three random deserters." The girl says rather pridefully, she certainly seemed to like being complimented at least...
"Are those two you hit with those papers going to stay animals forever?" You decided to ask one more question
"No, doing that would require a more complex sealing ritual... they should stay that way for at least few hours though. And if they are dumb enough to return, I might introduce them to my naginata." The shrine maiden girl said showing off her halberd-like weapon

"What's your name by the way, if you don't mind me asking? Mine's David." You decided that you should introduce yourself to your savior at last, even if she didn't seem too interested in talking to you much
"Taina, though I don't know why would you need it. I doubt we are going to meet again." She said, once again sounding annoyed by your questions

"Actually... I was hoping that you wouldn't mind if I joined up with you for a while? The roads are dangerous recently, and I would like to find out what happened to the priestess from here." You decide to ask, that girl clearly has more combat experience than you, and if she is going around between shrines then she could help you get to the next one and get the blessings you wanted!
"And why would I need you for? You couldn't do anything against those three, and if not for me you would probably be under their feet." Taina pointed out... and you have to admit she had a point, but maybe if you offered her something else she could still be convinced?
11333.title: Saved by a shrine maiden, and teaming up?

choices: You keep rubbing until Taina's satisfied, and lets you travel with her.
You can't help yourself anymore around Taina's cute feet, and start kissing them
A succubus ambushes both of you with a lust spell, making you and Taina aroused!
113331.content:
You decided to offer her a foot rub, it was a bit difficult for you to think of anything else after the catgirl before teased you with her foot like that. Taina was clearly surprised by the offer.
"Eh? Why would you offer me that just after avoiding having to touch disgusting feet of those fiends? Are you some kind of pervert?" She asked, clearly having serious doubts about your motivations for the offer
"Well I sort of assumed that your feet should be much nicer than some random deserter monster girl. Besides if you travel so much, you could probably use a little relief, and I could use help with finding out what happened here and reaching next shrine, we could help each other." You said
"H-huh?! Well obviously they are nicer than some monster's! And I guess I could use a masseur to massage my feet after a long day..." Taina suddenly seemed interested in your idea after you given your reasons, and seeming a bit insulted that you had any doubts about her feet being prettier than monster girl's

Taina then went towards the miraculously surviving stairs of the burned temple, sitting on them like the catgirl did before, and removing one of her sandals, and crossing her legs, leaving her foot covered only by white sock in the air...
"Get to it then, if you do a good job I might consider letting you come with me." The shrine maiden said in kind of commanding tone, she certainly didn't act like most priestesses around here... those were pretty much all extremely polite, caring, kind, and spiritual... Taina seemed rather bossy, prideful, and showoffy on the other hand.

As you approach and take a seat on the ground in front of Taina's foot you can quickly smell a slight smell of sweat coming from it, even despite the sock covering it... she surely didn't lie about having to walk a lot, though probably it was still less smelly and much cleaner than a monster girl who made sure to keep her foot sweaty for days, Taina probably at least washed them when she had a chance... strangely enough however it wasn't like either catgirl's or shrine maiden's foot disgusted you... in fact it was alluring in it's own way.

Without wasting any more time you put your hands and start rubbing Taina's sole through her sock... only for the shrine maiden to give a light kick to your hands at the moment you touch it! For a moment you throught she was ticklish... but it didn't seem to be the case as her face was annoyed rather than smiling.
"Take the sock off first! Geez, do I have to explain to you how to give a proper foot rub?" She said in irritated tone, but despite that she seemed to be strangely looking forward to the massage

Without much choice, wanting to accompany her for a while, you quickly put your hands back on her foot, pinching the tip of her sock and the toes, and slowly pulling it off, revealing a surprisingly pretty looking a little bit below average sized foot, the toes wiggle a bit in front of you as Taina feels the fresh air on them.
"You might as well take the other one now too. Fresh air feels nice on them after a day like this..." Taina said in kind of relaxed tone, putting her now bare foot in your lap, and extending the other still socked one towards you

Without any arguments you pull off the other sock, revealing a the cute foot of the shrine maiden and seeing another nice little wiggling spectacle from her toes. Once that was done, you proceeded to rub the sole of the Taina's foot with your thumbs, it felt a little bit wet to the touch, but that was to be expected. To your own surprise, you also discovered that the slight smell coming from shrine maiden's foot didn't bother you at all. Could it be you were into feet? If so, it definitely would be a problem when fighting monster girl empire with all of it's monster girls obsessed with dominating people using their feet...

"Not bad, not bad at all... for the first try at least." Taina said, seeming to compliment you in her own way? Her toes flexed cutely with increasing frequency as your hands moved up on her foot, rubbing away the tiredness of Taina's day... you could also feel increasingly attracted to Taina's cute feet, hopefully you will be able to keep control of your impulses, or all of your work here might end up for naught if she is weirded out by you doing something to her feet out of nowhere...
113331.title: Becoming Taina's foot masseur?

114.content: Just as you checked on your supplies for a second time, it dawned on you. You had never actually met a monster girl, not really. You had seen them in public, ran from them when you were little, but never observed them, talked to them. An entire world of sentient beings trying to destroy humans, and you don't know why. Hm, a knight is more than a warrior, a knight doesn't attack for no reason, or a reason he doesn't fully understand. So, you decide to go on a stakeout, you have so many questions! Why do they love to abuse men? Why do they have such bad foot hygiene? Don't they value peace? Of course...you know the risk, monster girls love to torture young men...and enslave them for all kinds of uses, the last kidnapping was just last week. Where do you decide to stake out?

There is an old barn just south surrounded by derelict fields, fields abandoned after it was claimed by a giantess and some monster girl warlocks. No one goes there, people just take it as dangerously occupied. You take a lamp and wait until evening before going over there, lighting up the barn as a beacon to the dark ladies who would take notice. You sit just above the door frame, so you could slam it shut and trap whatever enters! Not to fight...just to talk, unless she's not in the mood....after an hour of sitting around, the stirring of someone entering causes you to spring the trap! You slam the earthy doors and bar them shut! Turning to see a rather surprised and curvaceous...
1141.title: The farm on the outskirts of town.
