11412.content:
Standing in the lamp's light is a vampire girl! Her long black hair has intermittent streaks of red. She is wearing a lacy black dress that contrasts against her pearly white skin. Her legs are covered with fishnet stockings and end in a pair of black heels. As she got a good look at you, her expression changed from confused to bemused.

"Oh, a human? Not only that, one who is so desperate for enslavement, he willingly traps himself with a monster girl. Very well, kneel before me, and I will accept you as my slave." She spoke with a haughty attitude, befitting of her elegant looks. You raise your hands and say "Wait, you've got the wrong idea! I merely wish for the opportunity to speak with a monster girl face to face..." You divert your eyes away from her as you feel her piercing gaze stare straight through you. "After all, you're obviously intelligent and sentient, and I'm hoping you're rational enough to converse with me without resorting to violence..."

You look back at the vampire girl as she sizes you up. After a tense silence, she utters...
11412.title: Vampire girl!

choices: "I'm selling you for a fortune!"
"You're too good for my clientele...I'm keeping you for myself!"
"Get up! I still want to talk with you..."
114121.content:
"What do you want to know, human?" She says again, this time louder and in an amused tone. She obviously thinks very little of you. She floats over onto a hay bale and takes a seat. She casually puts one leg over the other knee and dangles a heel, letting the stale sweaty smell seep out. You wave a hand in front of your nose in response. "Let's start with that...why do you all have such..." You try to find a way to be delicate, this monster could rip you apart, and you don't have anything to kill vampires with, you are alive because you are amusing. "...fragrant feet?"

The vampire giggles, brushing hair from her face. "Some of us just love the smell...but most of us just love the way humans look, retching and squirming, begging to go back to their clean little lives..." She looks up at you, red eyes with a small yellow pupil piercing your own and giving you a chill. "It's the perfect domination." That's the moment it dawns on you, these really are monsters...not just beings who look different. Monsters, with a lust for conquering you and everyone you know. She giggles again at your frightened expression. You keep pressing your questions, hoping to find something redeemable in those soulless eyes. "But why do you all share this desire to dominate? Don't any of you feel bad?" She shakes her head. "Because it's fun! Or because you're easy to manipulate! Or because you're sexy and we take what we want! You're hot little cattle! And I've made a name for myself handing young men...like you...to the perfect owners..."

She gets up and walks to you, and you back up...pressing yourself against the door in fear. Soon the graceful vampiress has strode up to you, your hand is trembling on your sword, she glances at it knowingly, you can't hurt her. She raises a hand to your face, you recoil, turning away at first. But her hand still finds your cheek, she strokes it very gently. You turn back slowly, hoping in vain for some kindness. Soon you're staring back into those deep red eyes, almost fixed to them. "You really thought you could talk to me didn't you? Not just the usual chatter you humans are fond of. You wished to honestly connect with me...try and find some middle ground..." She suddenly leans in and sniffs your neck. "Ah...sweet...I can smell it in your blood...a sweet little boy..." You feel so small...like a scolded puppy. "Usually the slaves I peddle are battle-battered warriors or stubborn priests...but you are rare. A lot of monster girls will want to snap you up." She laughs now, louder than ever, and you quiver, which earns you another condescending look. "The funniest thing is...you came to me!"

The vampire shoves you through the thick barn doors, which shatter as you go flying 20ft away! You're left laying on the floor, bruised, when a familiar heel stomps onto your chest. Two eyes look down at you through the darkness, and a mouth opens beneath them, showing two gleaming fangs. The mouth says...
114121.title: "What do you want to know, human?"

choices: Submission is the only choice - Kiss her foot
Resistance is the only choice - Struggle and attempt to topple her
1141212.content:
"No.. You're far too good for my clients, I think I'll keep you for myself!" The vampire above you proclaims after a short moment of her examining your terrified expression. There was nothing you could do! She was far stronger than you were, faster and probably smarter too! Why did you have to be so stupid? To think that you could've reasoned with these monsters, now look at you, you're quivering on the floor beneath a vampiress's feet.

A condescending laugh brought you back to reality, making you look back up into her face which wore the same evil smile as before. "Look at you, shivering under me! You're just too cute!" She says in a playful voice, causing you to blush. You didn't even bother trying to plead with her, as the look in her eyes told you that there was nothing you could do. All you could do was watch her as she eyed out her prey that she had caught under her boot.

"What, no begging to be set free? No pleading for me to have mercy? Have you accepted your inferiority or are you truly just shocked? I honestly don't know which would be better!" She taunted, moving her heel up to your neck to trap it. The smell of her feet was now really seeping into your nose, causing you to move your head to the side to avoid it, which of course didn't help at all. You remained motionless for a moment, thinking about your options, then looked back up yet again at the sexy vampiress above you.

You could try and struggle your absolute best, as you just might be able to catch the monster off guard and trip her, giving you an opportunity at an escape. The second option, which you had trouble even considering, was that maybe living as this vampiress's feet wasn't so bad. It might be that the smell of her feet was affecting your mind, or that you had accepted your inferiority.

Do you plant a kiss on your new mistress's sexy, pale foot as it digs into your neck, or do you struggle your absolute best to try and topple her, giving you an opportunity to run like you never have before?
1141212.title: Vampiress feet

choices: "I've thought about it, but I never considered it."
"Ew! No."
1141213.content:
Still reeling from the pain of her heel imprinting on your chest, you can't help but whine a little. But she removes her foot from your chest. "Get up! I still want to talk with you..." You do get up....and run for the hills! You look back to see her sprinting after you, and gaining fast! You try to draw your sword and turn to fight, knowing you can't outrun her, but she simply swats it out of your hand and swarms you! She cackles once you're pinned, and she sits on your chest. "Hahaha! Aw...what's wrong? Don't you want to find my good side? Keep digging! I love this...I never get a chance to talk to you sheep...more questions!"

You go along, maybe if you can keep her distracted till dawn, the sun can solve this problem for you. "uh...ok..." You stutter. "W-why just men? You always capture the men more than the women...." The vampire sighs, taking a contended moment to think of the best way to elucidate her answer. "We don't have our own for one, we require you for breeding...looking after the children and servicing us. When I see a fine male...mm..." She bites her lip. "I claim it, we're hard wired that way...some of us like the women too." The ghoulish girl leans close, stroking your face again. "But I don't understand how they can resist you boys. You strut around in that brash, masculine way, thinking you're strong when really you're so delicate. You practically beg to be taken and you don't know it! Since we're having this dialogue, I have a question for you. Have you ever found yourself attracted to one of us?...We're so much more interesting than your dull women...a hot blooded boy like you has probably fantasized about us..." You blush under her cold, clammy body and decide to tell the truth, you just need to keep her talking.
1141213.title: "Get up! I still want to talk with you..."

choices: Willingly and enthusiastically worship the sexy vampire girl's feet
Reluctantly and fearfully worship her feet, likely displeasing her
11412131.content:
"Yes..." you whimper, "Well, most of us don't l-like you a lot.. but some of u-us are drawn to you. I-I mean you are beautiful, and d-dominating, and some of us like b-being d-dominated" You stutter, knowing that the beautiful vampire is slightly surprised by this. "Although most of the time.. we are t-too scared to come to you b-because we think y-you will just k-kill us or sell us". The vampire laughs, her voice seemed to have a playful tone. She whispers in a playful tone "Do you like being dominated?" You knew this question would've come, you hesitate before answering, but you whimper "y-yes". The vampire giggles and moves her legs up to your shoulders, you are overcome by fear. She notices this and gives an evil smile. "Well, if you beg, I might let you up...' The vampire notices it's starting to get light. She gets up, picks you up and throws you into the barn. Your plan failed, and now you are going to be enslaved by this sexy vampire girl.

The vampire slowly walks to you, you back up against the hay bail behind you, for the first time truly terrified and without a plan. The sun has risen, and the vampire girl is safely in the barn, with you trapped in it with her. She places her heel right on your crotch, resting it lightly. "Well, I don't hear any begging boy'

"P-please don't hurt me.. I j-just wanted to t-talk to one of you.. I'll do a-anything.." The vampire is obviously not planning to let you go, at least not until the sun has gone down again. You are now really scared. The vampire girl says "If you clean my feet well enough, I might let you go tonight *giggle*".
11412131.title: "Yes..."

choices: You fall asleep.
You close your eyes and resist.
You kick her off and run again!
11412132.content:
The blush tells her that her question hits something close to you. And there's some truth in there. Your village always had more than it's fair share of evacuations and curfews due to Monster Girl raids. Most likely due to the close proximity to the mountains, the forest and the caves...all hot spots for the monsters. "I've thought about it, but I never considered it." She raises an eyebrow. "Really? I don't believe it." The vampire sits up and crosses her arms. "You've never had a time where you looked at one of our wonderful magical bodies and thought...maybe kissing her feet would be worth it?" You shrug, keeping your dumb act up. "Not really." She titters. "What about that one? That "not really" one?...there's something there." You sigh and tell her the story.

"I must have been about 15 at the time, the church bell rang on a summer evening, monster girls had been sighted and the guards implemented the usual curfew. Still, I wanted to help out, I wanted to fight! I had often just hung out with the knights and helped them polish armor and..." The vampire yawned in a rather sarcastic way, and waves her hand to shorten the story. "Oh, ok...so that night the monsters came, my mother had forbidden me from getting involved. I remember hearing the sounds of battle, heroic men fighting...and then silence after sounds of struggling. Soon I just couldn't take the silence, while my mother wasn't looking I opened the window shutters to see what was going on. That's when I saw her. Her smooth light green skin...a purple cloak and short legs kicking in the air as the monster sat on a giant levitating scythe. A lich. Nose deep in a book until her third eye on her forehead shifted, staring right at me. The other eyes followed and she put down her skull faced spellbook. 115.content:
*NOTE: This storyline will take place in a sort of mix between futuristic and medieval technology, so the setting sort of follows it's own rules.*

There was a large abandoned mansion outside your village. The mansion sits at the top of a cliff and looks down across the ocean on one side and your village on the other. For years the silhouette of the structure had loomed over your village, it seemed light had never shined on that place once during all the times you had looked up at it.
Strange sounds could sometimes be heard echoing down the cliffside and once in awhile someone would go up and see what was happening, but one of two things was all that ever happened.
Either those that ventured up had returned with no more information than they had left with, finding nothing and saying that it was just an abandoned mansion.
Or, on much less frequent occasions, the adventurers would return, hysterical with fear, some even much so that later, when questioned, they had blacked out the experience all together.

You distinctly remember an event from your childhood where a young man named Jamin, the son of one of your parent's friends, had decided to see what was up with the house and see if it would be a decent place to hang out. Like a clubhouse to get away from the, sometimes overbearing, adults. Nobody saw Jamin for 3 days. But you were sure that you saw lights on up at the mansion at night, and you were pretty sure you heard female laughter from the mansion those few nights, you had just figured Jamin had brought a few of his friends up with him and one of them happened to be female and she happened to laugh a lot. Now, looking back, you realize that the reality was not at all innocent, and you cringed to wonder what was being done to Jamin as those laughs echoed down the cliffs.
In the early morning, Jamin had wandered back into the village, terror written across his face and tears in his wide eyes. But that wasn't the only thing on his face, a huge, grimy footprint had been stamped into his face. It took days to get him cleaned up after that. Years for him to not freak out whenever he saw a white dress or a woman's bare foot.
Worse, whenever he was questioned about his experience, he would only ever say: "The Scary Lady stepped on me." or "The Scary Lady put me under her feet." usually with a mental breakdown to accompany it. And after awhile, everyone just stopped mentioning it around him or his family.
But you had done your research, read every book you could on how monsters behaved and what their strengths and weaknesses were. And you suspected this to be the work of a ghost. It made sense, because what terrified Jamin was definitely a monster, but most monsters would have tried to attack the village by now, try to kidnap someone, or do something. But nothing of the sort had occurred, and the only incident involving whatever was up there was whenever someone stepped into it's turf. And the only type of monster that you could think of that was confined to such a small space, without involving any sort of magic or advanced technology was ghosts, due to their nature of having to be quite powerful to function outside of their haunting ground. To your knowledge, only very powerful and ancient ghost could penetrate the boundaries, and considering this ghost was still confined, you were guessing she was not extremely powerful.
You had studied how to hunt ghosts, not with swords, not even sacred objects did much but put up a fairly weak ward against them. No, the way to deal with a ghost was by binding it and berating it into submission with spells until it is in complete submission. There was no way to actually kill something that was technically already dead, so the best option was to control it.
You had tried this technique a few times, and you could finally manage to gently call a horse telepathically. You did not plan on being so gentle with whatever was up there.
You packed up wit you needed; sage, a few sacred objects, a small dagger (just in case shit got real), a few voice recorders, and a Ouija Board to communicate with whatever spirit in case it won't cooperate with the recorders.
But you knew that the Ouija Board would be useless at best, and dangerous at worst without another person to play with. Moreover, going up alone was rather foolish in and of itself. Do you find a partner or risk it and go it alone?
115.title: Creepy Mansion

1151.content:
Your knuckles tapped on the door of a girl you only somewhat knew, but knew enough about to know that if one person in this town were crazy, or rather, angry enough at the monsters collectively, to join you, it would be her. With your backpack you stood in the dark and cold rain, waiting for an answer as the neon sign above you flickered enough to illuminate your face for the peek-hole in the door.
Finally you heard footsteps approaching the doorstep before the door opened a few moments later, "Okay, you don't look like the pizza guy," Mary said, tilting her head.
"I'm heading up to the mansion, I think I know what's up there," You telepathically replied, just to show her you could do it.
Mary looked into your eyes, a wide smile forming across her face as she said, also telepathically, "I used to be a priestess in training, y'know? I think we may have a chance at this."

Behind you, you could faintly hear the music blasting from Mary's headphones as you walked up the overgrown path along the cliffside to the mansion. Even more audible was the sound of Mary singing along to the music, and while you made sure not to mention it, you sincerely hoped she was a better mage than she was a singer. But in spite of her untuned voice, her spritely mood put you at ease.
You looked up the path to see the mansion as it loomed against the dim light of dusk over the ocean, the mansion itself looked evil, like how you'd imagine the doorstep of hell itself. It was even more imposing considering it's history.
You looked down the other side of the hill it was on, the side that faced away from the village, where you noticed a small cemetery.
The ancient graves were partially hidden by the dead grass of autumn, visible only by silhouette through the swaying grass as the wind blew through over the hills.
You decide to go check out the cemetery before heading right to the mansion, you had a better chance of finding ghosts at full night anyway, granted, ghost were also slightly stronger at night.
You walked over to the graves, stepping over the collapsed iron fence as you held out the flashlight in front of you, glancing at each of the stones. As you read the names you wondered which person had performed whatever ritual to become a ghost after death. Then you wondered if none of them were, maybe the ghost was an outside influence? Maybe the ghost had traveled here through an object? Maybe the ghost had already been here and had just been waiting to gain enough power to interact with others? Maybe, the ghost had trapped the previous inhabitants in the house and had tortured them to death with her feet?
"Thanks, I needed that thought," Mary said next to you, her voice completely deadpan.
"Maybe you wouldn't have it if you stayed out of my head," You retort, not too comforted by your sudden horrific thought.
"You try being able to read minds and not use it all the time," Mary said, now staring up at the mansion, "Great, now I'm scared."
You walk toward the mansion, quickly but hesitantly. You didn't want to deal with anymore thought like that to make you scared, some ghosts could feed off of fear, so you knew that the more confident you were the better.
You approach the closed door, not but several feet from it now. You looked up at the windows, expecting the curtain to move unnaturally, or a figure to be watching you. But there was nothing but darkness in those windows, then you looked down to the door again as you reached out your hand to grab the handle.
In the crack of the door, now ajar, was a face peering out at you. You jumped back with a small grunt of fright as you got a good look at the inhuman face, female and looking directly at you through the strands of black hair that hung over her face with her crazed, red eye, grinning impossibly wide, showing her sharp, shark-like teeth. The skin was chalk white and it's the sclera around her crimson iris was an oily black just like the liquid that streamed down her cheek.
You stood staring back at her as Mary screams behind you. The Ghost then moved back behind the door, never speaking and never breaking eye contact, and never breaking that freaky-ass grin.
You quickly recover from the shock as you grab your camera and rush behind the door and attempt to take the Ghost's picture to trap it in the physical realm. But the Ghost was gone.
"I hate fucking ghost girls!" Mary screams in frustration behind you.

11512.content:
You reached down into your bag to produce a large, heavy flashlight, upon flicking it on the beam managed to illuminate the entire cobweb-ridden lobby. It was so bright in fact that you winced slightly as your eyes adjusted.
"Son of a fuck, that thing is bright," Mary mumbled, lifting her arm to shield her eyes.
You did not react, but it did catch you a bit off guard just how profane and casual Mary was, you hadn't expected someone of her background to carry herself so. Not that it bothered you, she just wasn't quite what you had expected.
You looked down at the floor to see a trail of large footprints that led into a shadowy doorway next to the base of the stairs. They looked to be of some black grimy residue, perhaps like dirty water, or more likely, foot sweat. Just looking at it made you sick, let alone the faint smell of foot sweat and dirt. But your disgust paled in comparison to your fear when you saw what lay in one of the footprints. A picture of you, a picture you did not recognize, extremely close to your face, which looked absolutely terrified. And this ghost had stepped on it with her disgusting feet. The implications disturbed you deeply.
"Don't think about it too hard," Mary spoke from behind you. "In my experience with ghosts, fear is there best weapon, the more frightened you are the more you give them. She's jut trying to get inside your head."
"Yeah, okay," You say shakily as you move on, now looking up at the huge, crystal chandelier, covered in dust with cobwebs hanging from it like. Then you began walking to your right and into the kitchen, trying to ignore the trail of footprints knowing they were likely a trap considering how obvious they were, and the fact that she could just have easily not left them by shifting out of physical form.
As you shined the beam into the kitchen you noticed all the furniture was turned upside down, managing, against all logic, to remain balanced. You had heard about poltergeists displaying this sort of bizarre behavior. Bizarre even by monster standards.
Directly above your head you could hear, and even feel, the sounds of something up there moving. Scrraaape! Creeeaaak. And, as if you needed further confirmation that you were not imagining things out of fear, you felt the dust fall into your hair
"I'm going to go explore the other rooms," You say moving away from the falling dust to prevent it getting in your eyes. "I want to see where the best place is to use the Ouija board or set up some audio recorders. If she isn't coming out now, I think it's safe to say she's not going to unless we can talk first.
"She's trying to be sneaky; knows she can't take us both at once," Mary nodded, producing her phone and holding it in front of her face, presumably to use some program to locate negative energy within the house, "She's already made it clear as fucking crystal what she wants with you, so she's probably just waiting for you to get scared enough to make a mistake, so I'll cover you."

After what you thought was likely an hour, you peeked up into the attic from the rickety ladder you stood on and instantly, you were greeted with a sick stench, one that you recognized from the footprints when you first entered the front door. And right then you knew you had found your hotspot to use the Ouija and EVP devices. Not that you wanted to spend any amount of time in a place that smelled, or felt like this.
"Hey, I'm getting some-," Mary said behind you.
"Yep, you got some readings," you said with a gag as you lifted your sleeve to your nose to filter the stench. "Fuck," You curse under your breath as you struggle to climb into the attic through the small hatch. Then you saw a small window on the other side of the attic with a rocking chair next to it, you doubted it would help to reduce the stink by a lot, but it was a start and with time it may manage to make it bearable. Other than that, the attic looked mostly like how you would expect it, dark, dusty, and crowded with antiques you internally considered the worth of. But, it would have to be a particularly pricey item for you to run the risk of this, or any entity in this house attaching itself to the item and then haunting you or whoever bought the item. Then again, money is money, and these are trying times.
You walked over to the window, noting how long a way it was down considering you were on the fourth floor and atop a cliffside on this side of the mansion. You lifted the panel with little resistance, letting the wind billow in and clean out some of the air, of course it also stirred up a bit of dust and you knew that could be problematic. But considering how breezy it was, you were hoping it may not take as long as you had thou-.
Wait, did that rocking chair just move?
You snapped your gaze to look at the rocking chair. Empty and still as a statue. You tried to convince yourself you had just imagined it, or that the wind really was that strong. But when you turned around and made eye contact with Mary, you could tell by the look on her face, she saw it too, probably better than you did considering her line of sight.
Clunk. You snapped you head first back to the rocking chair, which still looked still and unassuming, then you realized the window had been slammed shut.
You pushed the chair away from you before trying to push the window open again. But it wouldn't. It felt as if it were bolted shut.
Mary walked up next to you with something in her hand, "Let me try."
You stepped out of the way just in time to see the crowbar in her hand as she swung it, shattering the window, and the windowpane with zero effort before pushing out the broken remains onto the rocks below.
"I ain't smelling that bitch's foot stench," Mary says under her breath as she nonchalantly drops the crowbar on the floor and walks back to the center of the floor before sitting down indian-style. "I get ahold of this bitch, she'll be begging for me to die a second time," She says, a slight smirk on her face.
You figured she was probably angry after losing her temple to a monster attack, but you were also eager to get this hunt under way, and you knew she probably was as well.

OPTION 1). Encourage Mary to vent and whatever that entails. +15 Affinity w/ Mary

OPTION 2). Get on with the Ouija Board session. +10 Affinity w/ Ghost (for better or worse)

***You start the relationship with each character at 30.***

(The Affinity system will determine how that character will treat you and how they will feel about certain decisions. Keep in mind that characters will show affection and distain in their own ways so take that as a note of caution when raising or lowering affinity too far beyond the starting number. And that's all I'm going to say otherwise I will just further complicate it and not even I will be able to keep it straight.

115121.content:
"What are you planning, then?" You ask, trying to get your partner to open up about herself.
"After what I've seen those things do to innocent people," Mary started, giving a cold laugh as she twitched her foot, "Seeing people beg to be stomped because they can't stand the stench, or the sickeningly dirty toes being crammed into their mouth day in and day out. After seeing all that I plan on humiliating those that commit these atrocities similarly," She said with dissonant excitability.
"How? I mean, I've not ever seen a human with feet like a monster girl's. Not nearly as-" You asked.
"Toxic? Believe me, mine are," She said, rushing to untie her converses, "I'll prove it," She said with a grin.
You were ready to tell her there was no need, but then you saw her pull her foot out from the shoe and present it to you. While Mary's foot was not particularly dirty, it was certainly sweaty and smelly, and there was a bit of black filth between her toes that had smeared a bit over her sole.
"C'over here and smell 'em," Mary urged you, biting her lower lip and giving you a lusty look while wriggling her toe jam covered toes. "If you can even bring yourself to sniff between my toes once, I guess I will have to work harder," She teased.
You really did not want to do this, but Mary was pretty attractive and this may have been your chance. Furthermore, Mary was a potential long-term ally and you wanted to nurture that relationship as much as possible.
"I'll give you five bucks to sniff between my toes," Mary dared in a singsong voice, even waving the bill around a bit.
Against every part of yourself you walked over to Mary and sat down across from her, all the while she never broke eye contact.
"Fine," You sigh, dreading the terrible, if brief torture that was to befall you.
Mary grinned terribly as she lifted her foot to your face and trapped your nose within the unholy smells of her toes. You sniff and your eyes begin to water for the stink and you cough as you inhaled a few drops of her sweat.
"You fucking idiot, you actually took the dare! And your afraid of feet!" Mary laughed, not cruelly but as if she had just seen the absurdly impossible.
You pulled your face out of her toes and you grimace as your coughing continued.
"I'll give you ten more bucks here, and ten more when we get back, and a bottle of soda I brought," Mary began as you cringed. "If you open up your mouth and clean my dirty, dirty toes, even between them, and eat all my toe grunge. You can't spit anything out."
"That's a bit over the line," You say nervously.
Mary sighed, "Fine, you'll get fifty dollars total. And you'll get to wash down the taste with soda anyways."
115121.title: Mary's Dare

choices: You continue to serve her feet.

1151211.content:
You feel your cheeks start to warm up as you seriously begin considering it. Money is money after all, and fifty bucks is nothing to sneeze at. Plus, hey, free soda. Then again, this technically makes you a whore... The thought makes your cheeks burn even hotter.
"Well? What's it gonna be?" Mary asks somewhat impatient, wiggling her grimy toes tantalizingly in front of your face as if that would convince you.
"Wouldn't... cleaning your feet ruin all the work you put into them this far?" You ask, somewhat confused where this whole bet idea came from. Mary shrugs her shoulders in response.
"Eh, you have a point. But seeing as how my toes did nothing but make you cough and tear up, they'd be no match for an actual monster girl."
She's right. Her feet may be fragrant, but compared to the stale, musty scent of the ghost in the room, Mary might as well be a patch of spring flowers.
"Besides," she continues, "Not like I have anyone to tell me how powerful they are. You get used to your own smell after a while. What would I do, walk up to a stranger and ask them to sniff 'em?"
"So this is kinda like a sparring match or something." You add. Mary's eyes light up and her smile widens as she sees you start to come around.
"Yeah, you're right! I can see how strong my feet are, and you can see how strong your resistance is. Aaand fifty bucks~." She waves the money around once more, grinning, fully convinced she has you.
Her bold confidence and somewhat flirty demeanor has just about won you over, but a final thought crosses your mind.
"What about the ghost? She's probably hiding in the shadows watching us..." You look around the dusty room for any glimpse of the specter.
"Oh, her?" Mary looks around the room with you, chuckling darkly. It's actually somewhat intimidating. "That bitch can watch all she wants..." Mary's eyes return to yours, but they look more stern.
"Open."
You obeyed without hesitation, jaw dropping open almost as if your body decided to act on its own. Mary's sudden dominant streak seemed to awaken some sort of submissive streak in you.
Soon, something warm entered your mouth, followed by an explosion on your tastebuds. Mary's foot had been hovering in front of your face as you talked, so you got somewhat used to the smell. But the taste? Nothing could have prepared you. A soft sigh escaped her mouth as she bit her bottom lip.
"Gooood boy..." She grinned down at you with that same lusty look from before. "Be sure to tell me how my feet affect you. Any strange feelings or weaknesses you get, okay?"
"Mmeah..." You mumble out, still trying to adjust to the invader in your mouth. It was just her big toe so far, so you could manage. But it was still an overwhelming flavor, the salt almost burning a hole through your tongue. And speaking of tongues, you have still not even started licking yet, just letting the pad of her toe rest inside. Mary notices this too.
"Yo, I ain't paying you to warm my toes, I said fuckin' clean them!" Her stern voice came back and you instantly found yourself swirling your tongue around the toe, almost in a panic, the salty assault on your mouth returning at full force. And then it happened...
You reached the 'grunge' as she called it.
Mary let out a surprised gasp at the feeling as your tongue swished through her big and second toes, picking it up. You couldn't help but cringe at the taste and texture, every part of you screaming to spit, but you made a deal. Shutting your eyes, you prepare to swallow the mouthful and get it over with, when Mary angles her foot up so you look her in the eyes.
"Uh uh..." She playfully wags a finger at you. "Gotta look and swallow~." She giggles.
Her words aren't lost on you and you feel your cheeks burn hotter than ever. You have half a mind to tell her that wasn't part of the deal, but in the end decide to do as she says. Looking dead into her eyes, you swallow down the crud as fast as you can.
"Holy shit! I thought for sure you'd chicken out this time!" She laughs loudly, a tear rolling down her cheek, obviously enjoying this a bit too much.
"Mmmf..." You huff out in response, her teasing and toejam sapping any backtalk you might have had earlier.
Mary's laughter slows down and she wipes the tear away. "Haaa... Oh man... Now then, I see you've gotten acquainted with Miss Big. Would you like to meet her sisters?" She giggles girlishly, drumming her other toes on your cheek. It wasn't a question.
With a sigh, you nod. Not like she was going to let you say 'no' anyway. Opening your mouth wider, you allow her stuff the rest of her toes inside. Mary's foot wasn't huge, but it sure wasn't dainty. In fact, it was almost-
"The perfect fit?" Mary asks, literally finishing your thought. "I was thinking that, too. Maybe your mouth was made for my foot?" She giggled again. And from the position you're in, you can't really argue.

115122.content:
You nodded silently, holding an awkward smirk as Mary's apparent sadistic streak shined through, before slipping off your backpack to get the Ouija board and EVP devices. You were almost instinctually going to set the bag on the rickety old rocking chair next to you, but just as you turned to look at the chair, you got an unnatural chill up your spine, and you knew that was a bad idea.
"Go head," Mary urged impatiently, "Set it in the chair. It'll show her your not scared," She said motioning her hand toward the chair.
Put on the spot all of a sudden, you looked back and forth between the chair and Mary as you wondered what to do. Then you saw the rocking chair jerk toward you slightly, making a hellish scraping noise across the floor. Yep, that decided it.
You shook you head as you quickly walked away from the chair and toward Mary, never setting your backpack down, "Nope. Nope. Nope," You mutter beneath your breath.
You made sure to position yourself where you could see the rocking chair across the room with Mary to your left and your back to the hatch and your face to the window before sitting down on the floor and unzipping the bag.
You produced the board, a few candles, and a lighter and set them down next to you, where Mary almost instantly picked them up and began lighting them and forming a circle around the board. You produced a camera from the bag and took a moment to adjust the settings before setting it down opposite you and Mary so that it could capture the session. You wanted proof if something happened, and you also wanted to look over the footage in case it caught something you or Mary didn't.
"Okay, I think we're ready to start," You say under your breath as you place the LED lighted planchette on the board.
"Who should ask the questions? You or I?" Mary inquires, placing two of her fingers on the planchette.
You knew Mary was eager to be the one to talk to the spirit, but you weren't sure that was a good idea considering how angry she was and how much negative energy she could incite. Furthermore, as much as it disgusted you that the ghost wanted you, you knew you could work that in your favor by being provocative, thus using yourself as bait. And if your could lure her into the physical realm, and then take a picture with your old, antique camera, you could trap her in the physical realm long enough to bind her to your command.
"I think it would be best if I did," You replied to Mary, hoping she wouldn't press the matter.
"Fine," Mary scoffed, slightly perturbed.
You placed your fingers on the planchette, careful to keep your fingers just barely touching the board to allow for the best communication.
"We know you're here, we would like to talk," You said, your hand shaking slightly as a sense of even more overwhelming dread came over you. You felt like she was right behind you. But you didn't turn round, you didn't want to let her know she was getting to you.
The planchette didn't move, but you did feel it vibrate slightly, but that could have been attributed to your quivering fingers.
"Your being too nice," Mary argued, "You need to provoke these kinds of spirits. After all, she wants to scare and dominate you, wouldn't she crave that more if you were a dick to her?"
You looked at Mary, fear still in your eyes, "I'll let you try in a minute," you hiss.
Mary sighed in staring back down at the planchette.
Meanwhile you ponder another thing to say. There was a moment of silence between you and Mary, accompanied only by the sound of the howling wind outside and the faint smell of the ghost's feet, whose toes were likely wriggling in anticipation of savagely dominating you. The thought made you cringe, and cringe even more as you realized you were screwing yourself over by using yourself as bait.
You sighed in dread as you decided to bring out the big guns as a last effort to elicit a response before handing the communication role over to Mary. "Can you tell me about that photo you stepped on downstairs?"
Mary looks up at you as you stare down at the board, her eyes wide in shock...

1151221.content:
You look up at your partner as she stared over your shoulder, the sight of her wide, nervous eyes grips you with fear. Were you not expecting a response from the ghost? Did Mary not expect anything? Did you?
"Don't look," Mary whispers.
You remain silent as you ask yourself what had Mary so terrified all of a sudden. What was behind you that was so terrifying? Then you feel the planchette move, you look down to see what it was saying.
Y-O-U-R F-A-C-E U-N-D-E-R F-E-E-T
"What did she say?" Mary asked, still staring ahead as she reached with her other hand for your camera.
"The obvious," You respond, fighting the urge to look behind you. "What is back th-?"
"She is," Mary replies blankly, "She's got me under some sort of fear spell," She continued shaking slightly in what looked like terror mixed with anger.
You stay silent for a short moment as your heartbeat drums in your ears before you decide to try and distract the ghost long enough for Mary to take the picture.
"What's your name?" You ask, but knowing that was such a dull, predictable question.
R-E-I, the board responded.
You looked up at Mary as she lifted the camera, fear still shining in her eyes, you begged her with your gaze to move faster.
"What is she doing?" You ask, your voice quivering.
"She's moving closer," Mary replies as you hear a slight creaking of the floor behind you, "She's right behind you now."
You take a deep breath as you struggle to control your fear as you hear increasingly loud and close, heavy breathing over your right shoulder. Even so, you press on.
You try and think of another question to stall for time before Rei catches on to you and Mary's plan but-...
"Don't open your mouth," Mary said simply, making your blood run cold.
You wanted to ask why, but you didn't dare risk opening your mouth to say anything.
But that question would be answered in the following seconds anyway, and in the most hair raising way you could think of.
You watched in petrified terror as Rei's wide, shapely, but massive and horrifically filthy foot slowly extended out in front of your face over your right shoulder. Her toenails were painted black and her skin was chalk white but her toes and soles were blackened with grime mixed with sweat. You cringed at the sight of the gunk in the crevices between her toes as she spread them with a long moan behind you.
Then you began to retch and gag on the ghastly smell, it burned in your nostrils and you felt your eyes already begin to tear up. You could feel more pressure on your shoulder as she began to relax her calf before curling her foot back toward your face, letting you take in the sight of her dirt crusted, sweat dripping sole.
You found it hard to move, perhaps for your mortal terror, but even if it was easy, you willed yourself not to do so. You needed to distract Rei just long enough for Mary to take a picture.
Tears ran down your face both for the intensifying smell and the horror as she curled her big toe back to poke your lips.
"Open," Rei whispered, sounding uncomfortably close your head and sending shivers of disgust and dread down through your body.
And with her black colored footsweat dripping on your tightly closed lips you had a decision to make.

1). Open your mouth and endure the torture of Rei shoving her filthy toes in your mouth in order to distract her from Mary taking a picture. (+15 Affinity w/ Rei – -5 w/ Mary (she doesn't want Rei to have that pleasure.)

2). Refuse and risk Rei catching on to your plan. (-10 w/ Rei – +5 w/ Mary)

choices: Rei Slips Away... Taking You with Her.
Mary Snaps the Picture and a Fight Begins.
115122121.content:
You sat, frozen in terrified silence, the only sound being the winds drifting around the dark house as you stared in horror back at Mary, begging her hurry up and grab the camera to capture the evil spirit as Rei's dirty toes began shimmying their way into your lips.
Mary only stared back at Rei, who's face was somewhere over your left shoulder judging by the sounds of her deep, orgasmic breathing.
You cringed hard as the ghost girl's large toes managed to get through your lips and were now brushing against your teeth, dripping sweat between your teeth and onto your tongue. You coughed and sputtered on the taste of the foul liquid, determined to keep your teeth tightly clenched as she began working on wriggling her toes in.
In your ear- no, not your ear; your head, there was a voice, a slithering hiss inside your skull, "With fearful manner... Beneath the feet of arcane beings... Eternity tortured... You will be... Timeless lament... Accept fate... Accept fear... So welcome to my world..."
Then with a slight giggle, you felt a sharp pain in the back of your neck, it was just enough to cause you to instinctually let out a frightened yelp even if you knew what the entity was attempting.
Rei, just as you had known and feared she would, used the opportunity to push her big toe between your teeth, but not all the way into your mouth, just enough to keep it open.
Mary's eyes went wide as she pulled the camera off the floor, staring back at you and your tormentor.
You bit down hard on Rei's toe to see if the pain would cause her to recoil; it was like trying to crush a jawbreaker but with a fleshy texture; useless and unpleasant as your teeth scraped off copious amount of black dirt and drops of sweat that fell onto your tongue.
Rei's only reaction was a mocking chuckle as you tried shaking your head, just enough to get her toe out, but her toe remained firmly in place.
Then you heard her breathy voice on your right ear as her right hand reached around to hold your face at her torturous foot; "Accept my eternal torment, boy," she said as she slowly extended her other four toes over your nose and almost into your eyes. And with that, your face was buried in the stench and toe grunge of Rei's feet as your nostrils and lungs burned from the foul smell. Tears ran down your face both from the disgust of the scent, and the paralyzing terror as it became clear you would not be leaving this mansion without Rei first having her way with you.
Then, you could feel her toe start to push past your teeth, and you knew there was nothing you could do to stop her, instead you preemptively pulled your tongue back in desperate hope to avoid the full extent of her torture.
You felt a slight squeeze around your abdomen as you looked down to find Rei's other ghostly white leg slithering around you, pulling you closer to her and further into the shadow behind you.
Mary audibly flicked the camera on, and you knew at this point Rei must have known what was happening, but instead of reacting in such a way to at least end your torment she merely continued until her big toe was shoved all the way into your mouth.
Rei gave a loud laugh, feminine and cruel.
You screamed, short and muffled as her foul toe face-fucked you, even worse was that, despite your efforts her toe found your tongue and dominated it in horrible fashion. You coughed and groaned as her massive toe slid across your anguished tastebuds, leaving trails of black, oozing foot-sweat and toe-grime filling your mouth..
Finally, you caught a glimpse of fury in your partner's eyes, and within an instant, you saw the wrath overcome fear as she pulled the camera up to snap the capturing image.
But Rei was not without her reaction as she quickly pulled you back into the darkness, and you could feel yourself begin to lose your grip on consciousness.
115122121.title: You Are Forced to Suck Ghost Toes

choices: Rei Facesits You
A Facefull of Rei's Toxic Toes
1151221211.content:
Oily blackness of unconsciousness enveloped you as you floated through the air. But you were headed home victorious regardless. You were sure with you acting as bait, and Mary; in all her contempt for the monsters, would be able to fight and capture Rei. And despite your fearful fainting, you would have escaped the full horror of the vile spirit's toes you would have been subjected to. No, you were were sure everything was going to be okay.

Your senses slowly began to return and the first thing you feel is the hardness of your cradle, ungiving and smooth. This was not your bed.

The next second you smelled the rancid air. This was not your room's scent.

Your eyes fluttered open, expecting to gaze upon your room, and perhaps your mother's or Mary's smiling face. But it was only then that the full extent of your failure sank in.

What surrounded you, this enclosure, this cell, dark and oppressive; was not your room.

And the face that stared back down at you from atop the side of the bed to your right, eyes wide in excitmente and sharpened teeth bared in an unnaturally large rictus grin; was not Mary, and it was not your mother. But it was no stranger to you.

Your heart sank at the sight and you shut your eyes in terrified denial. And for what stretched to an uncomfortable amount of time you stayed, unwilling to open your eyes for fear of what you may see. However, thankfully you could not yet smell the stench of Rei's dreadful peds. It seems as though she was the type to toy with her prey and savor her food.

After you had a moment to compose yourself, and accept that whatever had happened you were now at the feet of a frightful ghost girl that wanted nothing more than to torture you to death beneath her nasty soles. And that she would be drowning you in her foot sweat very soon unless you found a way to escape her.

It was then that you opted to try and deal with the situation, even in your limiting position. With your eyes still fearfully closed you attempted to roll yourself beneath the bed as a first step toward any desperate escape. You wanted to be back in your bed, back with your family, not under the vile feet of Rei's evil desires.

And as you attempted movement and your body refused, your muscles limp despite your commands, your last bit of any hope went crashing down to the floor where your body still laid, both soon to be tormented by Rei's blackened soles.

Instinctually, as your mind reeled for any other panicked solution, your eyes opened. And as soon as you realized what your were doing you tried to shut them again, but it as too late, you were already taking in what you saw. Which was nothing. In fact, Rei was no where in sight from your position; lying on the floor along the side of the bed. But this gave you no light of hope, it only made you dread her inevitable appearance moreso.

And after several minutes of terror soaked straining against your paralysis and waiting for Rei to present herself you heard the sound of the rusty springs of the mattress above you squeak slightly. It was very quiet, almost faint, but it was enough to cause you to stop and consider that Rei had not left. She had and remains atop the mattress, silently savoring your fear until she becomes bored. And this was confirmed by the deep orgasmic moan that followed.

This was followed by the sight of Rei's long, pale leg stretching out from atop the bed, a huge, black high heeled shoe hanging from her foot looming over your face, grimy foot sweat periodically dripping out of it and onto the floor beside your face. The stench was getting worse.

"Take heed, mortal boy," Rei hissed as her shoe fell to the floor in the pool of sweat that was building dangerously close to your face with loud *Clump*, leaving only a large blackened, sopping wet sock barely dangling from her toes.

"For if you believe that there is any chance of salvation from what is to befall you, I will assure you the contrary," Rei continued as she swung her sock just enough to cause it to fall, joining her high heel with a sickening *Slap* as a bit of her sweat from it flicked onto your face. It was absolutely nauseating and the intensifying stench caused you to begin a short fit of violent coughing as it poisoned your lungs.

Apparently, your reaction amused Rei as she gave a slight giggle before sitting herself up to stare down at you with her crazed, crimson eyes as she swung uer other leg over the bed to join the other as she hovered her two bare, nasty feet above your face. It was then that you noticed just how much larger Rei was than you. In fact, it seemed as though she had somehow reduced your size to at most two and a half feet tall, evidently a more desirable size for Rei to dominate. The idea of Rei having this kind of power and possibly more, disturbed you greatly.

"The girl, your last remaining hope of escape, yes? She failed to even get so much as get a picture before I was upon her," Rei grinned, taking great pleasure in rubbing in how doomed you were. And you knew that she was trying to break you, and even while you knew you were unlikely to make it out of this, you would work your best to deny her the pleasure of letting her know how much this broke and terrified you.

"You may wonder where your friend is now?" The cruel spirit asked.

You did wonder, but you assumed the worst if what Rei was saying was true.

"Note how I have but presented but one shoe and one sock?" She continued, motioning with her grimy toes to the filthy items to your right.

You immediately understood the horrific implications of Mary's current situation, but Rei decided to rub it in a bit more anyway.

"Oh how she screamed as I shoved my sock, that have been on my feet for the past few hundred years, into her mouth. Her fear as she first tasted the vileness was delicous. But after her remarks concerning my foot stench, I knew it would be a shame to waste that potential, so I bound my other reeking shoe to her face," Rei laughed as she slowly extended her massive toes to your face, making more of her foot sweat and toejam drip onto your tortured face as you grimaced in disgust.

"I would assume by now she is realizing, as you are, neither of you will be escaping my feet. She will spend the rest of her life sucking the sweat and grime from my socks, and you will remain beneath my soles, and not even in death will you find release, for you will only fall further into my control," Rei smiled, every second her toes got closer to your face, and the stench multiplied.

Rei cocked her head to the side slightly, a look of thoughtfulness in her wide eyes, "But perhaps we should build to the true horror that is my toes in your mouth? I think I may sit myself upon your face so you may pleasure me first. But make no mistake, while it will not my feet, you will not enjoy it, and you should be very afraid," The ghost threatened, considering her options.

You did not like the idea of Rei sitting on your face or making you "pleasure her" but the thought of her toes in you mouth for longer than they had been already or her sweaty soles on your face was just as terrifying at least. No matter what she picked, it could only end in tears and quite possibly years in therapy for you, that is if you made it out alive at all.
