You "Deus Ex Machina" Your Way Out
11512212112.content:
(So, I guess this kind of became a 2 part spooky ghost Halloween Special. Lol, I have too much time on my hands.)



A long moment of silence enveloped you as you stared up from the floor at the sadistic specter, the dim light only barely illuminating her cruel face. In fact, it seemed the unsettling scarlett lights in her eyes did more to allow you to watch as her mouth curled up into a frightening, razor lined grin as her gaze pierced your soul with gleeful cruelty. Rei had made up her mind.

You could only whimper in terror as she tapped her grungy toes on the floor next to your face, lightly scratching the side of your head with her toenails and smearing a bit of her grime off on you. You tried to turn your face from the sickening sensation, but to little effect due to the paralysis.

“Hm, it has been so long since my feet had a proper mouth fucking-,” Rei murmured as her toes pressed and rubbed harder against your skin.

You cringed, your mind racing to come to a solution, some way to stop this from happening to you. You refused to accept it. You called on any god that would answer but all you got was Rei’s nightmarishly filthy foot drawing ever closer, across your cheek, towards your lips.

“-Centuries in fact. You see, in life I was Nobility, as a smart boy like yourself may have deduced by my manner,” she boasted, clearly jerking off her own ego.

You opted to use Rei’s moment of haughtiness to try and gain a clearer perspective, try and muster the mental energy to push off the paralyzing fingers of whatever influence Rei had you under.

And for a moment you thought there was some progress being made. You could almost feel the intangible bars holding you down begin to bend.
And you could almost make out a speck of light at the end of tunnel, you just had to keep working at it.

Rei’s eyes shined with glee as she observed the light of hope return to your gaze. And for a moment she let you revel in the illusion of even the possibility of escape. But as her eyes caught your finger begin to twitch, she decided that you were far too close to escaping and you had to be pushed back into despair.

The hem of her transparent kimono brushed your nose as your tormentress raised her enormous foot above your horrified face. It was even bigger now with you diminished size, the ball of her sole alone easily wider than your face, which now would fit nicely in between her arches. Your stomach curled at the thought, but you still attempted to keep pushing against the paralysis.

Now with a sinister smirk Rei flexed her foot above your face. The sight of her disgusting soles was enough to make you cringe, but the smell was far worse. The stench seemed to pierce your senses and drift into your very incorporeal soul. You were almost sick in your stomach from it, and you knew this was merely the genesis of Rei’s vile domination of your senses.

But still, you could feel your fingers start to move and you could almost begin to make a fist. You just had to bide your time long enough to keep her going until you were able to fight back, run away and get some help to rescue Mary. It might not have been the most elaborate or unexpected plan, but it was your only option to escape this horror. And you certainly weren’t going to just let her do this to you and Mary without a fight.

“I used to have hand picked peasants from the settlement that became your lovely little city down the hill, brought to me. Boys and girls, it didn’t matter,” Rei continued waning almost nostalgic on her life, when she had it, as she laid her huge toes across your lips.

Your heart sank in panic, and you really were sick now, merely from the fearful anticipation of what she was going to do next. Your nostrils began to burn from the terrible odor of her toes and you could feel the tears stream down the sides of your face from the terror.

But even so, all you would let your mind focus on was moving. And you could begin to move your elbows and twitch your knees slightly. But you refrained from letting Rei know any of that.

“Of course, these peasants thought they would live a life of luxury in my house as they served me,” The filthy apparition explained as she pointed her big, second and third toes down onto your lips. Letting you simmer in your disgust and horror.

“Of course, you can probably assume how that all turned out for them,” Rei continued.

Her big toe was now lightly tracing your lips in a disturbingly intimate fashion. And you fell into a fit of coughing as a bit of her toe sweat slipped onto your tongue. Trying your best not to open your mouth and give Rei a chance to shove her vile toes down your throat, you sputtered at the revolting taste. But Rei could have done that at her leisure regardless with your jaw mostly limp from the paralysis.

The taste of her sweat was salty and sour, and as you tasted it Rei laughed at your horror. You could not imagine what the rest of her feet would do to your mouth. And unless you could remain focused on breaking the paralysis, you would find out very soon.

“Though, my last visitor, another boy from your little city, managed to fight me off and run away, before he tasted my feet in whole. But I am stronger now, and if I may be so bold, you managing to break the paralysis as much as you have…” She began, leaning down to stare directly into your helpless face. Her toes stayed firmly over your mouth as her pale, vaguely asian features filled your field of vision.

“… Makes me pretty fucking horny for you,” Rei whispered in a tone that seemed to be trying to be sensual.

You cringed as she said this. The last thing you wanted was having a monster girl, let alone one this frighteningly evil, developing some kind of twisted crush on you.

But it wasn’t as hard as you cringed when Rei stood back up to her full, towering height and took action against your resistance. Not the action you had expected, but enough to escalate the torment.

Her toes snaked up your face and over your nose until the ball of her wide sole was resting on your lips and the tips of her big and second toes were covering your field of vision. Drops of Rei’s foot sweat stung your eyes, which only made you cry more. But more pressingly, she had buried your nose deep in her toe crevice, right in the highest concentration of sweat, toejam, and stench.

You watched as Rei’s eyebrow raised with a smirk. You knew what she wanted, and she knew that you knew.

You knew holding your breath would be pointless, all she had do was wait and you would eventually have to take a large intake of her terrible stench.

Instead, you only took in short, shallow breaths to avoid the bulk of the stink. But even the through your limited breaths the smell was mind-numbingly horrific. It was enough to make you shudder and whimper beneath her nasty sole. But you could still feel progress being made on the paralysis, albeit slower due to the painful distraction her stench in your nostrils posed.

Rei’s smirk faded as she observed your resourcefulness. Her toes wrapped around your nose and squeezed tightly, suffocating you under her foot.

You knew exactly what she was playing towards and you struggled as hard as you could against her. Even desperate enough to open your mouth under her foot to try and get some bit of oxygen.

Panic overcame you as your body screamed for air and Rei denied it to you by slipping the ball of her foot over your mouth as a seal. And you managed only in getting another foul taste of her feet as the tip of your tongue touched her sole. The nastiness of even such slight contact was immeasurable, causing more tears to flow from your eyes as you anticipated her toes in your mouth.

It was not until you were on the cusp of unconsciousness that Rei released your nose allowing you to breath once again.

But as your lungs instinctively took in a deep inhale, with it came the ghost girl’s reek, directly from between her toes and into your nostrils. The smell was absolutely foul, enough to cause an unexpected sound to form from your lips under her feet. A scream, muffled by her nasty foot.

Rei, looking disturbingly satisfied by your demonstration of horror, bit her lower lip as her hand drifted toward her crotch. And you were shocked by her vileness as she tortured you with her reeking feet for her sexual pleasure.

You were forced to take in breath after breath of the rancid odor between her toes as you struggled to catch your breath. Each time you moaned in disgust as Rei's foot reek felt like it was burning your nose and seemed to poison your lungs.

But more importantly, any mental strength you had to fight off the paralysis had faded. It, along with any hope you had remaining were crushed beneath the poisoning, vile reek of Rei’s feet. And every time you tried to make an attempt to escape the horror, the same horror would pull you back, screaming and crying as you inhaled another bit of her stench.

Rei smirked at your crushed hope, almost wishing you had held onto it a bit longer for her to torment. And for a moment she considered letting up enough for you to discover it once again. But as her fingers began slowly pleasuring her sensual area, she knew it was time she stop playing with her food. It was time she start escalating the torment substantially.But first she wanted to torture your spirit, which had proved to be just as much a delight as your face was beneath her.
11512212112.title: Despair Beneath the Ghost's Feet

choices: Meanwhile; from Mary's Perspective
Rei Continues to Torture You
115122121121.content:
(Ghost Girl Torture You 2: Electric Bungaloo)



Rei stepped down hard on your face as she lifted her other foot onto your chest. Her weight was probably only thing she made you endure that was not brutally painful on your senses but it was enough to make your breathing even more difficult.

You gazed up at your tormentress as she cocked her head slightly, her red eyes showing only a feigned sense of compassion, but a frightening amount of all too genuine lust.

Rei’s toes spread as she wiped at your tears, her grime smearing across your face. “Shh… Shh… Shh… It’s okay,” she assured, of course, making it even more not okay. “You’ve fought better than anyone else I’ve seen. And honestly, I’m impressed. In fact, maybe if you hadn’t underestimated the task you took when coming up here, you would have become something of a hero. Maybe even turning the tide of the war,” she continued, rubbing in your failure, letting you marinate in your despair, but strangely also feeding your ego. “But you’ve done enough. You’ve earned my favor. And I’ll keep you under my feet forever and ever, and ever,” she giggled.

You whimpered, not wanting to give her the satisfaction of seeing you completely burst out into tears and pathetic begging. But as you coughed on the sour smell between Rei’s toes you choked down a sob. This could not be what the rest of your existence would reek of; this ghost’s toes. This was nothing short of hell.

“Shhhh… There’s no escape. There's nothing you can do to stop me. So I’ll just take over, and you won’t have to worry about anything else…” Rei bared her sharp fangs in a hair raising smile as her foot slid even further up your face. And once she had planted one half of your red, tear stained face beneath the arch of her left foot she raised the other sole to match it.

With your face smothered beneath her feet, you were left in torturous darkness and her sweat began pouring into every orifice. It stung your eyes and the rancid taste left you shuddering beneath the ghost’s grime. Combined with the paralysis it created a sensation not dissimilar to being buried alive beneath the phantom's peds.

You screamed and sobbed into Rei’s revolting soles as she balanced on your face, her sweat and toe grime slowly dripping and oozing down the sides of your face and onto the creaky wood floor.

And as you felt her noxious toes wriggle through your hair you kept trying in vain to fight back. But even as despair crept over you, attempting to smother out even your hope and will beneath this monster’s soles, you kept batting it away. All else had been taken from you, all you had left was hope. And you could only be inspired to keep trying to fight back.

It felt like an eternity smothered under Rei’s arches, but finally you felt her feet lift off of your face, leaving her black, grimy prints in your skin. You coughed and gasped for even slightly less toxic air before opening your eyes to gaze up at the dominating face of Rei.

She was levitating herself above you, her feet dangling down just inches above your lips. You closed your mouth tightly, pursing your lips in a disgusted grimace as soon as you foresaw what she was going to you

Rei cocked her head as she stared at you, her wild, black hair hanging down in strands over her face, “Beg me not to do this,” she hissed, poking her big toe on your lips, tensing up slightly as she prepared to shove it in.

You remained silent in terrified, tear stained defiance, but defiance nonetheless.

Rei stared back at you with a curious glint in her crimson gaze, “Most would be beyond broken now... But not you, you’re still fighting me,” she whispered, staring lustfully into you.

Closing your eyes you steeled yourself as you felt Rei’s grimy toe wriggle through your lips and now against your teeth. You felt so helpless and all you could do was shiver in horror and quietly whimper on the floor.

“I want you to look at me as I toe fuck your face. Open your eyes and look at me!” Rei orders, snapping her fingers.

You still quietly refused.

“Open your eyes or I will bring in your little girlfriend so you can watch as she gets face fucked by my feet as well!” Rei giggles.

You finally caved and opened your eyes to look her in eyes. You knew she would follow through with her threat, she was more than cruel enough to and you couldn’t live with that guilt.

“Ooh, struck a cord, I see,” Rei smirked as she twisted her toe on your lips, sweat and grime oozing down onto your tongue, burning your mouth. “Perhaps I should bring her in anyways, just to see what happens.”

Finally, any semblance of courage you had was crushed. You broke down, a sobbing wreck as you realized that Rei would not stop, there would be no line she would not cross and you and Mary would be tortured by her forever. All because of some dumb curiosity you had cooked up for yourself.

You stared up at Rei's cruel face with tear soaked eyes, and you considered that she was all you would ever see again. You would never see friends or family, only this unholy abomination and her repulsive feet.

You would never smell freshly cut grass, or your mother’s cooking. There would only be Rei’s burning odor in your nostrils.

And you again taste pie, or steak, or ice cream. Because the taste of Rei’s sweat and toejam would forever fill your mouth.

Your spirit finally broken to the sound of the ghost woman’s incessant, mocking laugh, you begged. “Please, just stop!” You screamed, your voice cracking through sobs and whimpers. “Just let me go! I want to go home!”

Rei stared back at you with the creepiest look of self-satisfaction you had ever seen as she slowly began pushing her big toe down into your mouth.

“No! NO! Please stop!” You begged, but your only response was a smug giggle and a soul crushingly nasty gagging as Rei’s big toe slid over your taste buds.

You panicked at the full taste of her toe as her sweat burned in your mouth, the sour taste contorting your face as you cried for help that you knew was not coming.

“Shh… Shh… Shhhh…” Rei mocked as she pressed the bottom of her toe against your tongue before wriggling it all over your mouth.

Every time you would recoil your tongue Rei would reach further down your throat to wrap it around her toe again. All the while she fingered herself, staring you in the eyes, fueled by your fear.

You could swear that this should have killed you. It was like acid in your mouth, but it would not actually damage you, it would only make you suffer the burning sensation and the disgust, knowing that it came from the ghost’s feet.

Rei pulled her toe from your mouth and reveled in your continued cries as you pleaded with her to stop.

“Please, just let me go!” You screamed, your voice hoarse as you still choked on her vile sweat and toejam.

“Oh, I would. But your mouth gives me such a good foot cleaning,” Rei moaned, shuddering as she remained on the cusp of orgasm.

Lifting her toes again, you were once more gagged by her foot, as all five of her grungy toes brutally dominated your mouth.

You screamed and sobbed incomprehensibly as your body began convulsing and sputtering from the unfathomable nastiness.

Rei spread and wriggled her toes in your mouth as her chest rose and fell in climax. And as she reveled in your horror, her moans turned to ghostly laughter.
115122121121.title: Despair Beneath the Ghost's Feet (Pt. II)

choices: It Leads Mary to You and Rei
It Leads to Something Else
1151221211211.content:
Tears streamed down Mary’s red and tortured face as she sat bound, naked and humiliated in a dark, oppressive room, choking on the burning, sour taste of the ghost’s sweat soaked sock. Each second, she shuddered as the seemingly endless stream of Rei’s sweat and grime trickled down her throat, unable to even spit the vileness out, as the gag ensured.

And all the while her nose was scorched by the rancid stench of the ghost’s foul, and well worn shoe that had been bound to her head. Every time Mary looked down into it, she saw the large, black imprint of her tormentress’ foot, and every time she nearly felt she was going to hurl from the nastiness.

But by far the most potent torment that the malevolent spirit had inflicted upon Mary was being ever projected in front of her by the only light source in the room. An old television set flickered lightly before her, continuously broadcasting your torture at Rei’s disgusting feet for Mary to watch. And all in real time.

Each time Mary heard you sob beneath the ghost’s feet she grunted in rage and struggled against her binds. And each time she wracked her brain a bit harder for a way out, although she remained skeptical if she would even find where you were being kept in this labyrinth of a house.

Still, she knew she had a moral obligation not to leave you to this barbaric torture. She should have talked you out of this foolish endeavor, on the fucking spot. It was one thing for you to be unaware of the horrors that a monster could inflict, but Mary had first hand experience. And worse, was that she knew exactly why she had been so eager to march with you into the jaws of this hell. It had been only for her rage, and her desire to inflict some petty vengeance on the monstrous populace. And to her shame, Mary realized she was not entirely oblivious to this fact as she agreed to assist you.

But as Mary retched at the taste of sweat soaked sock wedged into her maw, she continued to work at her binds, contorting herself to try and pull herself free. Using a trick she had learned years ago, she began twisting her wrists around to expand the binds as she had since Rei had left her alone, and then she relaxed them before pulling free.

Finally, with the binds off of her, and her hands free to move as the pleased, Mary wasted no time in frantically pulling the reeking shoe off of her face. And then coughing the rancid sock out of her mouth.

Coughing and gagging freely as the ghost’s repulsive footwear slapped onto the floor, Mary shuddered slightly at the sight of it, spitting incessantly in a desperate attempt to get the taste out of her mouth. But it did not take Mary long to realize that the taste was not leaving anytime soon, although not for her lack of trying to be rid of it.

Wiping her mouth, Mary struggled slightly not to make too much noise for risk of the unclean specter hearing and coming to investigate. Even though she somewhat doubted the ghost would leave you unless she felt it was urgent.

Gingerly rubbing her wrists, the skin raw as she winced slightly.

Undoing the ropes around her ankles, Mary stood and began moving around the room, feeling about with her hands to find where the vile spirit had hidden her things.

Of course, Rei had made a large show of stomping the camera you and Mary planned to use into bits, but Mary had more than one trick up her sleeve.

Several moments of wandering about the room later, the only sounds to accompany her being your tortured sobs from the television set and her own unsteady breathing, Mary's hand fell onto the familiar feeling of her backpack.

Finding the zipper, she reached inside to grab her cell phone, which the phantom seemed to have left untouched, likely due to her ignorance over what it was, and what the device was capable of. She guessed that Rei hadn't likely left these halls for centuries, so it was no surprise that the significance of modern technology was lost on her.

Turning it on, it provided her with at least enough light to make out what was in front of her. And while it would not be as effective as the old camera, since the image it would take would lack the physical solidity, it would bind the ghost to the material realm at least for a very short while. Which should have been enough time to whack her over the head to daze her and then bind her to something. Even literally if that was what she had to resort to. It was a crude method that could easily go wrong if Rei proved to be the stubborn type. But Mary had her ways to draw submission from unruly monsters. And just to add insult to injury, Mary had chosen to pull out her own shoelace to be used as the binding agent for her spell.

Putting on her clothes, Mary began searching for the exit. It didn't take her long to find it, but the door was, predictably, locked. Mary sighed, having hoped that Rei really was so arrogant as to leave the door wide open. But she seemed to be quite a bit smarter than Mary would have liked.

Pulling a hairpin from her head she began working to pick the lock. It took her several minutes but eventually to door creaked open.

Slowly making her way out into the maze of dark, narrow corridors, armed with only her phone, shoelace, and her wits. Mary was quite deliberate with each step she took, careful not to make any sounds.

Finally emerging into back into the lobby where you and she first entered, the first thing she noted was the lack of any doors or windows now. It was like a prison, or a tomb.

Mary turned as a faint sound like a cry for help echoed through the house. Frantically trying to locate the sound, Mary choose the corridor it seemed the be coming from and began marching down it.
1151221211211.title: Mary's Torture/The Great Escape

choices: It was a Trap Set By Rei!
Someone Else Trapped!
11512212112112.content: When Mary got to the end of the Corridor She open'd the door at the end to find...
11512212112112.title: It Leads to Something Else

choices: Left
Right
Top
1152.content:
You were so brave and great you didn't need anybody to go with you, knowing that you are the only backup you'll ever need. As you go up the steps to the Mansion, you looked inside making sure it was clear. You couldn't make out what was inside because of the planks that boarded up the place, though you didn't care about it so you made your way to the door. Once you opened it, it creaked loudly: "Oh my, this got interesting, hope no "monster girl" heard it". Before going inside you remembered that in some old folk stories, the doors shut for no reason and that you were locked inside in places like this, so you looked around for a big rock and put in between the doorway just case anything happens. As you walked in you also remembered that Ghosts feed off fear or something along those lines so you took a deep breath and put your chin up high and prepared for anything.

The Mansion was very dark: "I should have brought a lighter or a small flashlight to see where I am going, I don't want to use up my pow-" The lights turned on. "er-Okay, the kid was right, there is a monster girl somewhere here, time for a brave face!" You prepared your dagger as well as the sacred objects, you walk inside the Mansion. The place looked well maintained for no humans living here, there is two hallways on the bottom floor and one large staircase leading up to left and right stairs. From telling from the outside before stepping in, you believe it has three floors. Though as you walk in, it begs the question, why hasn't this place not been checked upon by the village? As you took another step the door behind you made a big bang. Bang "WHAT?" you looked shocked and confused, you ran to the door to try and open it but it was shut tight, you tried using your dragger but it made no effect on the door and so did the sacred objects. "Darn monster magic. How raw." As you made your comment a female laughter was heard in the mansion, you had only one opinion, take control of the ghost to get out or die in this place.

There are two rooms on the left and right side in the bottom floor and an upstairs.

Which way should I go?
1152.title: Go It Alone (I Take My Hat Off in Respect... RE...

choices: To Galdran!
To the mountain caves!
Reader's choice
Reader's choice
Reader's choice
12.content:
Your name is Mary. You used to serve as a priestess-in-training for your village, but that changed when your temple burned down overnight. Nobody wanted to admit it, but the truth hung over everyone’s heads: the fire was the work of the monster girl empire, and they were trying to instill fear among the peasants. You weren’t afraid, though. No, you were angry. It wasn’t enough for the monster girls to lure men away from your village, they had to take away what was most dear to you, what you spent your whole life working under. You have since forsaken the ways of the Goddess in favor of the ways of the sword and shield, though you have no doubt the Goddess approves of what you’re doing. When you turned 19, you decided it was time to leave the village and strike back at the vile beasts who have taken everything from you. You could either cut through the forest to Galdaran, where you may hope to gather support for your cause, or travel to the mountain caves in search of magical artifacts.

Where do you go?
12.title: Female

choices: A bunny girl!
A frog girl!
Reader's choice
121.content:
While the promise of treasure is enticing, you have no doubt the stronger monster girls call the mountain their home. Considering how you have never actually fought a monster girl, going to the mountain would be tantamount to suicide. There’s no need to throw away your life so soon.
While traveling down the road, you felt as if you were being watched. You chalked this up to paranoia and continued along the path. However, a rustling bush from the corner of your eye proved your suspicions correct. You tried to show no fear as you raised your sword to the bush. “S-show yourself, damnedable beast!” You cursed yourself for stuttering.

“Hehe, looks like you caught me, cutie~” The figure leapt from the bushes, revealing that she is actually…
121.title: To Galdran!

choices: ”I’ll strike you down where you stand, monster!”
This is too much for you, kneel before her feet
1211.content:
The figure that appeared before you was a bunny girl. She was about the same height as you, but that’s where the similarities end. She was covered in dark brown fur from head to toe, with some lighter brown patches across her body. Two perky rabbit hears stood out from her long, brown hair. Instead of a humanoid nose, she possessed a bright pink bunny nose with whiskers poking from them. Her large, perky breasts and childbearing hips made you feel… inadequate, to say the least. Lastly, she had very large, paw-like feet, leading to her innate jumping and kicking abilities. If you had to guess, they were about twice the size of your pair.

The bunny girl merely stood still as you sized her up, but she noticed you pause at her feet. Just as she expected. She smirked before she spoke to you in a flirtatious voice. “C’mon, you really think you can fight me with that dinky little thing? You and I both know I can just kick that out of your hands and down you in seconds.” You grimaced. You knew she was right, but you’d never go down without a fight. “Tell you what: my feet are tired and dirty from walking around. If you give them a nice tongue bath, I’ll let you go. If not, you can go toe-to-toe with me instead, and when I kick your tight little ass six ways to Sunday, I’ll make you my footslut permanently~”

There is absolutely no way you’d ever consider surrendering to this monster! Yet… there was something about her furry feet that you found alluring. You felt compelled to serve them, to suck them and clean the dirt from them and make the bunny girl happy… you shook the thoughts from your head. You know this has to be some sort of manipulative magic on the bunny girl’s part.

Meanwhile, the bunny girl impatiently tapped her foot while waiting for an answer. “Just get on your hands and knees when you’re ready…”
1211.title: A bunny girl!

choices: Yes, the bunny girl loses her balance and falls over!
No, she has you trapped underfoot!
12111.content:
You raise your sword defiantly. ”I’ll strike you down where you stand, monster!” You grit your teeth and take a defensive position.

"Oho, this one has a bit of fight in her," said the bunny girl with a bemused smile. "By the time I'm done with you, you're gonna wish you sucked on my toes on your own instead of me stuffing them into your mouth~" The smile shifted into an evil smirk as the bunny girl narrowed her eyes and rushed forward towards you.

Just as she said she would, she rushed right to your sword-wielding hand. You were a tad more clever than she gave you credit for. Before she was able to connect a kick to your hand, you spun slightly so your shield caught the blow. Just as you were ready to counter, a second kick hit your shield! The bunny girl sent kick after kick into your shield with no signs of slowing! It dawned on you that this was her plan all along: if she kept up the offensive, you could never get a blow in. You couldn't even take steps to retreat without risking your stance breaking. She had you trapped!

After a few dozen punishing kicks, your wooden shield couldn't take the pressure any longer. It shattered into pieces, leaving you wide open! With your stance staggered and with no shield, you were left wide open. The bunny girl gave you one final kick into your chest, this one much more forceful than the others. You were sent flying through the air, and to make matters worse, you dropped your sword during the tumble.

You tried to recompose yourself and hope to retreat, but the bunny girl was already over you. She dug her heel into your bosom, leaving her toes hanging over your nose, radiating their musky, yet strangely alluring scent. You grab into the bunny girl's ankle and shove with all your might, but the kick has left you severely weakened.

Are you able to remove the bunny girl's foot from your chest?
12111.title: ”I’ll strike you down where you stand, mons...

choices: ...in the bunny girl's warren!
...surrounded by the bunny girl's friends!
121112.content:
Unfortunately, that kick took to much out of you for you to put up a good struggle. Even though you pushed with every ounce of strength that dwelt within you, the foot wasn't going anywhere.

The bunny girl laughed triumphantly as you struggled. "I win! This is great, I haven't had a footslave in soooo long! How about you go ahead and give your new goddess's toes a kiss?"

Fuck. That. You'll die before you show submission to a horrible monster. And she calls herself your goddess? You already HAVE a goddess who is much more holy than this furred freak! You spit on her toes and glare with the force of a thousand suns at your captor. She merely looks down upon you with a slight frown. She's more disappointed than anything else.

"How barbaric... I suppose it can't be helped, though, humans are such stupid creatures! I'll just have to punish you until you get it right, startiiiiiiiiing... now!" As the bunny girl finished her sentence, her heel pressed into your throat as her toes cupped around your nose. You tried to gasp for breath, but her sole was blocking off your mouth. She's choking you! "Night night, sleep tight~" whispered the bunny girl in a sing-song voice. You flailed under her foot, but every second your spasms were cut shorter and shorter. After a few minutes of being suffocated, you blacked out...

When you awoke, you found yourself...
121112.title: No, she has you trapped underfoot!

choices: Daisy wants you to finish the job.
Jenny wants a piece of you!
1211121.content:
Your eyelids fluttered open as you regained consciousness. You weren't quite sure where you were, but judging by the dirt floors and wall, you could make an educated guess that you're in the bunny girl's warren, which is extremely bad news for you. Anywhere between four and forty bunny girls can inhabit a single warren, and they tend to share everything they have...

You tried to get up off the dirt floor, but you found that your hands and legs were tied together. Not only that, but your clothing has been confiscated as well! You try to move your hands to cover your shame, but it works as well as you'd expect. Naked, bound, and humiliated, you were left with very little options. You decided to do the only thing you really could do: you began to crawl. It was agonizingly slow, but every inch gained was an inch closer to freedom. The doorway (sans door, of course) was just a yard away. Past it were a series of tunnels, and past those, the rest of the world.

You were so deep in thought about your daring escape that you didn't notice the furred foot in front of you until you bumped into it. You looked up, only to make eye contact with the very same bunny girl that defeated you. She was accompanied by a slightly taller bunny girl. This one had white fur in contrast to the shorter girl's dark brown. Additionally, her ears flopped down the side of her head instead of standing erect like the brown one's. "I told you, Jenny, I got a real live human! She even crawled right to her goddess's feet!" bragged the brown bunny girl to the white one. "Huh, I thought you were exaggerating, but you really got one of the pinkies!" The taller white bunny girl, Jenny, put a hand on the brown rabbit girl's head and ruffled her hair, much to her displeasure. "Our little Daisy is all grown up now!"

"Jenny, I'm a GODDESS now!" whined Daisy. "Don't disparage me in front of my own subjects!" "Alright, alright. anything that makes you feel better. What does she do anyways, beside writhe around in the dirt?" Daisy looked at Jenny like she just asked a completely nonsensical question. "She licks feet, duh!" Daisy turned her attention to you. "Slave girl, kiss my toes!" You remained perfectly still, determined to keep what little dignity you had left. Daisy turned back to her bunny colleague. "Hehe, I'm still working on it." She turned back to you. "You DARE disobey me?" Daisy gave you a punishing kick to your ribs. Two of them easily cracked with the bunny girl's sheer force. You screamed out in pain, leaving Daisy ample opportunity to shove her toes into your mouth. The toes muffled your screeching, and Daisy's cheerful giggling drowned out any sounds you could possibly make. "See, look? She's happily sucking on my toes right now!"

"Sucking" was hardly the right word. It was more like drooling. You felt like you could vomit from the pain, but nothing was going to come up. Each and every breath struggled to get from your nose to your lungs. Despite laying perfectly still, your world was spinning. The pain from the kick was worse than any pain you've ever suffered in your entire life. Your body couldn't take it anymore. Your eyes closed and you let the relatively blissful peace of unconsciousness take you.

Jenny sighed. "I'll go get the bandages..."

When you awoke (again)...
1211121.title: ...in the bunny girl's warren!

choices: Daisy!
A dozen bunny girls!
12111212.content:
When you regained consciousness, you found yourself in a different part of the warren. It was a larger room with several piles of leaves, one of which you were laid upon. You figured that this is where the bunny girls sleep. You took a quick examination of yourself. You were still nude, but your bonds were gone, and your abdomen was wrapped up in bandages. Your ribs stung, but hardly hurt as much as they did when they were first broken.

You look up to see the white rabbit girl standing above you. "Feeling better, pet?" she asked you, teasingly. You tried to get up and give her a piece of your mind, but your ribs disagreed with you, and sent searing pain through your chest at the slightest movement. "Now, now. It'll take awhile for those to heal, but don't worry, you'll be able to serve us in no time! Now, as for payment for fixing you up..." Jenny puts her toes on your lips. Her white soles were stained brown with dirt, as expected for someone who lives in a very literally dirty home. "C'mon, give them a kiss, or I'll break you even worse..."

This was it. You couldn't fight anymore. Your breaths were still labored, anymore damage could possibly cause permanent damage, or even kill you. You pursed your lips and kissed Jenny's toes with a mwah sound. Jenny smiled at you. "Good, very good! This one has some hope for her yet! Now, stick out your tongue." You hesitate, but inevitably obey. Jenny takes your tongue between each of her white toes, flossing the dirt and toejam from inbetween each one. You wanted to cry from the foul taste, but you couldn't. Jenny stuffed her disgusting heel into your mouth, which caused you to gag. Jenny took great delight in torturing you with her dirty feet.

Before long, someone else entered the room. It was...
12111212.title: Jenny wants a piece of you!

choices: She lets you pass.
"Hmm... nope!"
12112.content:
You had to face the facts: the bunny girl is right. You're woefully unprepared to fight with a stronger monster girl. Maybe you could handle a goblin or an imp, but the bunny girl's strong feet would send you flying before you knew it. There's a time to fight, and there's a time to swallow your pride and live another day. You shudder, then fall to your hands and knees to the bunny girl's feet. You look up at her with fire in your eyes, and she returns the glare with a smug smirk of her own.

"Very good! Now, say ahhhh..."

You open your mouth, and its immediately violated by five dirty bunny toes. You gag involuntarily as the bunny girl wiggles her toes inside of your mouth. Their taste is salty, but for some reason, you don't entirely mind it. No, the worst part is the humiliation you're facing. Less than an hour into your quest and you've already thrown yourself to the feet of your enemy? The Goddess would surely be ashamed of you.

The bunny girl jostles her foot. "C'mon, I don't feel any licking. I want my feet cleaned!" You hesitantly run your tongue across the bunny girl's toes, removing the dirt from them. Your tongue finds its way to the crevices between the bunny's toes, where your tongue makes quick work of separating the dirt from the brown fur. The bunny girl removes her toes from your mouth and presents her sole. The brown sole is even browner due to the addition of dirt. It hangs inches away from your face, just barely out of reach.

"Now, I want you to beg for the privilege to lick my feet!"

You couldn't believe this! This bunny bitch was making you lick her feet, and she had the gall to make you beg for her? "Never, you disgusting creature!"

The bunny girl dropped her heel onto the back of your neck, slamming your head into the ground. You yelped from the pain. "Oh, really? It's either that, or I stomp your pathetic body into the dirt. Now, I'll let you back up when I hear some begging~"

You grit your teeth and began to beg. "Puh... P-please let me lick your feet..."

"Okay, just because you asked! Not everyone gets to suck on my perfect paws, it's honestly the highest honor for a dirty human~"

The bunny girl lifted her heel from your head and presented her sole to you again, this time in reach of you. You stuck out your tongue and began lapping at the sole. The darker brown of her sole gave out to lighter brown as the dirt cleared away. The entire process was repeated for the second foot: the toe sucking, the disparaging begging, the sole licking, the horrible, callous laughter of the bunny... the worst part? Even after you were done, you still had the dirty, musky taste of feet in your mouth, as if it was an invisible scar to remind you of the deeds you just performed... or, it'll probably come out with water.

At any rate, you rise to your feet, albeit a little shaken from your experience. You steady yourself and face the bunny girl who looks at you with smug satisfaction. "Wow, I haven't had a human lick my feet that well in ages. You really have a carrer ahead of you in foot-licking!" Your anger began to boil over as you shouted at the bunny. "Remove yourself from the path, you beast!"

How does the bunny girl respond?
12112.title: This is too much for you, kneel before her feet

choices: The next day...
Something happens during the night!
121121.content:
The bunny girl steps off the path, fading back into the foliage from whence she came. Before disappearing from your view, she looked over her shoulder at you with a smirk and said "If you ever come to your senses and realize you need these sweet feet, you know where to find me~"

You gripped the hilt of your sword and seethed silently. You continued walking down the path while constantly watching your back for monsters. You were wary before the encounter with the bunny girl, but now you were downright paranoid. Every rustle of a tree branch caused by a stray bird sent shivers up your spine. You knuckles turned white with their forceful grip on your sword.

Dusk was fast approaching, and the light filtering through the trees shone less and less. Thankfully, Galdaran was naught but a stone's throw away. You approached the towering city gates with wonder. You've certainly never seen anything like this back at home. Before you could pass through, a guard... splashed you with water? Great, now you were tired AND wet. "Hey, what was that for?" you shout at him?

"Sorry, ma'am, but we've received reports of succubi disguising themselves as human to pass through and spirit men away from their homes. Considering your skin didn't melt off your bones after being exposed to holy water, you must be human. You may pass, and enjoy your stay in Galdaran." You grumbled in response as you passed through the gates. You were hardly in the mood for pleasantries.

Even at this time of day, Galdaran was bustling. Couples were walking the cobblestone streets, merchants on carpets were hocking their exotic goods, and patrons were passing in and out of brightly-lit taverns. Speaking of which, you sure were thirsty. Besides, you needed something to wash the taste of feet out of your mouth. You walked into the first one you saw. Strangely enough, it was called "The Needy Harlot". Seedy, yes, but any port in a storm. Despite the name, the atmosphere was surprisingly nice, rather than the den of debauchery you were expecting. The red-haired busty barmaid greeted you as you took a seat at the bar. "Welcome to the Needy Harlot, what can I get for you?"

"A flagon of ale and a room for the night, please."

"Aaaaaaaallright, that'll be five gold pieces!" You slide her the gold pieces, and she slides you a room key in return. She made small talk with you as she poured your ale. "So, where're you from, stranger?"

"A small hamlet to the west."

"Oh, did you get an itch to see how us cityfolk live?"

"Actually, I'm here as part of a journey to slay the monster queen."

The barmaid looked at you funny. "You? No offense hon, but you're a tad wiry. Some of the bigger monsters would crush you into submission!" You glared at the barmaid in return. "The monster girls have taken everything from me, and I'm ready to die if it means I can drag a few monster girls to hell."

"Whatever you say, hon," uttered the barmaid as she sat down the flagon of ale in front of you. "Just remember, there's worse things than death out there. Watch yourself."

You would've asked her what she meant by that if you weren't so thirsty. You downed the flagon quickly and retreated to your room. There wasn't much to it: A bed that can comfortably fit two, a chest with a latch to fit your belongings in, and a sole window that looked out onto the city. You tossed your sword and shield into the chest and crawled into bed. The day's events left you exhausted, and you were ready to sleep. Tomorrow, you'll have your bearings regained, and hopefully you can recruit some adventurers to aid you in your cause.
121121.title: She lets you pass.

choices: Start by going to blacksmith's place to get better equipment!
Start by looking around the tavern for adventurers to join you!
Start by going to local temple, perhaps priestesses will offer you advice.
1211211.content:
You managed to get a fairly good night's sleep, though you did have a dream about your experience with rabbit girl's feet on your way... but you knew you couldn't let a little failure like that dissuade you from your ultimate goal. As you got up from the bed and started putting your gear back on, you wondered about where should you go now. There were quite a few options, since Galdaran was a pretty big city.

You could try visiting local blacksmith and trying to get yourself some better gear to fight the monster girls. You didn't have much money, but hopefully it would be enough for at least semi-decent armor and sword.

You could also start by trying to recruit some adventurers to join you in your cause. It wouldn't be easy considering that even the barmaid made fun of your idea yesterday... but perhaps with right amount of persuasion and drunken ale, you would be able to gather some people to help you out?

Last but not least, an idea crossed your mind, perhaps priestesses in the temple would be able to help you out? Although you abandoned your training to become one of them after the raid which left the temple in your village burned to the ground, they could probably provide you if not with help, then at least with useful advice what to do next in your quest to take down the Monster Girl Empire.

With those options in your mind, you went downstairs and as you were approaching the door to the inn you finally decided to...
1211211.title: The next day...

choices: You need that equipment... agree to the deal, and pamper Keira's feet!
You aren't going to humiliate yourself like that again! You get out of there!
You refuse... but Keira won't give up, and will force you to lick her feet!
12112111.content:
In the end, it made most sense to first get properly equipped for your quest before doing anything else. With that in mind, you followed the signs in the city leading to a blacksmith's workshop. It didn't take you too long to find it, along with a pretty fancy sign outside saying "Burning Scales Blacksmith! Best steel in whole Galdaran!".

You went inside through the front door, and your eyes opened wide as soon as you noticed the figure sitting at the desk... it was a monster girl! She had tan skin with visible brown scales on some of her body(Especially her arms) clad into light metal armor stylized to look like part of her scales, it also left very little to the imagination, she had a long red hair tied in a ponytail. For a moment you thought that she could be a dragon... one of the strongest types of monster girls, what would she be doing in middle of a city like that? Did she took over the blacksmith and held the owner hostage or something?

The monster girl didn't seem to have noticed you enter, she was sitting rather casually with her bare feet propped up on the desk, reading some kind of book related to blacksmithing techniques. Her feet similar to human's yet with distinct sharp claws instead of normal nails, as well as some visible scales on their tops. The soles glistened slightly from sweat, but she seemed unbothered about showing them off like that...

However just as you moved, hesitating whether or not to leave the building, the red haired seemed to have heard your steps and put down her book, looking straight at you.
"Welcome to my workshop! Wanna buy something?" The monster girl said, flashing a grin towards you while still keeping her feet on the desk, she didn't seem hostile though
"Your workshop? But you are..." You started saying in surprise but the red haired monster girl interrupted
"Yeah yeah, I'm a salamander. I assume you must be new in town then?" The monster girl rolled her eyes, she must have been getting surprised people like that a lot
"Y-yeah. I just never seen a monster girl peacefully coexisting with humans before." You replied honestly
"Haha! If you told me that few years ago, I would totally agree! You see, it's kinda long story, but to put it shortly, old man who owned that workshop before saved my life, and pretty much raised me as his daughter, so once he was gone... I decided to take over his business." The monster girl said, only losing her grin for a moment when mentioning the old man being gone
"And it's not like I am some kinda special case, there are a few other monster girls living here in town. It's not like all of us serve the Monster Queen you know?" The salamander continued after a moment, still keeping her confident grin

You were certainly surprised to hear that, after the raid on your village you tended to see all monster girls as evil, you would never imagine that some of them would actually be allowed to live among humans.
"Anyway, you can call me Keira, the best blacksmith in Galdaran! So what is it that you came here for?"The salamander finally introduced herself, and once again asked
"Well... I was hoping to get myself some new armor, and perhaps decent sword and shield? The ones I have are a bit old and rusty..." You said
"Aye, I could see that. Full set like that is gonna cost quite a bit though... you sure you have enough coin for that?" The salamander girl asked, clearly judging based on your clothes
"How much is needed?" You asked
"A completely new light armor, a good blade and shield... I reckon it's gonna be about 500 gold pieces." Said the salamander after thinking for a moment
Your eyes open wide, obviously you didn't have that kind of money.

"And what could I get for about... 100 gold pieces?" You ask a bit nervously upon checking your finances
"A brand new frying pan maybe?" The salamander girl said a bit jokingly
"Dammit... I guess I will be leaving then." You say in resigned tone, but just as you about to turn, you notice the salamander girl thinking about something for a moment, and turning towards you again

"Hey! Wait a sec! I... might have a special deal for you." Said Keira grinning confidently... but this time there seemed to be a hint of a blush on her face
"Huh? Really?" You ask as you approach the desk again
"Aye! You will give me that 100 gold, and I will make you your brand new equipment... but in exchange you will worship my feet." The salamander girl's blush became more noticeable, but she didn't lose her confident grin as she pointed towards her bare feet with her scaly arm and wiggled her clawed toes teasingly
"W-what?!" You said at the sudden proposition
"Come on, it's a once-in-a-lifetime offer! You pamper my feet, and get nice equipment for less than half the price! If you are into this kind of stuff, then it's a total win-win for us both..." Keira said, her feet still propped up on the desk, flexing her toes, she seemed strangely excited about that idea... you knew that monster girls really enjoy all kinds of foot pampering, and living peacefully among humans Keira probably didn't have many occassions to get them worshipped... you definitely could use that equipment too, but is it worth humiliating yourself for it?
12112111.title: A monster girl Blacksmith?!

choices: You begin to worship her feet but can't continue, it is too horrible.
It is horrible but you suffer through it.
Surprise!  Another Monster Girl is there too, a two for one special?
121121111.content:
You saw her soles glistening with sweat. You saw the scales on the tops of her feet and the sharp talon like nails. The thought utterly revolts you. And yet... you have to better equipped! You have to be prepared for the vicious Monster Girls that you will need to face.

You look sick to your stomach as you glance from Keira's face to her feet and then back to her face.

"Ah, well, what exactly will I need to do? And for how long?

The Salamander Girl grinned. She knew she had you.

"You must be desperate! Well I am giving you a huge discount so I'll expect my money's worth. After I close up shop I'll take you to my room. There you will kiss my feet. You will lick my feet, all over mind you! You'll suck on my toes, careful with my nails, get them all perfectly clean. I'll even have you massage my feet too. All in all it will take at least 4 to 5 hours. But after that you can pay me the 100 gold and then you'll be on your way with a fantastic deal. Now do we have a deal human?"

You feel your stomach do flips but you had no choice. You needed better equipment!

"Yes, we have a deal."

"All right then come back here in an hour. I wouldn't eat too much because humans tend to have an adverse reaction to licking my soles, something about my inner heat causing them to sweat like crazy leading to pretty raunchy taste. Don't be late."

You promise you won't and grab a small bite to eat. You take a deep breath and go back in, ready to earn your gear.
121121111.title: You need that equipment... agree to the deal, a...

choices: Approach the scary looking female(Erza from Fairy Tail)
Approach the strangely dressed catgirl!(Nia from Xenoblade 2)
Sit alone and have a drink, maybe someone else will come in a moment.
12112112.content:
Perhaps it wasn't wise to try recruiting people for your cause when you are not properly equipped, but fact of the matter is that you have very limited money at the moment, definitely not enough for a good set of armor and weapons. Perhaps if you found some companions they would help you out financially as well.

It doesn't take you long to locate a tavern, it's easy to spot thanks to already having a few obviously drunk people outside of it, despite it still being morning...
You pass next to those, not paying much attention to them, and walk inside. The place is actually not too shabby despite the few drunks outside. Due to the early hour however, there aren't many people you would take in mind when considering your choices for potential companions in your quest.

First person to catch your eye was a beautiful red haired female in an armor, she was sitting at one of the tables and eating what seemed to be strawberry cake... despite that rather innocent choice of food however, there was certain scary aura emanating from her that made you feel like she isn't someone to be messed with. You decided to quickly look somewhere else, not wanting to annoy her by staring blankly.

Before noticing your second choice, you actually spotted what seemed to be a big white tiger standing near one of the tables, it was only a moment after that you noticed there was actually someone near that animal. To your surprise the person near it was actually a catgirl! She was wearing rather strange yellow colored outfit. She had beige colored shoulder length hair, with visible cat ears, for some reason however, it didn't seem like she had a tail... unless she kept it under her clothes for one reason or another.

Either way, of all the guests in the tavern, pretty much only those two stood out as capable to help you in your quest... you can try approaching one, or perhaps just sit alone and wait if someone else won't come by?


Pictures of the crossover characters:

Erza  

Nia  (She also has her blade Byakko/Dromarch with her, but he isn't important enough to the story to get a pic, "big white tiger" is all we need here)
12112112.title: Looking for companions!(Crossover characters)

choices: Walk up to the Baroness
Keep away from the crazy and keep drinking
121121123.content:
You shake your head as you walk through the building, realizing the folly of asking them for help in your crusade. The first one looked like she would chop you up for even approaching her and there was no telling wether the cat girl was a spy for 'you know who.' Deciding to wait and see if anyone else of a more suitable nature would come through the door, you sit yourself down on the well crafted chair next to you. As you turn towards the door, you are quickly approached by the bar maiden who took a swift moment to joke about you once more before offering you a drink.

You were swallowing down your 2nd glass of hard Apple cider when a commotion was heard coming from outside, telling and screaming of some kind. You considered getting up but as you listened closer, the yelling sounded kind of....whiny...and only from one person. Within seconds, the door to the tavern slammed open. In it's way was a tall, sender figure hosting a furious face. This face quickly subsided as she walked into the tavern, with all eyes on her. In this den of beer and less than high society, she stuck out with a pink, almost regal gown and a cone hat you remember seeing in pictures of princesses. Around her pink arm was a rather large candy large, held closely and if it was a real cane. "Good evening miss." The newcomer spoke in an upper crust tone, "My name is Baroness Von Bon Bon, I require two things from you and I would like them chop chop. One, an understanding of where in Dice' s name I am and one glass of your most high vintage soda if you please." The woman at the counter blushed with indignation, obviously not taking kindly to the additude of this newcomer. "Listen Miss Pink Skin, I don't know who think you are but I put up with quite a few weirdos here in Galdran. But I will not be talked down to by come candy colored, poorly dressed.....

Before the server had any time to finish her sentance, Miss....Bon Bon swirled her candy cane about until she held it with both hands. It was then you saw the small hole in the bottom, which quickly shot out multicolored....somethings with surprising force. The bullets spread out as if having minds of thjer own, hitting the exit sign, a spitoon, and your empty mug. Swinging her stick back towards the server with feverish yellow eyes and a very disturbing grin, sat down at the bar. "Must I make myself any clearer than that?" The server silently disappeared under the counter, her hands giving a rolled up map and a bottle. This Baroness had calmed down, and you were certainly intrigued.

https://www.google.com/search?q=baroness...
121121123.title: Sit alone and have a drink, maybe someone else ...

choices: Uneventful wall leads to more discussions
Already you are jumped by a monster girl
1211211231.content: For a short moments, you were stone. A combination of both the mug shattering in front of you and the shots pulled off by this Baroness created a mix of fear and admiration in you. And if she could do that to a human she wasn't even aiming for, your mind whirred at the thought of what it could do when aimed between the eyes of whatever monster came across your path! You knew that, at the very least, you had to try and talk to her. If nothing else, she might tell you where she found that impressive weapon. Taking a breath, you stood up and sauntered towards where the pink woman was sitting with the map in hand. "Excuse me...miss?" Von Bon Bon said nothing, more than likely she didn't hear you. Taking a chance, you reached out to tap her on the shoulder. All it took was one tap when it seemed her head decided to be an owl as it spun around to face you. "Listen to me very carefully you guttersnipe, I am new in this land I admit but no one and I mean no one touches my dress without permission. I will forgive you just this once if you can tell me where here is..." Bon Bon pointed to the center of a large cross on the map; The Queen's Castle. "That miss..." "Either address me by my full name or Madame if you please." "...Madame, that is the location of the home of the Monster Girl Queen. It's out farther west but..." "There's a good girl." Rolling up the map, Bon Bon pulled herelf from her seat, slapped a golden mint on the counter and headed for the door. You quickly followed after her, trying to keep her attention. "Baroness Von Bon Bon, the land is treacherous and filled with horrible monsters. You can't possibly make it on your own." Bon Bon raised her candy cane back up, her head turning back to you. "Are you implying that I cannot defend myself?" "Of course not...but...I was planning on going that way myself to slay the horrid queen. But what matter do you have with her?" "That is a private matter." Bon Bon put her stick back down, eyeing you about. "Although you are right peasant. I suppose I could use a second wheel. I suppose you seem capable of being my temporary knight. Just remember who is in charge here and we can get along fine." Although this 'Baroness' mannerisms were already making you annoyed, you knew the old adage that beggers couldn't be choosers. And so you followed behind your new leader as she marched right out of Galdran.
1211211231.title: Walk up to the Baroness

choices: A carrot girl pops out of the ground
A slug girl passes, mistaking your duo as Monster and Slave
12112112311.content:
For almost an hour, you followed close behind the Baroness, watching the streamer on her hat fly in the same direction despite the changing winds. You had kept your weapon at your side, preparing yourself for whatever monsters would dare attempt to attack you...but none had come yet. All the while, Bon Bon kept up a simple pace with her candy cane back around her arm. No sounds besides the sounds of footwear against the dirt and normal birds chirping in the wind came about. Realizing you were safe for the moment, you cleared your throat.

"So Baroness Von Bon Bon...where are you from?"

The pink woman turned her head to you in an uninterested glance before rolling her eyes and silently turning back. Your lips curled into a pout, this woman was just not a people....whatever she was.

"If you do not mind my asking, what business do you have with the queen of the/"

"/Queen?! Ha!"

Bon Bon's head spun back around, the unsettling grin from before back again.

"That redixulaous charlatan is the reason I have been dumped into this horrid land in the first place! I am going to see that brute suffer and/"

"You've seen the Monster Queen?" Bob Bon stopped dead in her tracks, only giving you a second to react before you nearly brush against her dress. Turning her whole body around, she grabbed you by the cheeks with one hand and spoke in a voice like black licorice.

"I shall only say this once girl. A knight is not to speak out of turn with thier better. Certainly not a baroness like me, understood?"

Honestly the words you wanted to say were quite foul and deragatory along with dismissive of her behavior. But the cold and piercing glow of her yellow eyes could only make you nod your head.

"Good girl, to awsner your question; yes. I was in my castle, attempting to calmly celebrate the freeing of my soul from a rather unscrupulous sort when I was brought into a throne room far unlike my own. The very nerve of that freak, attempting to entice me into 'partnership' as she called it with my freedom and her horrid feet as bargining chips. Naturally I decided such crassness could only be awsnered by execution but I soon found myself at the mercy of this brutish slime which catapulted me around here. I am going to give that fake queen a piece of my mind and force her to take me home. I mean the cheek of that oohhh..."

Bon Bon continued rambling to herself, something about candied yams and cups or whatever. You paid little attention to her, especially when the hairs on the back of your neck began to creep up.
12112112311.title: I meant walk...anyways

choices: She grabs the carrot feet and forces them down your throat
She orders you to clean her feet, though not without disgust
121121123111.content:
Once more you brandish your staff-like weapon and constantly gaze at your surroundings. Still mumbling to herself, the Baroness is unaware of her passing a particularly high patch of 'grass' Within seconds however, bith of you were instantly aware of a large mound of dirt blasting away as a figure obscured by the dirt came out. As you wiped the earth from your eyes, you had only a short time to examine the creature before you. She was a tall and rather slender sort, her grassy hair a dead giveaway to her orange body. Her big eyes stared right into your own as she tackled you. "Hey there cutie, ya ever hear that my mind a good for your eyes?" You say nothing to the carrot girl as you try to struggle in her grip. "Hmm...no? Well than get ready cause after you taste my glorious feet, all you'll care to see is why you and your girlfriend over there belong to me." "Girlfriend?!" Your yell of confusion and anger proved to be unwise as your mouth was soon filled with with the filthy feet of the carrot. "Go ahead girl, eat your vegtables, they are good for you after all." You could feel the girl trying to scrap her ankles against your teeth, tricking you into biting them off. Looking about, you spot Von Bon Bon a few feet away glancing not at you but at the dirt covering her dress. You roll your eyes as the carrot girl keeps trying to push her dirt covered feet farther into your mouth. You could already feel some flakes coming of them as your teeth betray your unwantingness to eat her horrid feet. "Bon Bon!" You mumble, trying to catch her attention."I could use a little help here!" Bon Bon still said nothing, though her face had turned from horrified to clearly upset. "Forget her and listen to me cute stuff, I just might introduce you to some of my other friends when I'm done with you both. Oh it would be like having a big ol' bowl of vegetable..."

The sound pierced your ears, coming without warning and silencing your captor. The large carrot fell to the ground, wind whistling through it's three new holes. You pull the earthy feet out of your mouth, taking a second to notice the two inch gash she made with your teeth, another few seconds and you would have fallen for sure. "Look at this..." You turned to Bon Bon, wiping the dirt away from her clothes with limited results. "My dress is ruined. This is all your fault! It's a good thing you aren't a knight because failure to protect your Baroness on such a level would get you imprisonment where I live. The whole reason I allowed you to follow me was to protect me from those things and a fine job you're doing so far." "Now you hold on just a minute!" Your temper up and smile turned down, you begin stomping towards the brat. "First of all, I was the one who invited you on this quest of mine. You just took the reigns and started acting like you own me. Secondly, you were the one in front. "Thirdly, I'm gonna take a small guess and say that back wherever you live, your just as bratty and selfish with everyone else who crosses your path. I mean I was almost brainwashed by a monster and all you can do is stand there and worry about your dress. In fact, I am almost willing to bet you just foisted the title of Baroness on yourself to fool others to think you're important!" As you take a breath from your yelling, you notice Bon Bon' s face. It seemed almost...alien to everything else you've seen from her in the short time you've seen her. You couldn't tell if she was dumbfounded or upset but you could tell she was holding in something. "You...rude....such intolerance of your superior shall not go unpunished...and I have the perfect punishment for one such as yourself...."
121121123111.title: A carrot girl pops out of the ground

choices: I never want to be under those or any feet again...
Her feet, like any monster girl's, were now on your mind
1211211231112.content: Before you could say anything more to the Baroness, she pulls her cane across your legs and brings you back to the ground. "Under all other circumstances, what I am about to do is very unbecoming of myself. However, seeing as you have a problem with feet...." Bon Bon raised her blouse, revealing she had kicked off her heels and was now about to pit your face against her small feet. "You are punished to endure mine!" You try to swerve yoir head to the side but no chance as a candy cane keeps your head in line as your face is now being pressed down, though rather lightly. Her small toes wiggle slightly, constantly scrunching up and retreating. "Believe me, I do not like this, but it is the only way a rude, unloyal, peasant like you seems to punished in this land." "You cannot help but take a whiff as her smooth foot shuffles across your face. You had expected a scent of some kind of candy, but instead the subtle aromas of lavender and cake attack your senses. Nevertheless, you continue struggling if only through reflexes of feet. All the while, you can hear the Baroness groan with disgust. "Honestly, the things one must do to keep the servants in line. If Sally ever finds this out, I might never hear the end of it. Just knowing my feet are pressed against this girls face....NO this is her punishment. She certainly doesn't seem to like it...the way she struggles and weighs under my foot...what is it about feet in this world? Whatever? What time is it? A few minutes?..." The pink appendage quickly lifts itself from your face, finding its way back into it's shoe. "I hope you have learned your lesson girl, because the time will only increase if I have to do that again. Now let's get moving, the map says there is only one village on this journey and we're about to hit it." You nod, picking yourself up and shivering as you follow behind the woman...all the while realizing..

12112113.content:
Your measly 100 gold pieces won't be enough for good equipment, and trying to recruit people to your cause as you look now doesn't seem like a wise idea.
With no better alternative at the moment, you decide to go towards the local temple, hoping to get a blessing or at least advice from locall priestesses. However, as you are approaching the large temple, much bigger than the one which was in your home village, you can't help but notice a rather strange sight.
In front of the entrance there was a tall armored female warrior  with long blonde hair, and there wouldn't be anything too odd about her if not for the visible wings growing from her back. At first you thought it must be a decoration,,, but they seemed to move slightly from time to time, just like a part of the body would.
Could it be the imposing woman was a monster of some kind? But then why would she be allowed at the temple?

"Have you never seen a Valkyrie before?" A voice suddenly spoke next to you, making you jump in surprise!
"Hehe, sorry for scaring you, but I couldn't help but see you staring at the Valkyrie staying at our temple." The voice belonged to a cheerful looking young woman, dressed in strangely skimpy version of a typical priestess outfit, she had long pink colored hair.
"Oh... um, well I never knew monster girls were allowed into the temples." You reply to the young priestess
"Valkyries aren't considered monsters though, didn't you know? Most of the angels, while rare and sharing characteristics with monster girls, aren't considered a part of them. At least if they don't become corrupted through becoming addicted to human spirit energy, only then they become considered actual monster girls." Explained the young priestess

"I see..." You answer, the rarity of the angels definitely explain why you never heard of them during your training as a priestess, probably only temples in biggest cities like Galdran are lucky enough to have an actual angel in their temple.

"She is not the only angel at the temple either! I am actually a houri  , a servant of the goddess of love. You can call me Hana!" Said the girl whom you assumed to be a priestess
"Huh?!" You gasp in surprise, you never thought that the girl you talked to was an angel! She didn't even have visible wings.
"Don't worry, a lot of people doesn't notice that in my case. As a lower ranked servant of the goddess of love, my wings aren't visible most of the time."Said Hana

"Is this temple ran entirely by you two?" You asked, as you didn't see any other priestesses nearby
"Oh, no, the human priestesses are just in the temple at the moment preparing it for the believers today, they don't let us angels work too much for them. By the way, why did you decide to visit the temple?" The pink haired angel asked curiously
"Well... to be honest I want to destroy the monster girl empire. But I wanted a blessing and advice from the temple first." You explained honestly, not wanting to lie or hide anything from an angel
"Ohhh... Kasandra will surely be interested to hear that! The duty of Valkyries is to find and guide heroes that will save the world from the darkness, currently represented by the Monster Queen. She is a bit of a stick in the mud, and might try to test you at first, but will definitely help you!" Said the houri girl and then seemed to think for a moment
"Oh! And I can give you a blessing! Being blessed even by a low-ranking angel like me is much stronger than ones by most human priestesses!" The pink haired angel added after a moment

"Really, you would just do that?" You asked, a bit surprised how helpful the angel girl was
"Yes, you seem like a pure soul, so I see no problem with that! There's only one detail you might not like..."Said Hana
"What is it?"You asked
"Well... since I am servant of goddess of love, I can only give blessing through intimate physical contact. Don't worry though! We wouldn't have to go all the way... the priestesses in here would probably disapprove too. But it should be enough if you could worship my feet?" Said the angel girl, with a slightly uneasy smile
Your eyes open wide, it does make some sense... and certainly it's not as humiliating to worship a divine being's feet instead of random monster... but did you really want to do that? Perhaps it would be better to go straight to the valkyrie girl and ask for guidance in your quest?

"They aren't dirty, I promise!" Hana added and raised her foot covered only by a sandal to give you a better view... it seemed just like normal human's, although with certain divine aura to it... definitely much nicer than the vile foot of that rabbit girl you met on your way there, but still... were you ready to slightly humiliate yourself again? Even if it was to gain a blessing and not technically forced?

Seeing your hesitation, Hana retracted her foot.
"No pressure of course, I understand it might be a bit much to get a blessing." She said smiling kindly
12112113.title: An interesting visit to the temple...

121121132.content:
"Sorry Hana, I think I will go talk to the Valkyrie first." Hana looks at you with a slightly disappointed face, "oh, alright then... They can be quite bold though..." You wave at Hana, "think I'll be fine, thanks!" Filled with confidence, you approach the Valkyrie in front of the entrance.

You bow before the Valkyrie and ask: "Hello madam, may I ask you a question?" The Valkyrie looks at you with an unimpressed expression, "Yes human. Ask." You reply: "Do you know where I could receive a blessing for my adventures?" The Valkyrie then looks you in the eyes with a determined look on her face. She raises her voice, "Yes human! You can receive the blessing of the Valkyrie from none other than me, Kasandra, one of the Valkyrie maiden. All you have to do is complete our ritual. If you are good enough, you get our blessing, if not, then you will remain in the Valkyrie's possession."

She slams the bottom of her spear on the ground and takes a step towards you, "what do you say, human? You want our blessing?"
121121132.title: You decide to approach the Valkyrie(Kasandra), ...

"Yes! Sign me up!" The Valkyrie finally shows a bit of emotion as a faint smile appears on her face, "good! Follow me then, brave human." You follow the Valkyrie into a shrine on the side. You see an old Nordic shrine, almost more like a ruin, as you enter, it is quite dark inside and it is not much bigger than an avarage living room. Kasandra then sits down on a stone bench next to an altar in the middle of the room. "touch the altar and say the following: "I dare partake in the test of the Valkyrie, may my soul be my bargain and the Gods my witness."

Hesitantly, you walk over to the altar and touch it with both of your hands, you then repeat the line Kasandra just told you. "I dare partake in the test of the Valkyrie, may my soul be my bargain and the Gods my witness!"

- Dzzzzzz

The altar glows with light and you feel your body changing, within a few seconds your body has shrunk rapidly. As of now, you are only about 7 inches tall. Kasandra then beckons you to move to her, "ready for your test then?" Like a small action figure you run over to Kasandra; "What happened to me?!"

Kasandra replies with a serious tone, "easy there human. This is part of the test. You have to be small and sturdy, which is what this ritual has made you." She then proceeds to take off one of her sandals and shows the sole to you.

In the sole of her sandal you see a big hole ranging from the heel-section to the toe-section, in the shape of a human body; Just about your size! "Get in here human." Kasandra's big hands forcibly pushes you towards her sandal and shoves you into the hole.

You are pushed firmly into the sole of Kasandra's sole, with your back on the bottom, facing upwards, your arms and legs spread. Then her foot lowers back onto the sandal, covering you entirely. Your feet are below her heel and your face is digging into the ball of her foot, right below her toes.

She then starts to tie the laces of her sandal very tightly, pressing you firmly against her foot. "Breathe human. A Valkyrie's scent is a blessing by itself." In your new prison, made of sandal leather and the foot of a Valkyrie, you breathe in through your nose. You moan a little bit from the enticing smell of the Valkyrie's sweat. "Yes human. You are my footwarmer now." She then stands up and the pressure on your body vastly increases.

"Let's go, I have work to do."

The pressure on your body increases even more as Kasandra starts to walk. "I am sure you will learn to love the smell and taste of my feet, they get very sweaty when I am on patrol." Kasandra picks up a steady pace.

Every step of the way her foot presses fully onto your body, digging your nose deeply into the sweaty and soft skin of her beautiful nordic feet. Kassandra then arches her foot and pressures her toes into the ground. Your head is now forced in between her index and her middle toe. "Lick in between that."

Who needs to defeat a monster queen if you can do this all day?! You start to lick the cravice between her toes enthousiastically. You can taste her erotic sweat much more in here. With all your might you try to make love to the space in between her toes, licking up all her toejam.

She then forcefully moves her toes around, making sure you can get to lick in between each of her toes. After about half an hour of licking toejam she undoes the laces of her sandal.
