Every moment seemed to slow down as the feet hit thier mark on the wood, sinking into the shield and coming out on the other side. Without even thinking, you used your sword to bang the claws downward like a poorly aimed hammer strike. Instead of bouncing of the shield for another strike, the poor cat girl hung from it just like you hoped. The feline furiously scratched at the shield with the hope of of pulling herself away, but you wouldn't have any of that. Raising your sword, you threw down the trapped cat and sliced at her claws. Thankfully your sword was strong enough to slice through the claws of the black cat with all 10 front claws falling to the ground. With half of her arsenal gone, the Monster girl squirmed about with less furiosity and more fright. "Just like a real cat." You say as you do the same to the claws stuck in your shield. "You take away the claws and they fall to pieces." The stunned cat girl looked to you, trying to say something but no sound came from her mouth for a few seconds. "When...they grow back....I will SO hunt you down you....you....you twerp! And when I catch you...I won't give you a choice. You will fall before me and worship my feet or my name isn't Selina!" The monster girl ran off into the brush with her tail between her legs, leaving you with a feeling of pride. Your first monster girl defeated, if this was the worst of the girls out here than you had no reason to fear. However a nagging voice told you that was certainly not the last time you two would meet. For the moment though, you continued on your way to town.
1213112.title: Spot the refernce

choices: Go right to the blacksmiths
Follow one of the scents to it's source, you're hungry.
12131121.content: It would appear that Selina's troubles had echoed through the forest as you encountered no further monster girls on the path. Sure the occasional bush rustle and 'being-watched' feeling would come up but no monster girl seemed to come after you. The sounds of people doing thier everyday life became clear as you came to a large wooden gate. Two burly guards stood before the gate eyeing you as you came forward. "Halt right there missy, let's take a look at you. Don't want to have any disguised monster girls get into town on our watch. As the the two men examined you, you took time to notice the steel swords slightly out of thier scabbards. Seemed like you might have the chance to get an upgrade to some better weapons in town as well as support. After a minute or two, the guard on the right tapped at the gate. "She's clear, let her in." The door opened quickly and you rushed inside, not wanting to risk a monster girl taking advantage of this. "Have a good time!" You hear the guards say as the doors slam shut. You look around, amazed at the sight before you. You had always heard of Galdran but the size that stood before you made your village look like a homestead. People walking around well constructed buildings and stalls buying, selling, eating and drinking. "Alright." You think to yourself, "Time to find aid for my quest to defeat the Monster Queen." There had to be some sort of blacksmiths' shop around town, most hero to be often took pride in thier weapons being as sharp as possible if needed. A rumbling in your stomach pulled you from your thoughts and reminded you of just what time it was. It would be pretty hard to defeat a monster without first defeating your hunger first. Thankfully you still had enough money to buy some nourishment and wonderful smells were all around you.
12131121.title: You arrive in Galdran

choices: After eating, you feel drowsy and the girl notices
The waitress brings you to her sisters
121311212.content: You decided you had to have some good before you go and ask for assistance in your quest. Walking through the crowds of people, you took notice of a particular smell overpowering most of the others in the market place. Deciding to follow your senses, you look around as you try to decipher exactly what the smell was. Stepping away from the main stalls, your journey took you to a row of buildings all built into an exact fashion. In fact, a little examination showed these buildings all seemed to be connected to one another. The biggest house in the middle of this row had a small sign in front of the door saying 'Little Muffin Bakery.' A quick whiff let you know that this building was the source of the wonderful scent catching your interest. You open the door and walk in, greeted with the sight of a cozy space with a few tables sprawled about. A counter stood on the far side of the room with the backside of a stone fireplace sticking out. "Hello there mam." You turned to the bubbly voice and found yourself stand in in front of a girl about your age if not slightly younger. Her brown hair hung at her sides as she motioned to a table. "Would you like to sit down?" You nod and follow the girl as she walks you to the closest table. As you sit down, you notice something a little odd about the girl: her sides seemed to be as brown as her hair, showing a contrast to the rest of her white skin. You are curious but decide not to ask for fear of being rude. "We are a fairley new bakery and our choices are slightly limited at the moment, but our speciality bread are sure to stamp out your hunger." You roll your eyes at the foot reference, taking it as a slight joke to the worldly situation. All of your time in the monastery had trained you to keep your needs low and with your funds even lower, you decide on plain bread over the rye and baguettes. "Right away mam, I'll see if my sister's have any out of the oven yet." The girl walks away, with you realizing she wasn't wearing anything over her feet. Of course you didn't mind too much, she was a simple human after all....albeit one with an unusual complection with her brown around the sides. "Your in luck mam, we had a loaf fresh out of the oven, I'll come back to discuss price." Of course you were expecting a simple load but this was quite a big mound of bread. It fact, it almost seemed to be shaped like a.....you shake your head and eat, obviously your quest was getting to you more than you realized.
121311212.title: Follow one of the scents to it's source, yo...

choices: You become tired and brought to a room, also free of charge
The older girls decide to give you bread 'from the source'
1213112122.content: As you ate the 'specialty bread' as that waitress called it, it became harder for you to deny that it did seem to have a foot-Like shape. It was no doubt just another, rather odd joke about the Monster girl epidemic and even if it was or not it didn't matter. It tasted like no white bread you had eaten before, flavorful as if there was spread on it despite knowing well you hadn't put any on it. Taking a look around the bakery, you saw you weren't the only one enjoying it's wares. Your mouth watered as you saw one man munching on a soft sole of rye while a woman across from him pulled out a long speacialty baguette. It did seem quite a shame that there were only three flavors of bread at the moment, but what they had seemed delicious all on it's own. A good amount of minutes passed by as you savored every bite of your meal, watching people come in and out with the cheery waitress guiding them to thier tables. As you picked up the last toe of bread, the waitress (looking somehow more beautiful than before) came up to your table. "Are you enjoying your meal mam?" With the bread already in your mouth, you merely nod though it seems she understands how much you nod. "Wonderful! My sister's are going to love hearing this...actually how would you like to meet them? See we are needing some outside opinions on some new menu items we're planning on selling and I get you'd love some more free goods. I'll even make this meal free just for being such a good customer." You licked your lips at the thought of having more of these bread feet and the fact your entire meal will be cost less only sweetened the deal. "Great! Follow me." Standing up from your chair, you follow the brown/white girl through the bakery floor to a door close to the counter. "Sisters! I have a 'test subject' for you!" As you walk through the door, your eyes are drawn to the two girls standing beside what you assumed was the oven the bread was cooking in. The first one, a darker shade of brown on both colors, looked to you with a smile. "Great sis, and oooh I know I haven't seen her around at all! She must be new in town!" The girl's black hair flew about as she rushed to you and hugged you, her scent telling you she seemed to work with the rye bread the most. "Well, zees are done. I think zat is all the people will desire for the day." The third and tallest girl said as she pulled six assorted foot loaves out of the oven. "Shall I get out little sister to test zhier creations?" You couldn't help but giggle, both at the foreign accent of this girl but the fact they all kept calling each other sister. After disappearing for a momet, the tall girl came back with two smaller girls about child age. The child on the right had a brownish complection with white hair messing strewn about her head. The one on the left had a similar hair color, though hers was in a bun and her skin seemed more....you want to say golden. Both girls held plates in thier hands with foot loaves of similar colors to themselves. Seeing nothing wrong and feel in strangely compelled to, you taste both. The right one tastes like a sweet cinnamon roll complete with icing while the left is spongey and seems to have some form of filling. All the girls around you smile to one another, not that you noticed.
1213112122.title: The waitress brings you to her sisters

choices: You awake in the middle of the night...
Next morning, the sisters have a surprise for you!
12131121221.content:
You rub your stomach, stuffed to the brim with loaf after loaf of foot bread. Uuuuugh... you probably shouldn't have ate so much, but you just couldn't help it! They were too delicious to resist! You slowly stood up to your feet and bowed to the girls. "Thank you for the meal, ladies, but I think I should find somewhere to rest..."

The eldest sister latched onto your arm. "Nonsense, friend! We believe in treating our customers with the best service imaginable, so we would like to allow you to stay in our guest room for free!"

A free room in addition to free food? This was too good to be true. You had a strange feeling about all of this, but you couldn't deny such hospitality now. "Thank you, that would be lovely," you replied.

The three sisters led you upstairs and into a room towards the back corner of the building. Despite its disuse, it seemed quite clean and well-kept. After thanking the sisters once more and saying good night, you laid down on the bed and quickly fell asleep...
12131121221.title: You become tired and brought to a room, also fr...

choices: One of the girls call for you...and you can't resist
You follow the noise to a cellar door
121311212211.content:
mhhmmp

You open your eyes, the faint noise bringing you from your dreams. Judging by the lack of light from the window, it was sometime in the middle of the night. You stay silent, wondering if the noise would come again. After a few moments of silence, you close your eyes once more with the intent on returning to your dream. The kind girls who had been such gracious hosts offering loaf bread so sweet you almost don't notice....
Mmemp

There it was again, fainter this time but still audible to your trained ears. It was rather hard to make out the noise' s exact direction due to it being muffled by your room. However it was clear that the sound was coming from below you. While you didn't want to risk waking your hosts, this puzzling noise needed to be looked over. You drag yourself out of bed, your stomach still a little pushed from yesterday's feast. Wandering out into the hallway, you hear another noise coming from the same direction as the previous. Fainter still than before, but all that did was feed your curiosity. Creeping along the hallway, you become aware of a scent that had become quite known to you over the past hours:foot loaves. Sure enough, you turn to the door beside you and see....wait....you take a second to realize the only things in this room were your hosts sleeping in separate beds. Still...the scent was unmistakable. It was then how odd the girls were sleeping. Sure the eldest was sleeping rolled in sheets but her sisters were all odd, backs hunched and shoulders tensed far up. It almost seemed like they were....loaves of bread. The dots began to click with sickening efficiency, your instant love, thier all-too-sweet nature, the foot references! These were monster girls! Monster bread girls! Which ment that you had been eating...
...
Your head began to spin, all this time you had fallen under the spell of monster girl feet and you didn't notice! Neither it seemed did anyone else in this town! Who knows how many had eaten these beasts wares? Thier horrible, soft, warm, toasty...NO! You couldn't fall for it anymore. First you were going to figure out what the odd noise was, and then....you didn't know what you were going to do but it involved a lot of bread death!
121311212211.title: You awake in the middle of the night...

choices: You reach the dough mother
The girl's overwhelm you
1213112122112.content:
Turning away from the admittedly delicious bread girls, you continued your search across the building. Heading down the stairs, you returned to the back room where those monsters nearly drove you into thier clutches. You shiver not only at the memory, but seeing the amount of foot loaves lining the shelves for tomorrow's fools. Turning away from the edible evil, your eyes fell upon a rather dark door you didn't remember seeing yesterday. Curious, you creep your way across the floor with the hope the small squeaks and creeks weren't audible to the monsters above you. The door opened without a sound and you kept right on by, entering a stone staircase leading right down. Thankfully there were torches lining the walls so light wasn't an issue. You continued down the stairs, a voice becoming more and more noticeable as you did so.
"There you go now...doesn't it feel better to just obey me? Certainly must be compared to having your free will. Just get back to strengthing my daughters." You reached another door at the bottom of the stairs, this time wide open for you to see. You step through the archway to be greeted with a large sanctum, making you wonder just how far underground you were at that moment. What caught your eye though was the commotion that was going on around the center of this odd place. A large walkway crowded with so many bread girls identical to the ones above circled a cauldron as big as an average house. Out of that cauldron however was the real eye catcher.

It was twice as tall as the cauldron and about as wide. It's entire body was a creaming color, dripping as if it was melting. If this being called itled the bread girls' mother than that meant that this super sized beast was a dough girl....or woman based on her body and face. You couldn't see who she was talking to, but you didn't have time to think about it as the large dough monster turned right towards you. "Ahh, I thought I felt my daughters' influence somewhere. What are you doing out of bead dearie? Oh! Could it be that you've come here to slay me, the dough mother ? To destroy such a beautiful creation of my queen? Or could it be that you're a little hungry? I'm busy reteaching a somewhat rebellious girl her place as my servant but I'm sure my daughters will be happy to serve you." You raise your sword, thankful you brought it along cause it loomed like you were gonna need it.
1213112122112.title: You follow the noise to a cellar door

choices: You manage to break free!
You're stuck.
Your belly begins rumbling...
12131121221121.content:
This dough mother was a corrupting force in this town, created by the Monster Queen herself! If you didn't stop her here, this whole town would fall to the monsters, and who knows where this evil may spread! Here, in the warm cellar you began to detect something new in there air. You started to walk forward, knowing you must slay the Dough Mother. Among the smell of rising yeast and the liberal use of spices down here, was also a sour smell...almost repulsive. You knew this would be a tough fight, and that the Bread Girls were surrounding you.

"Don't creep in the shadows girl! I see you!" Closer, you can now see that the girl she mentioned was sitting with her mouth open. The Dough Mother was dripping pure dough into her mouth, and the victim now had a glazed look in her eye. "What are you doing?!" The Dough Mother laughed. "Making her part of us! That's how our spell works...the more delicious bread you eat, the more our spirit is infused with yours...until you become a bread thrall! A slave to our toasty toes!" You watch in horror as the girl grins at those words. "You'll need a few more loaves, so let's get that done!"

Just as the gooey girl said that, a couple of the bread girls leaped from the dark corners and pounced at you! A wholemeal girl kicks you in the face and you stumble back! Before you can reclaim your footing a donut girl pushes you to the floor and sticks all the glazed toes of her right foot into your mouth! They taste so sweet...even if her foot smells a bit sour. The donut girl giggles. "That's it! Chow down! Once you've eaten a few soles you'll have a real sweet-tooth for me!" However, you manage to resist! You slice off her leg and spit out her foot! You then cut off her head and the same to the wholemeal girl before she can react! You rush for the Mother, knowing they'll regenerate in a minute or so.

With a heroic jump you raise your sword high and plunge it into the Dough Mother! Your triumphant smile fades, the sword lays, tip to hilt buried in her...but she's fine! And your sword is stuck! You tried to pull it out with both hands, but the pale goop grew over your hands, sticking you to the Mother, who is staring you in the face! "Well well....look at you! I was going to use this girl, but your soul is much stronger...to resist a donut's toes like that. You see, my perfect recipe is complete, and a soul like yours will belong to her! The general of my army...cupcake girl!" Whoever this girl was, she sounded powerful. And you didn't want to meet her!
12131121221121.title: You reach the dough mother

choices: The cupcake girl appears
You still try to struggle
121311212211212.content: With the fear of meeting this new girl in your mind, you returned to your attempts to escape the dough mother's grasp. It truley was no use however, the dough around the sword and your fists had hardened enough that escape seemed impossible. "Girls...." The dough mother turned to her reforming daughters as she pointed to the enthralled mass. "Make sure you keep her comfortable. Give her all the love she needs." The gooey monster leaned to the girl, sticking her finger in her mouth. "Feel free to lose yourself at anytime." "Yes...mam..." The girl said in a dreamy tone as she was dragged into the darkness. "Now....as for you my dear..." You kept your mouth shut as the dough mother returned to facing you, showing you weren't interested in her or whatever this cupcake girl was. "Oh sweetie, don't be like that. I can assure you that being my generals thrall will be better than any heroic duty you wished. Now just let me give you an appetizer before your future mistress is done." An odd twitching came from the monster's hands and took your attention straight to them. The fingers were shrinking while the palm seemed to elongateing. That was when you realized the hands were morphing into two nicely sized feet, ready for dripping into your mouth. Try as you might, the liquid form managed to reach inside. Time stopped as the taste tingled every sense you had in both pleasure and disgust. "That's it dear, don't have too much though. I want to give my dear cupcake girl the chance to break you herself.
121311212211212.title: You're stuck.

choices: Your becoming a bread girl human hybrid!
Your mind blanks, you are an empty slate for the dough mother
12131121221122.content:
The pathway in front of you was soon covered with the bread girls, all of them looking ready to bring you down. Two rye girls leading the pack jumped up and began to dive kick in your direction. Thankfullu you managed to slash at the duo and sent thier halves over the path. You had no time to celebrate however as there were untold amounts more monsters heading right for you. You could hear the dough mother chuckling at your peril. "Aw...little girl thinks she can fight eh? Why don't I just turn up the heat?!" Upon those words, the darkness was lit with dozens of flames all burning an unnatural green and yellow. "Just give up human, my daughters will soon overtake you. In fact I'll just increase the numbers to make your defeat all the faster." Waving her hands, the Dough Mother brought two smaller cauldron from the flames and hurled globs of herself into them. Meanwhile, an older version of the cinnamon roll girl had rushed you and kicked, splattering sweet icing all over your clothes. As you tried to hold these girls back, you could almost hear music in the air.

I've got my dark queens magic flowing through my veins, I'm made of girlish figures and 12 different grains. I'm Dough Mom with bread girl's. Dough Mom with Bread Girls! We came to this town to break these folk within thier minds our feet will poke!
Somewhat distracted by the singing, you couldn't tell when a large burly bread girl (undoubtibly pound cake) jumped ahead of the crowd and showed off her feet. Toe jam with the colors of purple and red dripped from the soles and a smell of sour cream assaulted your nose.
Face our feet! Taste our feet! Face our feet! Taste our feet!"

The pound cake girl stomped towards you as you held you sword tightly. You wanted to keep fighting but your lack of sleeping was beginning to mix with the remaining undigested foot loaves and the smell of more. Still you ran your sword through the monster's arm, only for it to quickly grow back. You slashed again and again, but realized too late what was happening. The group from upstairs had finally joined the party and now pulled you to the floor. Meanwhile, the group ahead of you were sticking thier feet in the fires, getting them nice and toasty.
Humans weren't put on this earth to fight us.
Nah
You must be subveriant and fat!
Yah!
That way you won't fight against our highness.
Nah!
Just let my girls use your face like a mat!

The pound cake girl was first, her toe jams tasting like jelly and her size filling you nicely. Two cream-filled girls were next, sticking toe after toes until thier cheesy cream filled your mouth. Each girl from the group was give you a slice of thier loaves and it was becoming harder and harder to resist them. Love them, taste them, smell them, obey them, feel them, need them, cook them, eat them! I will make you....MINE!"

As the song reached it's peak, the girls all took a step back to look at what they had done to you. Your stomach wasn't large but there aS a difference between now and yesterday. Crumbs and cream covered your face which, in your current state, you licked feverishly. You could feel something happening to your body and mind but didn't care for the moment. Your mind belonged to the bread girl's and thier musically gifted Dough Mother.
12131121221122.title: Parody time!

choices: The epilouge
Your first day of your new destiny
121311212211222.content: In fact....you couldn't remember a time when you weren't in under the spell of these beautiful creatures. And even if you could, it wouldn't be a time worth remembering anyhow. Your eyes glazed over as you fell and began begging for more. The Dough Mother laughed as she watched you crawl towards the outstreched legs of a pair of donut girls. Thier sweet icing mixing with the sour smell of thier feet created such wonderful feelings within you, your broken mind registering only pleasure. The bread girls all cutely giggled around you as they lined up to grant you more tastings of thier delicious foot loaves. As this went on, the Dough Mother set a gooey finger to her chin in thought. "What shall I do with this little hero girl? The possibilities are near endless to this situation. I could just keep her here eternally just to watch her plump up on my daughters....but where would the fun be in that? Hmmm....I have been needing someone to help sell my creations to the outside world. I mean I have nearly taken control of the entire town and they don't even know it. Hmmm....yes...and maybe I could send some daughters with her to help infiltrate other towns to build more bakeries! I would have a monopoly on the baked goods market, infect untold amounts of people, and make a rather nice bundle of loot from all my nicely addicted customers." As the Dough Mother thought out her plans for you, you had fallen asleep in the arms of a few croissant girls. Your mind danced with dreams of foot bread and the beautiful monsters in charge of making it.
121311212211222.title: Your mind blanks, you are an empty slate for th...

choices: Forget your quest, this is your new calling
You can't abandon your mission
121311212212.content: Morning light shone through the window, hitting your face and prompting you to move to keep your eyes out of line. You felt rather irradiated about the rude awakening as you were in the middle of a wonderful dream involving stuffing yourself full of footbread. Speaking of, the delicious scent of freshly baked goods becomes apparent as you hear someone approaching. Curious (and becoming hungry again) you sit up in bed as the door opens and two girls come through carrying plates. The first girl had many of the characteristics of one of the younger girls from yesterday, while the second girl was a different figure. "We figured you would wake up." The second girl said as she brushed away some pink hair. "We wanted to give you some breakfast." "Yeah!" The first girl exclaimed as she sat a tray in front of you. "In bed too!" You looked to the morning meal before you and already felt better. A glass if milk....at least it seemed like milk, and a new type of footbread. You grabbed at the baked good and examined it. It's circular path almost caused it to connect with itself and there was green frosting coating it's toes. As you chowed down, the girls got on either side of you with devilish grins. "Tastes good doesn't it? I bet you could eat nothing but that and feel happy for the rest of your life." You nod without really thinking it over, although why would you need to? These foot loaves really were that good. The girl to the right of you stretched her leg, showing off her green-tipped foot. "You know, our sisters had been talking and we were wondering if you would like to stay a little while? Maybe work for us?" "Just think of it cutie..." the girl to your left said as she did likewise with her icing caked foot. "....helping bake, test and eating as much of these little babies as you wish. Helping to spread our recipe through the town and maybe even beyond. Plus, we might just let you have our bread 'from the source' in case your little enthralled mind didn't clue you in to what we are. Doesn't that sound just wonderful?" As the two feet inched closer and closer, the prospect of working for these nice women seemed so pleasing. Plus, eating as much footbread as you wanted sounded like a nice bonus. Still, a nagging voice in your head kept trying to say against it. Reminding you of your warrior path and your quest to defeat the Monster Queen.
121311212212.title: Next morning, the sisters have a surprise for you!

choices: Stand your ground until she finishes counting down.
She is a danger to travellers! You attack her before she finishes!
She is dangerous! Run away!
12131122.content:
Some time passes, the number of trees on the sides of the road is decreasing, indicating that you are getting close to your destination. But just as you get close, someone suddenly jumps down from a tree right in front of you! At first you think it might be a human, but the sharp ended ears of the attacker quickly change your mind.

It's a beautiful voluptuous woman, with bronze skin and long silver colored hair tied in a ponytail, her sharp-ended ears quickly make you conclude that she must be a dark elf. Monster girl empire often uses dark elves as assassins and spies, the two exotic looking daggers held by the monster girl, as well as a mask overing her mouth and nose quickly make you realize that she almost definitely is one of those. Her outfit in general is rather revealing, not counting the mask of course, and she seems to wear some kind of light open-toed shoes on her feet combined thigh-high black toeless socks, giving you a nice view of her sexy toes.

"Tch... you are not the girl I was looking for." She mumbles after taking a look at you
You prepare your sword and shield just in case.
"You expect to beat me with those rusty old things? Get out of my face human, my contract today isn't on you." The dark elf states coldly
"Then who do you have your contract for?" You ask with suspicion
"Not your business." She replies
"Are you working for the Monster Queen?!" You ask
"You really are a dumb girl, even for human standards... I give you 5 seconds to leave my sight, or I will teach you a lesson about prying in other people's bussiness." The dark elf says coldly

"5..." She slowly starts the countdown, as you wonder what to do
12131122.title: Dark elf assassin appears!

121311221.content:
"4...."

Maybe it was your recent victory or your pride not allowing you to back down, but you stayed still. You weren't going to let some pointy eared, admittedly beautiful monster girl push you around.

"3...."

The dark elf' s cold stare turns into an annoyed look of anger as she raises her weapons. You prepare a stance in response.

"2...."

Your eyes glance down to the elve's feet, smooth and clean as they were. They were scrunching up as if preparing for movement.

"1.....last chance to get smart.....

Silence puts it's hold on the area as you both stare each other in the face. Your hands shiver in a last-moment thought that what you're doing isn't the smartest idea.

The word zero barely leaves the assassin's mouth before she hurls her daggers at you. Two strikes of unbridled pain course through you as your chest and neck are punctured. You can't scream, but can still hear the sounds of pain emmiting from you. As you fall face down to the dirt, you hear the elf scoff. "Stupid human, should have just run away." Your body is rolled over, although you couldn't tell as your senses were already fading. As the dark elf retrieves her daggers, she puts her feet over to your face. "Gotta reward you for your bravery, although stupidity is more the term to use." As you black out, the soft toes of the victor enter your mouth. Your last thought as everything stops is "Dying at such wonderful feet......."

What were you thinking?
121311221.title: What Did you expect?

choices: She gets you off of herself, and then pushes you down with her foot!
You pull off dark elf's mask, and using her surprise quickly headbutt her!
You quickly get closer to her, pull off her mask, and kiss dark elf on the lips!
121311222.content:
You hesitated for a moment, as the dark elf kept counting down. In the end however you decide that someone like her is a danger to travellers.
"2... WHOA!" The elf continues her counting, but you use the moment to tackle her to the ground, knowing you would have no chance to stop her daggers without this element of surprise, she falls on her back and you fall on top of her. This is only the start of course...

Luckily for you one of her daggers flies away into nearby bushes, second one however is still in her left hand and you barely manage to grab it before she stabs you.
"Not bad... for a human, I let my guard down there for a moment. But you better be prepared to feel my dagger on your throat." She says, seeming genuinely impressed for a moment, before returning to her usual cold tone
You struggle to stop the dagger she is trying to use to stab you, all the while holding her down so that she won't get up. It is quickly apparent however that you will have to either come up with something clever, or get off her, as she is clearly stronger and more fit than you, and with every second your grip on her dagger-wielding hand become looser and looser...

At that moment you notice that the mask covering dark elf girl's face moved a bit during her fall, and should be easy to quickly pull off and reveal her face. Maybe that would distract her for a moment? Or perhaps there's something else you could do if you reveal her face like that...
121311222.title: Desperate struggle, maybe it wasn't a good idea?

choices: The cat girl decides to give you your 'prize'

"Y-You could just ask me to follow you and go on adventures m.But I guess Papa was right people being scare and using me."she said with melancholy.

By the goddess,you feel like an awful bitch now."Look I'm sorr-"

"No need to apologize ms-mistress.I will accept my duties as your f-familiar"she said while trying not to cry anymore.

You..


(Author's note:The monster girl is now four to five times bigger than you instead of her being nearly ten times bigger than you."
122231.title: The priestess and her new familar.

choices: ...cheer her up,by playing with her feet.
.ug her and go to sleep together.
1222312.content:
"Let's rest for the night,didn't you say that you...have an "papa" you said while watching your surroundings.

"Yes mistress, me and him live in big hut called a farm I think." The girl said while scratching her head.

"My name's Mary,not mistress"you chastised your familiar.

"Okay M-Mistress Mary." the young behemoth almost cheekily said.

With you sighing and your familar proceed to walk to your destination.

The sun was setting when you two reached the farm. There's was an heavily scarred and sun kissed middle age man wearing farmer clothes and large hat made of straw.

"Papa!"your familar shouted at the man,and hug him. "Mie where have you be-"he stops at mid sentence once he saw you and the rings."Mie,who is this"the man practically spoke with venom that is blanatly directed at you.

"Papa...this my mistress,Mary.I'm her familar."the now named Mie said in sad tone.

"G-greetings s-s-ir,I was wondering if I ca-an rest and have dinner at your home."you fearfully spoke. Mie give an puppy dog look to help convince the man.

"Fine.."the man spoke in defeated tone. At the dinner table you and the man have an simple stew and some bread. While Mie is eating three entire cows that had been roasted.

"So sir..are you really Mie's father.The man nodded"Yes I'm her father,and Mie isn't your standard monster girl."

"What do you mean" you said while intrigued. "I mean,Mie is suppose to be a game changing champion for the monster empire,an perfect heir to the throne. She's basically an magically enhanced and mutated mixture of different monster races" The man lazily drawls out
"How is that possible"you said with horror and awe.(mostly horror). While Mie has gotten tense.

"By creating special "fleshy" golems contains the blood and essence of various monster girls. They breed with captured adventurers,slayers,and soldiers"the man said with his fists clenching as he recalling the experience.

"Mie isn't the only one,she has many...sisters. Some are powerful and seductive socresses that wields unique magicks.Some are dwarfish and extremely smart tricksters.A few of them are rumored to be divine.

You gasped at the divine part.

The man nods and continues. "And finally some are just downright alien" he mumbles at that last. You noticed that Mie is finish with her meal. Getting up from the table,and look for her. You find her in a shed where she's laying on a large makeshift bed and dressed a gigantic nightgown that's made of animals skins and blankets. She hugging an gigantic and beatup stuffed toy,while sobbing. "I guess hearing what her father say,with me manipulating her was just too much for her." You sadly whispered.

You..
1222312.title: Papa

choices: Some of these mushrooms seem a little too big
You hear an odd growling coming from....behind you
The walls echo with giggling...fairy giggling
1223.content:
Strangly, it seemed that no girls were present along the rocky slopes. No matter, to you it just ment whatever was up here must be feared by the monsters. Of course there was also the possibility that there were lying in wait either in the caves or in plan sight. With that idea, your guard stayed up as you crossed the rough rocks around you. A cold wind blew around you, adding a hint of foreboding atmosphere. An open hole in the rock face showed itself, bringing an egear smirk to your face. Without a note of hesitation, you walk into the cave, not noticing the faint skull and feet painted beside the entrance.

You had expected near darkness in the caves but it seemed that glowing mushrooms lined the walls. Thankful for the light, you trudge on with little to no fear.
1223.title: So far so good... time to go up to the mountain...

choices: The spores begin to affect you
You manage to escape the musrooms
12231.content: As you walked further and further into the cave, more and more of the strange glowing mushroom lined the cave walls in various sizes. Most of these sizes were rather natural for fungi....but there were a few that just seemed a little too big. You weren't immediately afriad, of course not. However there was a small gurgle in the pit of your stomach about mushrooms that had the same height as a human. Keeping cautious, you decide to keep to the middle of the road if only to keep yourself from freaking out. As you continued your trek, the mushrooms continued to get larger and larger until they would reach the top of the cave. These mushrooms in particular had a strange look to thier tops, shaped almost like......a foot! Realizing this, you keep walking unaware that the mushrooms are beginning to shoot out spores.
12231.title: Some of these mushrooms seem a little too big

choices: Drinking contest with the oni! You lose(Obviously)
Drinking contest with the oni! You cheat and win somehow!
Try to run away, hoping she is too drunk to run faster than you!
12232.content:
"You must be brave as hell, or retarded as hell, to just enter my turf like that, little human..." A growly angry, but slightly feminine tone suddenly reached your ears from behind, making you instantly turn towards it...

Behind you was about 2 meter tall humanoid monster girl, she had red colored skin and absurdally long white hair tied in a ponytail. It wasn't long before you could also feel the smell of alcohol coming from her... there was no doubt, it was a red oni. She wore simple clothing made out of animal skins, which did little more than just cover her large breasts, and her genitals, as well as a belt wrapped around her waist, with a few small bottles, presumably of alcohol attached to it. She was also barefoot... without a doubt her feet were far from clean if she was walking a lot in those mountains...

"Whatcha staring at so much? Never seen an oni before?" The red oni said, walking slowly closer to you with her fists prepared to punch your lights out, or worse.

"I-I didn't know it was your cave! I will just leave in a moment if you let me!" You say, knowing that you stand no chance against the oni in this situation, it would end up with your beaten up and enslaved at best, and dead at worst.

"Hmph, you clearly aren't brave. Retarded it is then I guess... And why would I let ya go? You are an intruder in my home, that needs punishment." The red oni said, not stopping her slow approach towards you.

You desperately keep trying to remember if you ever heard of some way of dealing with oni...and through that, a certain conversation you overheard at a tavern comes to your mind. There was an old adventurer telling his friends about how he once challenged an oni in a cave to a drinking contest, won, and stole her treasure... he didn't mention how did he do that though. Still, better try that than nothing...

"W-wait! Can't we solve it in a different way? Like a drinking contest!" You propose as you suddenly feel a wall behind your back... you can't back out any further

"Huh? Now you are speaking my language!" The oni said in her growly voice, while suddenly starting to grin, showing rather impressive sharp fangs she had... oni sure liked their booze it seems, though after a moment the red woman continued "You seem like a lightweight, should be easy win to me."

"And if I win, you will let me go?" You ask, just to make sure
"Sure, you also get to take all the treasure I gathered in this cave. I wouldn't be so eager if I were you girlie, I never lost a drinking contest to a human yet! So you better get ready for the upcoming year!" The oni said standing before you, and taking a swig out of a small bottle she had attached to her belt
"Get ready for the year?" You ask confused, not sure what the oni meant
"You challenged me without knowing the rules? You really are a dumb one, aren't ya? When human and oni get into drinking contest, oni bets the ownership of her stuff, while human bets his or her freedom for the next year. To put it simply for ya, you are gonna be my slave." The oni said, looking at you and still grinning

Perhaps it wasn't such a good idea after all... it's too late to go back on your words now though. You can try to just flee of course, but if the oni catches you then, you can be sure it's gonna end up even worse for you than if you just stayed quiet earlier.
12232.title: An angry red oni... and a drinking contest?!

choices: Foot worship!
Human cushion and ass worship!
Something else!
122321.content:
Even though you knew you stood little chance against the imposing red oni, you figured that this was better than surrendering to her! Glancing at the various glass bottles strapped around the meagre belt that befitted her groin area, you gulped and felt your heart beat faster than a drum.

As though sensing your anxiety, the humanoid monster girl cocked her head to one side, a grin plastered over her lips. "Human wanna give up now?"

"N-no!" You yelped, trying your best to stay calm as she poured an amber-tinted liquid into two vessels which were joined onto the bottle she pulled out. Whatever the drink was, it looked - and smelled - strong!

"OK. We take turns. I go first - I drain this cup. Then you do the same," the monster girl stated matter-of-factly, before promptly downing her drink in several seconds.

Staring agape at her, you took a few moments to compose yourself. "Sure..." You muttered before taking the proffered cup and pulling it towards your mouth. Before you even drank it, you could smell how strong and powerful the alcoholic drink was. The moment it passed through your lips, it took a considerable effort not to choke and splutter. Gazing your rival in the eye, you tried to ignore the smug and knowing look about her. After a good five seconds or so, you finished the drink, putting the empty cup on the top of your head to prove that it was completed. Trying your best not to wretch, you kept the drink down. It tasted like whiskey, only more potent and with some other flavour like cloves mixed in.

"One drink each," the red oni said, flicking her long white hair back, as if you needed to know the scores! She did not look in the slightest bit concerned; in fact, while you were catching your breath, she promptly filled and drained her second cup of the amber liquid. "Ahhh...that hit the spot...." She quickly re-filled the cup she had just drank from, flexing her powerful muscles, even though you still had an empty one in your hands.

"OK...give me a moment..." You gulped before swapping cups and gingerly raising the glass towards your mouth. Nothing else for it... "Done!" you cried out, proud that you were able to complete the drink quicker than the first time, despite the fact that the strong alcoholic beverage was burning the back of your throat. "Next!"

The red oni chuckled. "Oh, little one. What is your name?"

"Mary," you replied, feeling the effects of the drink and hiccuping a little.

"Well, Mary, cheers!" The monster girl grinned before filling up another cup and draining it in an instant. Passing you another full drink, she gave you a knowing look. It was clear that defeat was never even an option for her!

After the third drink, you found yourself gasping for air and feeling dizzy. After the fourth and fifth, you knew that you were struggling badly. The red oni chuckled as she completed her sixth drink, letting out a satisfied smack of the lips. "Humans - weak. Onis - we strong and always win drinking contest. Or any contest! You give up, weakling?"

Shaking your head weakly and hiccuping even louder, you accepted the freshly poured drink and tossed it down your throat, even though it took two attempts. The red oni scoffed at this and sighed with a mixture of pity and triumph as you finally dropped to your knees, defeat and capitulation washing over you.

"Please..." You whimpered. "P-please....no more!"

"So I win?" The oni chuckled, staring down at you, hands on her hips and a sneer plastered over her face.

It was no use. The idea of outdrinking this monster girl was a terrible, terrible mistake. She wasn't even remotely drunk, while you felt as though you could vomit.

"Yes...you...w-win..." you murmured weakly, still on your knees and swaying a little from side to side such was your inebriation. The red oni laughed even louder after you let out a loud belch.

"So pathetic. You had chance of winning my stuff..." She gestured at her treasure. "But you lost. Now you will be my slave. For a year!"

A whole year...the idea of it made you nauseous, or perhaps that was the alcohol! Either way, you promptly vomited all over the floor of the cave while the red oni shook her head in disdain. "Come, slave. What shall we start with..."

How did the red oni decide to break you in as her slave?
122321.title: Drinking contest with the oni! You lose(Obviously)

choices: Cross the bridge, face the troll.
Swim across, hope for the best.
123.content:
Equipped with a dull copper sword and a small wooden shield, you weren't all too confident in your ability to brave the wilderness, much less defeat the Monster Queen. As a former priestess, you felt more inclined to take the intellectual, as opposed to the military, route. Unfortunately, any books and writings that could have assisted you in your journey had burned down with the temple. If you truly wanted to learn more about the monster girl empire, there was only one place left to go: the Oracle of Moorwynne.

You had visited the Oracle once before. But that had been many years ago, long before the monster girls started roaming the eastern paths. You left for the shore at early hours of sunrise, hoping to arrive at the nearest town to your destination before nightfall. Throughout the day, the roads remain completely deserted, the constant chirping of the birds the only thing keeping you company. However, as you drew closer and closer to the sea, you couldn't help but feel slightly nervous. You had a sense that your quest wouldn't be all sunshine and rainbows for much longer...

Your fears were soon confirmed, as you reached the top of a tall hill and the grey waters of the Trovahl River suddenly emerged over the horizon, no more than a two or three hundred yards away. Connecting the two banks, there was a long stone bridge. And sitting on your end of the path was a giant female troll, sound asleep and making the earth shake with her loud snores. But worst of everything, even all the way up the hill, you could smell her horrible foot stench, carried away in the wind!

The smell was unmistakably disgusting, and quickly had you looking every which way for an alternative, less gut-wrenching, path. Unfortunately, you knew quite well the Trovahl went on for miles in either direction, and crossing it there was the only way to reach Moorwynne before sunset. The only real option to going over the bridge was to swim across. And granted, the waters were fairly calm and safe in that stretch of the river. You could probably reach the other bank in a few minutes, in fact. But that part of Trovahl was also known for... sinister, reasons. It was long rumoured to be home of twisted mermaids, hiding in the undercurrent, ready to prey on hapless swimmers...

You weren't really looking forward to testing the validity of those rumours, and more than a bit hesitant to take to the dark green waters. On the other hand, just a couple more whiffs of the she-troll's distant foot fumes almost made you feel like you would be better off swimming with the mermaids. Whatever the case, you had to make your mind up fast. The sun wouldn't stop for you and, if anything, you were pretty damn sure you didn't want to spend the night in the wilds.

So, what do you do?
123.title: Questing for Questing for Knowledge

choices: Pay the bridge tax.
Fight the monster!
Run for your life!
1231.content:
You slowly made your way down the hill and, sighing nervously, you approached bridgehead. You didn't really expect to face a troll in the first day of your mission... in the best case scenario, you would manage to sneak past the she-beast. And if that failed, at least you would have the chance to defend yourself. You tried to hold that in your mind, as you cautiously walked toward the sleeping monster girl, one hand grasping your sword, and the other holding your nose tightly shut.

The creature was clearly in deep slumber, unleashing loud snores every few seconds, and this gave you the opportunity to look at her more closely. In many ways, she matched the mythological stereotype of a troll: big, muscular, dumb-looking and obviously, very, very stinky... Her entire body was covered in sweat and filth, the kind that made your stomach churn every time you stopped a small insect crawl across her greyish skin. Her tusks very nearly avoided growing moss and her hair was twisted into a black, oily mess. Her body hair was probably a paradise for lice.

But none of those things could match the horror, the disgust, the hatred you felt staring at her feet. 'Feet'! You even hesitate to call those pinkish pads on the end of her massive legs 'feet'. Her soles were covered in dust and sweat, more so than any other part of her body, but that wasn't the worst thing about them... as the troll girl gently wiggled her toes in her sleep, you could see a stream of jam oozing from the filthy crevices, and literally feel the vinegary stench coming off of them and hitting your skin. The toxic foot fumes made your eyes water, and it was enough for a bit of toe-polluted air to slip into your nostrils, to make your lungs ache and spasm under the effort of silently coughing.

A couple more seconds in the presence of the disgusting troll, and you felt like throwing up. In an effort to prevent an involuntary personal protein spill, you tried to tiptoe past the monster girl as fast as you possibly could. But in your haste, you had neglected to see the pool of sweat accumulated at the creature's feet, and as soon as your boots touched the ground beside her, you lost your balance, falling to the ground with a loud thud from your shield and clang from your sword.

And as you gained consciousness of what had just happened, a loud, guttural voice suddenly echoed behind you: "HU-MAN!".

Your heart pounded furiously when you turned around to see the troll girl standing over you, her eyes burning with anger as she furiously shouted in your face: "BAD HU-MAN! HUMAN TRY CROSS BRIDGE AND NO PAY BRIDGE TAX! HU-MAN! YOU PAY BRIDGE TAX!"

In a sudden impetus of courage, you managed to regain control of your muscles and jump back on your feet. You stand before the angry monster, one hand reaching for your sword and, halfway between an escaping and a fighting stance, you quickly decide your course of action.
1231.title: Bridge Troll, bridge Toll

choices: You reach the village without trouble, but a dragon girl guard stops you at gate
You are ambushed on your way by a monster girl!
You are ambushed by bandits on your way... but a monster girl saves you!
124.content:
Just then you suddenly remember hearing certain rumors at the inn recently. Supposedly somewhere nearby is a village of non-hostile monster girls who don't serve under Monster Queen. Supposedly it is ran by a kitsune who used to be one of Monster Queen's generals, but rebelled for one reason or another and created that village, which peacefully coexists and even engages in trade with nearby human settlements. The name of the village, Hayato, clearly is different than most names around, must be a reference to some foreign culture.

If the rumors were true, that kitsune general could be a great source of information, and perhaps even a useful ally in your quest to take down the Queen! With that in mind you decided to go east, where according to the rumor the village was located. You were a bit uneasy about having to work with monster girls, whom you tended to hate due to everything that happened to you because of their actions, but you also understood that this could be your best bet, considering that there's no way for you to take down their entire empire alone.

With that in mind, you take your equipment, and begin your journey towards the rumored Hayato village!
124.title: To the Hayato village!

choices: Accept the dragon girl's deal, as demeaning as it might be
You try fighting the Dragon Girl for your right to enter the village(Bad idea)
You leave and try to find some other way into the village
1241.content:
Your way towards Hayato is surprisingly uneventful. On your way, you meet some people whom you ask for directions, to make sure you are going the right way, and by the end of the day, as the sun is already starting to set, you find yourself in front of the gates to Hayato village. The whole place is surrounded by a wooden palisade, and looks slightly more like a small fortress than a typical village.

There's only one guard standing in front of it. From her red scaly tail, wings, as well as some other scale-looking fragments of her skin, you can easily guess that she is a dragon girl. You also notice that her feet, clad in open-toed leather boots are actually looking quite a lot like normal human's, with the exception being long red claw-like nails, from what you could read in a book about dragon girls once, they are among the monsters with most varied balance between human-like and monster-like parts, some just have dragon tail and horns, while others can look almost completely like a dragon and even be quadrupedal. The dragon girl guard also has long red hair, complimenting the color of the scales, and is wielding a rather dangerous looking giant sword. Her armor is made of leather similar to her boots, and rather skimpy, seeming to be there more to just cover her nudity, rather than offer any actual protection.
She seems to have noticed your staring, as you soon realize she is looking straight at you with her yellow colored eyes.

"Who are you? State your business now!" She says in a rather threatening way
"Um... My name is Mary, and I would like to speak to your leader." You reply
"Is Lady Shinra expecting you?" Asked the dragon
Shinra must be the name of that kitsune who was former general of Monster Queen.
"No, I don't think so..." You reply honestly, lying to someone holding a giant sword like hers is definitely a bad idea
"And you expect me to just let you in like that?" Says the dragon girl slightly mockingly
"Isn't this village supposed to be coexisting with humans?" You ask
"Yes it is, however there recently have been some instances of humans wanting to play some kind of monster hunters. They were getting into the village and causing a mess, which is why Lady Shinra temporarily forbidden entrance to everyone aside from merchants. And you don't look like a merchant to me." Explained the dragon girl
"But I need to talk to her! I need her help to defeat the Monster Queen!" You said

"What?" The dragon girl looked completely baffled by your statement just now
"I need her help to defeat the Monster Queen!" You say again
"You... defeat the Monster Queen?" The dragon girl repeats after you, as if still processing what you just said, and right after that her expression becomes that of barely held back laughter
"Hahahaha! That's the best thing I heard today! You, with this little toothpick you call a sword, and piece of wood you call a shield... defeating Monster Queen? Buahahahaaha!" The dragon laughs mockingly at you
You can't help but look at her with mix of embarassment and annoyance, while she is clearly having good time making fun of you.

"Oh boy, I can't wait to tell the others..." The dragon finally says once she stops laughing
"So, can I get inside?" You ask slightly annoyed
"Tell you what, you made my day just now, so how about we strike a deal." Said the dragon girl
"What deal?" You ask
"Standing here all day made my feet hurt a bit, I could use someone to give me a nice foot rub, and perhaps a little cleaning from all the sweat I got on them. If you do that for me, I am gonna let you in." Says the dragon girl
You have a bad feeling about what she might mean about cleaning the sweat from them... and you never gave a foot rub before in your life.

"Isn't there any other way?" You ask
"Well, if you think that you are strong enough to take on Monster Queen, why don't you show me your skills? If you manage to beat me, I will let you in! I wouldn't suggest that though, I never met a human who could beat me yet. If you don't like any of those options though, then you have to turn back and leave." Says the dragon girl, seeming to be bragging a bit, and clearly not believing in your skills in the slightest

You take a moment to think, and ultimately decide to...
1241.title: A dragon girl guard

choices: You blush at the idea... and are unable to object (You have a foot fetish)
You don't like the idea... but Aria wants it anyway (You don't have foot fetish)
You can't stand this humiliating situation, and try to escape!
12411.content:
Reluctantly you decide to agree to dragon girl's deal.
"Fine... I will give you that foot rub." You say
"Really? I figured you would just turn away... do you have a foot fetish or something?" The dragon girl says, seeming surprised by your answer
"N-no! I just really have to talk to your leader!" You say
"Well, you don't seem like you would be any threat to Lady Shinra... or pretty much anyone inside for that matter. Fine then, come in, I will lead you to my office. Can't have you do the massage there, or some passing human could misunderstand I am torturing you in public or something." Said the dragon girl, knocking on the gate what seemed to be a sign to open it up.

The big wooden door opened, and you could finally see village behind the palisade. Despite the outside looking like a fortress, the inside looked pretty much like a regular village, with houses, and some public buildings like an inn, general store and blacksmith. Only one of the buildings clearly stood out compared to the rest, it was a slightly tower-like structure with strangely curved roofs on each floor.
"Lady Shinra's little palace sure stands out in there, huh? She had it built according to some traditions from her homeland in the east, most kitsunes apparently come from there." Said the dragon girl noticing your staring at the palace

Afterwards the dragon girl motioned to a nearby standing girl with a bow to come closer.
"Yes, captain Aria?" She said, upon closer inspection you concluded that she probably was a wood elf, judging from her blonde hair and sharp-ended large ears.
"I will be going to my office to check this merchant's papers. Stand guard before the gate while I am gone, and don't let anyone in, understood?" Said the dragon girl, now revealed to be named Aria
"As you wish captain! All tresspassers will get an arrow in the face!" Said the wood elf girl
"No arrows in the face, just tell them to come later or wait." Said the dragon girl, clearly wanting to cool down elf's enthusiasm a bit
"Alright!" Said the wood elf, saluting to Aria and leaving to stand guard in front of the gate

"Should you really leave someone like that to guard the gate?" You decide to ask, seeing how enthusiastic the elf was about shooting trespassers
"Don't worry, she wouldn't kill anyone... not intentionally at least, she tends to be a bit overly enthusiastic about her guard duty though. No need to waste time talking about that however! I already can't wait for that massage you owe me!" The dragon girl explained and you two sped up a bit

Finally she led you to an average sized building that must have been the quarters of the guards in the village, and then into a room that was most probably her office as the guard captain. It was surprisingly modest, composed of just a desk with chairs on both sides, a bed, and a few chests, probably with various belongings.
"Well then! Foot fetish or not, you promised me that foot rub." Said Aria, sitting down on the chair at her desk and propping her feet, still covered in her open-toes leather boots, onto it.

You didn't have much choice now, being in middle of monster girl village, with a dragon guard captain in the room on top of that.
You sit on the chair on opposite site of the desk, and start taking off Aria's boots. Even before finishing that, you can already smell a rather sweaty aroma coming from them...
Aria herself in the meantime seems to be looking at you with a mild amusement, waiting for her massage.

Finally you take off both of dragon girl's boots, and have her bare feet right in front of you. As you seen before, they look remarkably similar to normal human ones, with the exception of red claws instead of normal nails. They are rather clean luckily for you, but are clearly glistening with sweat, probably caused by her having to stand in hot sun for entire day while in leather boots.
"Ha... Nice to have those off at last." Aria says, and wiggles her clawed toes in front of you
You take another look at her feet and gulp nervously... you never given a foot rub before, what if you did bad at it?

"Less staring, more rubbing!" Says Aria in slightly commanding tone
After that snaps you back in reality, you finally put your hands on dragon girl's foot... and are a bit surprised. It is slightly wet from sweat as you suspected, but also surprisingly soft... you expected a warrior like her to have rather hardened skin, especially on her feet considering she is probably training a lot. After that initial surprise you start pressing your thumbs into Aria's sole, trying your best to not disappoint her.

"Hmm... not too bad." Comments the dragon girl while relaxing on her chair
It surprises you that it was all it took for her start enjoying it... could it be dragon feet are more sensitive than human?
Either way you kept rubbing the soft sole, with Aria sometimes moaning slightly, as well as wiggling and spreading her clawed toes...
The sweaty smell also reaches your nose from time to time... while not as bad as you thought it would be, it definitely isn't super pleasant either.
After a while you decide to switch to Aria's other foot
"You know, maybe instead of trying to defeat Monster Queen, you should become a masseur? You are doing pretty well so far."The dragon girl says, you aren't sure whether she is serious or just wants to mock your plan some more, but you just keep up the massage on her other foot while trying to ignore the comment
As you are in the middle of massaging the other foot however you suddenly feel a light tap from one of Aria's toes on your cheek.
"Just the rubbing isn't too bad, but aren't you forgetting something? I wanted you to do something about my sweat as well..." Aria says suddenly, her face is blushing slightly as if the massage actually aroused her a bit
"W-what do you mean? Should I bring a towel maybe?" You reply nervously
"Geez, are you dense or something? I was talking about foot worship. Now put that tongue of yours to good use." Aria says once again in slightly commanding one(She must be used to commandeering others... being captain of guards after all), deciding to be direct with you, as her free foot is touching the side of your face now, without a doubt leaving some of the sweat on it...
12411.title: Foot rub for the dragon girl!

choices: Aria offers you to sleep at her house until Shinra will give you audience
To your surprise a kitsune(Lady Shinra) suddenly enters the office!
Reader's choice
124111.content:
For some reason you feel yourself blushing at the idea... initially while going after the dragon girl you thought to yourself that it would be humiliating and gross, but after seeing her soft feet, your view had indescribably changed. Perhaps taking a few licks of those wouldn't be too bad?
Aria then takes her free foot from your cheek, and wiggles her red-clawed toes right in front of you... with some reluctance, you stick out your tongue and take a long lick of entire length of dragon girl's soft sole. The taste is salty from sweat... but somehow you don't dislike it.
"Haa... that sure is nice... haven't had anyone lick my feet ever since I followed Lady Shinra after she decided to betray Monster Queen." Aria says seeming to have enjoyed the feeling of your tongue on her foot
You would like to reply, but the strange mix of embarrassment and arousal you feel makes you decide to instead just keep licking the soft foot before you, while still using your hands to massage the other

"You got into it rather quickly. Could it be you really have a foot fetish?" Aria asked suddenly
"I-I don't think so! It's just that..." You say, but stop yourself, realizing you are too aroused to think of any legit excuse
"Just what?" Aria asks, her tone shifting to more commanding one again
"They are just really soft and pretty!" You almost yell out in response

But just as the sun was already set behind the horizon, and the sky was starting to get dark, making you think of making a camp soon, you notice a tall feminine shape standing in front of you.
"Human!" A rather husky, but unmistakeably feminine voice called out to you
Upon closer look, there was no doubt, it was a monster girl standing in front of you, judging from her tall figure, dark skin, well toned body and mostly human characteristics aside from demonic horn and tail, she was an Amazoness. You read quite a bit about them, they are among the best melee fighters in monster queen's army, but at the same time are also known to act independently from the Monster Girl Empire, relationship between their tribes and monster queen being more of a loose alliance of convenience rather than some special loyalty. If the empire was sufficiently weakened, there's no doubt amazon tribes would quickly break off from them... whether that would be good or bad for humanity is another matter whatsoever.

"Stand and fight me! I am Vestra of the amazons! If I win, you shall become my husband!" You could guess it was plausible given it was getting dark and you were covered in your cloak and dirt... nonetheless most people would probably do more to make sure before making proclamations like that.
